original:
Harness Secrets Hidden in Constellations

The Circle of the Stars has tracked heavenly patterns since time immemorial, discovering secrets hidden amid the constellations. By understanding these secrets, the Druids of this circle seek to harness the powers of the cosmos.
translation:
群星隐秘，求索驭力

在无法追忆的过去，星辰结社的德鲁伊们便开始记录天穹中的图案，探索星座之间隐藏的秘密。通过理解这些秘密，这个结社的德鲁伊探索着如何驾驭宇宙的伟力。

original:
When you form a telepathic bond with a creature using your Awakened Mind, you can force that creature to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the creature has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you, and you have Advantage on attack rolls against that creature for the duration of the bond.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Short or Long Rest unless you expend a Pact Magic spell slot (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

The Save activity includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking the Disadvantage but it does not automate the Advantage/Disadvantage.

The Regain Use activity will deduct a Pact Magic spell slot and restore a use of this feature.
translation:
你习得如何在心中解读敌人的攻击。当你用唤醒心灵与一个生物形成心灵连结时，你可以迫使对方进行一次对抗你法术豁免DC的感知豁免，豁免失败则该生物在对你进行时攻击检定具有劣势，而你在对它进行攻击检定时具有优势，直至连结结束。

一旦你使用了此特性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一次短休或长休，或是消耗一枚契约魔法特性的法术位（无需动作）来恢复其使用次数。

Foundry Note

豁免行动包含一个可用于跟进劣势的主动效应，但不会自动化处理优势/劣势机制。

恢复使用次数行动将消耗 1 个契约魔法法术位，并恢复该特性的 1 次使用次数。

original: When you form a telepathic bond using Awakened Mind
translation: 当你用唤醒心灵与一个生物形成心灵连结时

original:
A Miraculous Priest of Divine Power

Core Cleric Traits

Primary Ability

Wisdom

Hit Point Die

D8 per Cleric level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Wisdom and Charisma

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, or Religion

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons

Armor Training

Light and Medium armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPriestsPack]{Priest's Pack}, and [[/award 7GP]]; or (B) [[/award 110GP]]

Clerics draw power from the realms of the gods and harness it to work miracles. Blessed by a deity, a pantheon, or another immortal entity, a Cleric can reach out to the divine magic of the Outer Planes—where gods dwell—and channel it to bolster people and battle foes.

Because their power is a divine gift, Clerics typically associate themselves with temples dedicated to the deity or other immortal force that unlocked their magic. Harnessing divine magic doesn't rely on specific training, yet Clerics might learn prayers and rites that help them draw on power from the Outer Planes.

Not every member of a temple or shrine is a Cleric. Some priests are called to a simple life of temple service, carrying out their devotion through prayer and rituals, not through magic. Many mortals claim to speak for the gods, but few can marshal the power of those gods the way a Cleric can.

Becoming a Cleric …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Cleric Traits table.
  • Gain the Cleric's level 1 features, which are listed in the Cleric Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Cleric Traits table: Hit Point Die and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Cleric's level 1 features, which are listed in the Cleric Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
以神力降下奇迹的教士

牧师核心特

关键属性

感知

生命骰 Hit Point Die

每牧师等级 D8

豁免熟练

感知与魅力

技能熟练

从历史、洞悉、医药、游说或宗教中选择两项

武器熟练

简易武器

护甲受训

轻甲、中甲和盾牌

起始装备

选择 A 或 B：(A) 链衫、盾牌、长矛、圣徽、祭司套组和 7 GP；或 (B) 110 GP

牧师们从诸神领域中汲取力量，以之展现奇迹。受到某位神祇、神系或其他不朽实体的祝福，牧师可以触及到神明所在外层位面的神圣魔法，并将其引用于协助他人，或是惩戒敌人。
他们的力量可以说是神的恩赐，所以那些赐予牧师力量的神灵或是其他永生存在，供奉他们的神殿往往是牧师会选择的去处。施展神圣魔法并不依靠研习或训练。但牧师可能会先从祈祷和仪式中学习，以帮助他们从外层位面获取神力。
并非所有神庙或神社的成员都是牧师。还有一些祭司被召唤到神庙中，只是过着简单的侍僧生活，通过祈祷和仪式而非魔法来实现他们对神明的献身。许多凡人都声称自己能为诸神代言，但很少有人能像牧师那样真中调动诸神的力量。

成为牧师...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“牧师核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“牧师特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“牧师核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰以及轻甲、中甲和盾牌的训练。
  • 获得“牧师特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章中的兼职规则来确定你的可用法术位。

original:
As a Magic action while entirely within Dim Light or Darkness, you can expend 3 Focus Points to shroud yourself with shadows for 1 minute, until you have the Incapacitated condition, or until you end your turn in Bright Light. While shrouded by these shadows, you gain the following benefits.

Invisibility. You have the Invisible condition.

Partially Incorporeal. You can move through occupied spaces as if they were Difficult Terrain. If you end your turn in such a space, you are shunted to the last unoccupied space you were in.

Shadow Flurry. You can use your Flurry of Blows without expending any Focus Points.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will apply the Invisible condition to you.
translation:
当你完全身处微光光照或黑暗环境下时，你能够以一个魔法动作消耗 3 点功力来让你周围环绕幽影，持续 1 分钟，直至你陷入失能状态或在明亮光照中结束回合。当周身环绕幽影时，你获得以下好处：

隐形。 你获得隐形状态。

局部虚化。 你可以如同通过困难地形一般通过已占据空间。如果你回合结束时仍然处于已占据空间之中，则会被排出到之前最近一个未占据空间。

幽影连击。 你使用疾风连击时不再需要消耗功力。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项主动效应，会对你施加隐形状态。

original: While entirely within Dim Light or Darkness
translation: 当你完全身处微光光照或黑暗环境下时

original:
You momentarily summon spirits of order to expunge disorder around you. As a Magic action, you summon the spirits in a 30-foot Cube originating from you. The spirits look like modrons or other Constructs of your choice. The spirits are intangible and invulnerable, and they create the effects below within the Cube before vanishing. Once you use this action, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you spend 7 Sorcery Points (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Heal. The spirits restore up to 100 Hit Points, divided as you choose among any number of creatures of your choice in the Cube.

Repair. Any damaged objects entirely in the Cube are repaired instantly.

Dispel. Every spell of level 6 and lower ends on creatures and objects of your choice in the Cube.

Foundry Note

The Cavalcade (Free) activity includes a free use and the Cavalcade (Sorcery Points) activity expends the correct number of Sorcery Points. Both include a template for tracking the impacted area.
translation:
你召唤出秩序的精魂以抹除周遭的混乱。以一个动作，你在以你为中心 30 尺立方空间的范围内召唤出一些精魂。这些精魂看起来像是魔冢或你选择的其他构装体，其没有实体也无法被摧毁，在消失前他们会使立方范围内产生如下效应。一旦你使用了此能力，直到你完成一次长休前你都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗 7 点术法点以再次使用此能力。

治愈。 精魂合计提供至多回复 100 生命值，由你随意分配给范围内任意数量的生物。

修复。 范围内损坏的物件将被立即修复。

解除。 你选择范围内任意数量的生物或物件，其承受的任何 6 环或以下的法术结束。

Foundry Note

矩阵（免费）行动包含一次免费使用次数，矩阵（术法点）行动则会消耗正确数量的术法点。两者均包含用于跟进影响区域的测量模板。

original:
Channel Cosmic Forces of Order

The cosmic force of order has suffused you with magic. That power arises from Mechanus or a realm like it—a plane of existence shaped entirely by clockwork efficiency. You or someone from your lineage might have become entangled in the machinations of modrons, the orderly beings who inhabit Mechanus. Perhaps your ancestor even took part in the Great Modron March. Whatever its origin within you, the power of order can seem strange to others, but for you, it’s part of a vast and glorious system.
translation:
引导寰宇的秩序之力

宇宙的秩序力量已经用魔法渗透了你。这种力量来自于机械境或类似的地方——一个完全由钟表齿轮运转的位面。你或你的血统中的人可能已经卷入了魔冢的远大计划中，魔冢是居住在机械境的秩序生物。也许你的祖先以某种方式参加了伟大的魔冢远征。不管你体内的这种力量起源于何处，机械境的力量对于其他人可能显得陌生而怪异，但对你来说那是他人所无法理解的宏大和璀璨的系统的一部分。

original:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Clockwork Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Clockwork Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAid0000000]{Aid}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlarm00000]{Alarm}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbProtectionFro]{Protection from Energy}
7@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFreedomofM]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonCons]{Summon Construct}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofForc]{Wall of Force}

In addition, consult the Manifestations of Order table and choose or randomly determine a way your connection to order manifests while you are casting any of your Sorcerer spells.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbManifestation rollable caption=false]

Foundry Note

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.
translation:
当你达到时械法术表中所示的术士等级时，你将同时获得其对应的时械法术。时械法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

时械法术
术士等级 法术
3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAid0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlarm00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]
5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbProtectionFro]
7 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFreedomofM], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonCons]
9 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofForc]

此外，你可以从秩序显迹表格中选择或掷骰决定一种你在施法时显现出与秩序之联系的方式。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbManifestation rollable caption=false]

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

original:
Move in Harmony with the Cosmos

Bards of the College of Dance know that the Words of Creation can't be contained within speech or song; the words are uttered by the movements of celestial bodies and flow through the motions of the smallest creatures. These Bards practice a way of being in harmony with the whirling cosmos that emphasizes agility, speed, and grace.
translation:
舞步节律谐宇宙。

舞蹈学院的吟游诗人认为，创世真言只用言语和歌声去表达是远远不够的；上到天体流转，下到动物蹦跳，这点点滴滴汇聚成的节奏才是创世真言的真正蕴含。这些吟游诗人勤学苦练旋转跳跃，只为和宇宙万物同频舞动，他们灵敏迅捷，舞姿优雅。

original:
Weave Beguiling Fey Magic

The College of Glamour traces its origins to the beguiling magic of the Feywild. Bards who study this magic weave threads of beauty and terror into their songs and stories, and the mightiest among them can cloak themselves in otherworldly majesty. Their performances stir up wistful longing for forgotten innocence, evoke unconscious memories of long-held fears, and tug at the emotions of even the most hard-hearted listeners.
translation:
织魔作惑妖精术。

魅心学院的起源要追溯到妖精荒野中的惑心魔法。研究这些魔法的吟游诗人们将美好与恐怖化作丝线，编织到他们的歌曲和故事之中，此中大师甚至能够披上超凡脱俗的威仪。他们的表演将调动人们对被淡忘的纯真的渴望，唤醒人们潜意识中长存的恐惧，牵扯出最铁石心肠的听众的情绪。

original:
Plumb the Depths of Magical Knowledge

Bards of the College of Lore collect spells and secrets from diverse sources, such as scholarly tomes, mystical rites, and peasant tales. The college's members gather in libraries and universities to share their lore with one another. They also meet at festivals or affairs of state, where they can expose corruption, unravel lies, and poke fun at self-important figures of authority.
translation:
博观觅识深钻法。

逸闻学院的吟游诗人从各种渠道——例如奥术著作、神秘仪式甚至市井故事——收集咒语和奥秘。他们聚集在图书馆或是学府之中，分享彼此之间获取的知识。他们也会出席国家事务或是参加节日活动，揭露腐败、拆穿谎言、对自以为是的权威者发起嘲笑。

original:
Sing the Deeds of Ancient Heroes

Bards of the College of Valor are daring storytellers whose tales preserve the memory of the great heroes of the past. These Bards sing the deeds of the mighty in vaulted halls or to crowds gathered around great bonfires. They travel to witness great events firsthand and to ensure that the memory of these events doesn't pass away. With their songs, they inspire new generations to reach the same heights of accomplishment as the heroes of old.
translation:
颂歌独唱旧英杰

勇气学院的吟游诗人是无畏的故事讲述者，他们的故事承载了过往伟大英雄的记忆。这些人儿在穹顶之下、篝火之侧、人群之间歌唱豪杰的功绩。他们四处旅行，用双眼记录史诗的发生，将传奇深埋心底并传承下去。他们激励新一代人勇攀高峰，达到与古老英雄同样的高度。

original:
You can use your wit to turn the tide of battle. A creature that has a Bardic Inspiration die from you can use it for one of the following effects.

Defense. When the creature is hit by an attack roll, that creature can use its Reaction to roll the Bardic Inspiration die and add the number rolled to its AC against that attack, potentially causing the attack to miss.

Offense. Immediately after the creature hits a target with an attack roll, the creature can roll the Bardic Inspiration die and add the number rolled to the attack's damage against the target.
translation:
你知晓如何在战斗中运用你的机智来扭转战局。一个拥有你的诗人激励骰的生物可以使用它来获得以下一种效果：

防御。被攻击命中时，该生物可以使用反应掷出诗人激励骰，将结果加入其 AC 中，这可能使该攻击变为失手。

进攻。当该生物发动的一次攻击检定命中一个目标时，其可以立即掷出诗人激励骰，并将结果加入此次攻击对目标造成的伤害中。

original:
Your experience on the battlefield has refined your fighting techniques. You learn maneuvers that are fueled by special dice called Superiority Dice.

Maneuvers. You learn three maneuvers of your choice from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFighter000000.JournalEntryPage.Ihf36UhEn91djWwP]{Maneuver Options} section. Many maneuvers enhance an attack in some way. You can use only one maneuver per attack.

You learn two additional maneuvers of your choice when you reach Fighter levels 7, 10, and 15. Each time you learn new maneuvers, you can also replace one maneuver you know with a different one.

Superiority Dice. You have four Superiority Dice, which are d8s. A Superiority Die is expended when you use it. You regain all expended Superiority Dice when you finish a Short or Long Rest.

You gain an additional Superiority Die when you reach Fighter levels 7 (five dice total) and 15 (six dice total).

Saving Throws. If a maneuver requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 plus your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice) and Proficiency Bonus.

Foundry Note

Your Superiority Dice will automatically increase in count and die type as you level up.
translation:
你的战场经验锤炼了你的战斗技艺，你使用名为"卓越骰"的特殊骰子来执行特殊的战技。

战技。你习得三种自选战技，详见后文。战技强化了你的攻击。而你在每次攻击时只能应用一种战技。

你在战士等级达到7、10和15级时均习得两种新战技。习得新战技时，你还可以额外替换一个已经习得的战技。

卓越骰。

你的卓越骰在战士等级达到 7 级（共五枚）和 15 级（共六枚）时各增加一枚。

豁免检定。 某些战技需要目标进行豁免检定作抵抗。战技的豁免DC为 8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的力量或敏捷调整值（自选）。

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，你的卓越骰的骰数和骰面会自动增加。

original:
When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks to direct one of your companions to strike. When you do so, choose a willing creature who can see or hear you and expend one Superiority Die. That creature can immediately use its Reaction to make one attack with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, adding the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll on a hit.

Foundry Note

The Directed Strike activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.
translation:
你在自己回合内执行攻击动作时，你可以替换掉一次你的攻击变为指挥一名伙伴发动奇袭。使用此战技时，你消耗一枚卓越骰，并指定一名能看见你或能听到你声音的伙伴。所 选生物可以立即使用其反应发动一次武器攻击或徒手打击，若命中，将消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。

Foundry Note

定向打击行动允许你在掷骰对话框中选择应造成的伤害类型。

original: When you take the Attack action on your turn
translation: 你在自己回合内执行攻击动作时

original: When you make a Charisma (Intimidation, Performance, or Persuasion) check, you can expend one Superiority Die and add that die to the roll.
translation: 当你进行一次魅力（威吓、表演或游说）检定时，你能够消耗一枚卓越骰，将消耗的卓越骰加入此次属性检 定中。

original: When you make a Charisma (Intimidation, Performance, or Persuasion) check
translation: 当你进行一次魅力（威吓、表演或游说）检定时

original:
In the past, you usually contacted your patron through intermediaries. Now you can communicate directly; you always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplContactOth]{Contact Other Plane} spell prepared. With this feature, you can cast the spell without expending a spell slot to contact your patron, and you automatically succeed on the spell’s saving throw.

Once you cast the spell with this feature, you can’t do so in this way again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The spell is granted to you automatically at this level with a free use.
translation:
在过往，想联络你的宗主都需要一些中间手段，现在已然不同，你可以直接和他对话了。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplContactOth]总会在你的准备法术列表中，且你用此法联络宗主时无需消耗法术位，法术的豁免检定也自动成功。

一旦你用这种方式施法，直到你完成一次长休前你都不能再次以此施展它。

Foundry Note

达到该等级时，该包含一次免费使用次数的法术会自动授予您。

original: You gain a modicum of control over the surges of your wild magic. Whenever you roll on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg]{Wild Magic Surge} table, you can roll twice and use either number.
translation: 你获得了对狂野魔法涌动的些微掌控。你每次骰@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg]效果时，可以骰两次检定再自选其一生效。

original:
As a Magic action, you cause yourself to emit an aura of sunlight that lasts for 1 minute or until you dismiss it (no action required). You emit Bright Light in a 60-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. Your enemies in the Bright Light have Disadvantage on saving throws against your Radiance of the Dawn and any spell that deals Fire or Radiant damage.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a target template of 60 feet for tracking the emitted Bright Light and an Active Effect for marking affected creatures but it does not automate the Disadvantage.
translation:
以一个魔法动作，你可以让自己散出一圈日光。持续一分钟或直到你将其解除（无需动作）。你将释放出半径 60 尺的明亮光照，以及其外延伸 30 尺的微光光照。身处明亮光照中的敌人，在对抗你黎明曙光和任何法术造成的火焰或光耀伤害时，豁免检定具有劣势。
你可以使用该特性的次数等于你的感知调整值（至少为一次）。而你将在完成一次长休后重新恢复所有的使用次数。

Foundry Note

T该特性包含一个跟进发处 60 尺明亮光照的目标模板，以及一个用于选定受影响生物的主动效应，但不会自动施加劣势。

key: entries->Corona of Light->activities->Emit Aura of Sunlight->name
translation: 散出光冕 Emit Aura of Sunlight

original:
Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can consult your Star Map for omens and roll a die. Until you finish your next Long Rest, you gain access to a special Reaction based on whether you rolled an even or an odd number on the die:

Weal (Even). Whenever a creature you can see within 30 feet of you is about to make a D20 Test, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d6 and add the number rolled to the total.

Woe (Odd). Whenever a creature you can see within 30 feet of you is about to make a D20 Test, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d6 and subtract the number rolled from the total.

You can use this Reaction a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Weal and Woe activities will consume a use of this feature and provide an Add or Subtract roll.
translation:
每当你完成一次长休，你可以参照你的星图来寻找预兆。此时，掷一枚骰子。直到你完成下一次长休为止，你获得一个基于此掷骰结果奇偶性的特殊反应能力。

吉兆(偶数)。 当你周围 30 尺内的一个可见生物进行一次 D20 检定时，你可以使用你的反应来骰一个 d6，并将结果加入到 检定结果中。

凶兆 (奇数)。 当你周围 30 尺内的一个可见生物进行一次 D20 检定时，你可以使用你的反应来骰一个 d6，并将结果从检定结果中减去。

你可以使用这一反应能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值，在你完成一次长休后，你会重获全部已消耗的使用次数。

Foundry Note

吉兆 和 凶兆行动会消耗一次此特性的使用次数，并提供一次加或减的掷骰。

original: Whenever a creature you can see within 30 feet is about to make a D20 Test
translation: 当你周围 30 尺内的一个可见生物进行一次 d20 检定时

original: Whenever a creature you can see within 30 feet of you is about to make a D20 Test
translation: 当你周围 30 尺内的一个可见生物进行一次 D20 检定时

original: You can use musical notes or words of power to disrupt mind-influencing effects. If you or a creature within 30 feet of you fails a saving throw against an effect that applies the Charmed or Frightened condition, you can take a Reaction to cause the save to be rerolled, and the new roll has Advantage.
translation: 你可以用带有力量的音符或话语来破坏影响心灵的效应。若你或位于你 30 尺内的一名生物在对抗施加魅惑或恐慌状态的效应的豁免检定中失败，你能以一个反应重骰这次豁免，这次重骰具有优势。

original: You or a creature within 30 feet of you fails a saving throw against an effect that applies the Charmed or Frightened condition
translation: 你或位于你 30 尺内的一名生物在对抗施加魅惑或恐慌状态的效应的豁免检定中失败

original:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonAber]{Summon Aberration}, you can modify it so that it doesn’t require Concentration. If you do so, the spell’s duration becomes 1 minute for that casting, and when summoned, the Aberration has a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your Warlock level plus your Charisma modifier.

In addition, the first time each turn the Aberration hits a creature under the effect of your Hex, the Aberration deals extra Psychic damage to the target equal to the bonus damage of that spell.

Foundry Note

The Hex activity includes the extra damage.

The Thrall Temporary HP activity includes the Temporary HP to apply to your Thrall when summoning without Concentration.

The spell is granted automatically as you level up.
translation:
当你施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonAber]时，你可以微调这一法术使其无需专注。以无需专注的方式施展时，该法术的持续时间将变为一分钟，且召唤来的异怪拥有等于你魔契师等级 + 你的魅力调整值的临时生命值。

此外，该异怪在每个回合中第一次命中一个被你的脆弱诅咒影响的生物时，该异怪会对目标额外造成等于该法术的附加伤害的心灵伤害。

Foundry Note

脆弱诅咒伤害行动包含额外伤害。

奴仆临时生命值行动包含无需专注召唤时应用于奴仆的临时生命值。

该法术会随着等级提升自动授予。

original: When your thrall hits a creature under the effect of your Hex
translation: 该异怪在每个回合中第一次命中一个被你的脆弱诅咒影响的生物时

original: When you cast Hex without Concentration
translation: 当你无需专注施展脆弱诅咒时

original: Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. On your turn, you can take one of the following actions as a Bonus Action: &Reference[Dash], &Reference[Disengage], or &Reference[Hide].
translation: 你精妙的反应与身手使你的行动无比迅速。你在战斗中每回合可执行一次附赠动作，该附赠动作可用以执行&Reference[Dash], &Reference[Disengage] 或 &Reference[Hide]三种动作项其中之一。

original:
You’ve developed cunning ways to use your Sneak Attack. When you deal Sneak Attack damage, you can add one of the following Cunning Strike effects. Each effect has a die cost, which is the number of Sneak Attack damage dice you must forgo to add the effect. You remove the die before rolling, and the effect occurs immediately after the attack’s damage is dealt. For example, if you add the Poison effect, remove 1d6 from the Sneak Attack’s damage before rolling.

If a Cunning Strike effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus.

Poison (Cost: 1d6). You add a toxin to your strike, forcing the target to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[Poisoned] condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the Poisoned target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

To use this effect, you must have a Poisoner’s Kit on your person.

Trip (Cost: 1d6). If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Withdraw (Cost: 1d6). Immediately after the attack, you move up to half your Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Foundry Note

After using Cunning Strike effects use the Cunning Sneak Attack activity on this feature. It will prompt you to select how many dice you expended on effects and deduct them from your Sneak Attack roll automatically.

You can select the damage type in the damage roll dialog.

The Poison activity includes an Active Effect that applies the Poisoned condition.

The Trip activity includes an Active Effect that applies the Prone condition or you can use the inline condition above.
translation:
你学会如何以灵巧的方式施展偷袭。当你造成偷袭伤害时，你可以为这次偷袭额外增加以下其中一种效果，但这些效果需要减少部分偷袭伤害来发动。额外效果在处理完偷袭伤害后触发。例如：使用淬毒效果，必须在掷骰前减少 1d6 偷袭伤害骰。
如果灵巧打击的效果拥有豁免检定，其豁免DC = 8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的敏捷调整值。

淬毒（消耗：1d6）。 你在攻击中加入毒素，迫使目标生物进行一次体质豁免检定。豁免失败则目标陷入中毒状态，持续 1 分钟。在其每个回合结束时，目标可重复进行豁免，成功则结束中毒。为使用该效果，你必须随身携带制毒师工具。

摔绊（消耗：1d6）。 如果目标为大型或更小的生物，必须成功进行一次敏捷豁免检定，否则陷入倒地状态。

撤步（消耗：1d6）。 攻击结束后，你立刻移动至多一半的速度，该移动不会引起借机攻击。

Foundry Note

使用诡诈打击效应后，请在此特性上使用诡诈偷袭攻击行动。系统将提示你选择在效果中消耗了多少枚骰子，并自动从你的偷袭攻击掷骰中扣除相应数量。

你可以在伤害掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。

淬毒行动包含一个施加中毒状态的主动效应。

摔绊行动包含一个施加倒地状态的主动效应，你也可以使用上方的内嵌状态选项。

original: When you deal Sneak Attack damage
When you deal Snack Attack damage
translation: 当你的偷袭攻击造成伤害时

original: When you deal Sneak Attack damage
When you deal Sneak Attack damage
On a failed save, the target has the Poisoned condition for 1 minute.
translation: 你陷入中毒状态，持续 1 分钟。

original: You learn to use your wit to supernaturally distract, confuse, and otherwise sap the confidence and competence of others. When a creature that you can see within 60 feet of yourself makes a damage roll or succeeds on an ability check or attack roll, you can take a Reaction to expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration; roll your Bardic Inspiration die, and subtract the number rolled from the creature's roll, reducing the damage or potentially turning the success into a failure.
translation: 你学会运用你的妙语连珠来打断敌人，迷惑对方或影响他人的信心。当你身边 60 尺内一个你能看见的生物进行伤害掷骰，或在一次属性检定或攻击检定中成功时，你可以用反应消耗一次诗人激励次数；掷出你的诗人激励骰，并在目标的掷骰结果中减去你的激励骰结果。这将减少造成的伤害或者将成功变为失败。

original: Creature you can see within 60 feet makes a damage roll or succeeds on an ability check or attack roll
translation: 当你身边 60 尺内一个你能看见的生物进行伤害掷骰或在一次属性检定或攻击检定中成功时

original: You gain an uncanny sense of when things aren’t as they should be, giving you an edge when you dodge perils. You have Advantage on Dexterity saving throws unless you have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition.
translation:
当非常事态发生时，一种不可思议的感觉降临你的心头，指引你更好的躲避危机。

只要你未处于 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态，你的敏捷豁免检定就具有优势。

original: When you reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points, you gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your Charisma modifier plus your Warlock level (minimum of 1 Temporary Hit Point). You also gain this benefit if someone else reduces an enemy within 10 feet of you to 0 Hit Points.
translation: 当你将一个敌人的生命值降至 0 时，你获得等同于你的魅力调整值 ＋ 你的魔契师等级的临时生命值（最低为 1）。而若其它人将一个位于你 10 尺内的你的敌人的生命值降至 0 时，你也会获得此收益。

original: When you reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points or  an enemy within 10 feet of you is reduced to 0 Hit Points
translation: 当你将一个敌人的生命值降至 0 时或而若其它人将一个位于你 10 尺内的你的敌人的生命值降至 0 时

original:
You can call on your fiendish patron to alter fate in your favor. When you make an ability check or a saving throw, you can use this feature to add 1d10 to your roll. You can do so after seeing the roll but before any of the roll’s effects occur.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), but you can use it no more than once per roll. You regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
你可以呼唤你的宗主有利的改写你的命运。当你进行属性检定或豁免检定时，可以使用该特性为此次掷骰增添一个 d10 骰。你可在看到掷骰结果后，其结果生效前使用该特性。

你可以使用此特性的次数等于你的魅力调整值（至少 1 次），但你在一次检定中只能使用此特性一次。你在完成一次长休后恢复所有已消耗的次数。

original: When you make an ability check or saving throw
translation: 当你进行属性检定或豁免检定时

original:
While you aren't wearing armor or wielding a Shield, you gain the following benefits.

Dance Virtuoso. You have Advantage on any Charisma (Performance) check you make that involves you dancing.

Unarmored Defense. Your base Armor Class equals 10 plus your Dexterity and Charisma modifiers.

Agile Strikes. When you expend a use of your Bardic Inspiration as part of an action, a Bonus Action, or a Reaction, you can make one Unarmed Strike as part of that action, Bonus Action, or Reaction.

Bardic Damage. You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack rolls of your Unarmed Strikes. When you deal damage with an Unarmed Strike, you can deal Bludgeoning damage equal to a roll of your Bardic Inspiration die plus your Dexterity modifier, instead of the strike's normal damage. This roll doesn't expend the die.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that sets up your Unarmored Defense which can be disabled if you would prefer to use armor.

The Unarmed Strike activity uses Dexterity and a Bardic Inspiration die for damage.

You are also granted an Unarmed Strike item which includes the changes.
translation:
未着装护甲且未持用盾牌期间，你获得以下增益：

大舞蹈家。你在任何依赖舞蹈进行的魅力（表演）检定时具有优势。

无甲防御。你的护甲等级等于 10 ＋ 你的敏捷调整值 ＋ 你的魅力调整值。

灵巧打击。 当你在一次动作、附赠动作或反应中消耗了你的诗人激励，作为该动作、附赠动作或反应的一部分，你可以发动一次徒手打击。

诗人痛击。 你可以用敏捷代替力量进行徒手打击的攻击检定。当你以一次徒手打击造成伤害时，你可以造成等于诗人激励骰+敏捷调整值的钝击伤害，而非徒手打击原本的伤害。此效果并不会消耗你的诗人激励使用次数。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个被动效应，可设置你的无甲防御值，若你更愿意使用护甲，请禁用该效应。

徒手打击行动，其伤害值由敏捷属性和吟游诗人鼓舞骰子来决定。

original:
When you hit with your Sneak Attack on the first round of a combat, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus), or the attack’s damage is doubled against the target.

Foundry Note

The Death Strike activity includes the save and your normal Sneak Attack damage.

With the target selected you can either right click on the damage roll's chat card and select  Apply Double Damage or click the "2" button and then the  Apply button.
translation:
当你在战斗的第一个回合以偷袭命中某个生物时，该生物必须进行一次体质豁免（DC 8 ＋ 你的敏捷调整值 ＋ 你的熟练加值）。豁免失败时，你将对其造成双倍伤害。

Foundry Note

死亡打击行动包含豁免检定和你的正常偷袭伤害。

选中目标后，你可以右键点击伤害掷骰的聊天卡牌并选择 应用双倍伤害，或先点击“2”按钮再点击 应用按钮。

original: When you hit with your Sneak Attack on the first round of a combat
translation: 当你在战斗的第一个回合以偷袭命中某个生物时

original:
You gain one of the following feature options of your choice. Whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can replace the chosen option with the other one.

Escape the Horde. Opportunity Attacks have Disadvantage against you.

Multiattack Defense. When a creature hits you with an attack roll, that creature has Disadvantage on all other attack rolls against you this turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Multiattack Defense activity with an Active Effect which can be used to track a creature that has Disadvantage against you but it does not automate the effect.
translation:
你选择并获得以下特性选项之一。当你完成一次短休或长休时，你可以将所选的选项替换为另一个。

冲出重围 以你为目标的借机攻击具有劣势。

多重防御 你被生物的攻击命中时，该生物在本回合内对你进行的所有后续攻击检定都具有劣势。

Foundry Note

此功能包含一个带有主动效应的多重防御行动，可用于跟进对你有劣势的生物，但不会自动应用该效应。

original: When a creature hits you with an attack roll
translation: 你被生物的攻击命中时

original:
When an attack roll hits you and its damage includes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage, you can take a Reaction to reduce the attack's total damage against you. The reduction equals 1d10 plus your Dexterity modifier and Monk level.

If you reduce the damage to 0, you can expend 1 Focus Point to redirect some of the attack's force. If you do so, choose a creature you can see within 5 feet of yourself if the attack was a melee attack or a creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself that isn't behind Total Cover if the attack was a ranged attack. That creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take damage equal to two rolls of your Martial Arts die plus your Dexterity modifier. The damage is the same type dealt by the attack.

Foundry Note

The Reduce activity can be used to heal yourself to reduce the total damage if it's not enough to reduce it to 0.

The Redirect activity can be used to roll damage and consume a use of your Focus Points if you can reduce it to 0. You can select the type of damage in the roll dialog. The dice increase automatically as you level up.
translation:
当你被一次伤害中包含钝击，穿刺或挥砍伤害的攻击检定命中时，你可以执行反应减少此次攻击对你造成伤害的总值，减值等于 1d10 + 你的敏捷调整至 + 你的武僧等级。

若被拨挡攻击的伤害减少至 0，则你可以消耗 1 点功力将此次攻击的部分伤害重新定向。如果是近战攻击，选择你周围 5 尺内的一个你可见的生物；如果是远程攻击，选择 60 尺内一个不位于完全掩护后的你可见的生物。该生物必须成功通过一次敏捷豁免，否则受到相当于你 2 个武艺骰 + 你的敏捷调整值的伤害。其伤害类型与原先的伤害类型相同。

Foundry Note

调息 行动可用来治疗自身，以削减总伤害，倘若其不足以将总伤害削减至 0 时。

重新定向 行动可在你能将其减至 0 的情况下用于掷骰伤害并消耗您的 1 点功力。您可以在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。随着您等级的提升，骰面会自动增加。

original: When an attack roll hits you and its damage includes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage
translation: 当你被一次伤害中包含钝击，穿刺或挥砍伤害的攻击检定命中时

original: If you reduce the damage to 0
translation: 若被拨挡攻击的伤害减少至 0

original:
You can now use your Deflect Attacks feature against attacks that deal any damage type, not just Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing.

The Reduce activity can be used to heal yourself to reduce the total damage if it's not enough to reduce it to 0.

The Redirect activity can be used to roll damage and consume a use of your Focus Points if you can reduce it to 0. You can select the type of damage in the roll dialog. The dice increase automatically as you level up.
translation:
你的拨挡化劲现在可以处理任何伤害类型的攻击，不再仅限于钝击、挥砍和穿刺。

调息 行动可用来治疗自身，以削减总伤害，倘若其不足以将总伤害削减至 0 时。

重新定向 行动可在你能将其减至 0 的情况下用于掷骰伤害并消耗您的 1 点功力。您可以在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。随着您等级的提升，骰面会自动增加。

original: When an attack roll hits you and its damage includes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage
translation: 当你被一次伤害中包含钝击，穿刺或挥砍伤害的攻击检定命中时

original: If you reduce the damage to 0
translation: 若被拨挡攻击的伤害减少至 0

original:
Thanks to your travels, you gain the following benefits.

Expertise. Choose one of your skill proficiencies with which you lack Expertise. You gain Expertise in that skill.

Languages. You know two languages of your choice from the language tables in chapter 2.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for choices when you add the Ranger class to your character sheet.
translation:
得益于游历四方，你获得以下增益。

专精。 你选择一个已有技能熟练项，获得它的专精。

语言。 你学会第二章语言表中任意两门自选语言。

Foundry Note

将游侠职业添加到角色卡时，系统会提示你进行选择。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can see normally in Dim Light and Darkness—both magical and nonmagical—within 120 feet of yourself.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that grants you darkvision to 120 feet.
translation:
先决条件： 2 级及以上的魔契师

你在黑暗和微光中拥有 120 尺的可视距离，而无论其属于魔法性的还是非魔法性的。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个被动效果，能赋予你 120 尺的黑暗视觉。

original:
You’ve practiced new ways to use your Sneak Attack deviously. The following effects are now among your Cunning Strike options.

Daze (Cost: 2d6). The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or on its next turn, it can do only one of the following: move or take an action or a Bonus Action.

Knock Out (Cost: 6d6). The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or it has the &Reference[Unconscious] condition for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. The Unconscious target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Obscure (Cost: 3d6). The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, or it has the &Reference[Blinded] condition until the end of its next turn.

Foundry Note

After using Cunning Strike effects use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity=Cunning Sneak Attack]]{Cunning Sneak Attack} activity. It will prompt you to select how many dice you expended on effects and deduct them from your Sneak Attack roll automatically.

You can control the damage type in the damage roll dialog box.

The Daze activity includes an Active Effect for tracking the dazed target but it does not automate the effect.

The Knock Out activity includes an Active Effect which applies the Unconscious condition.

The Obscure activity includes an Active Effect which applies the Blinded condition.
translation:
你习得了新的偷袭方法，使你的偷袭变得更为凶狠卑劣。下列效果现在加入你的诡诈打击选项。

恍惚（花费：2d6）。 目标必须通过一个成功的体质豁免，否则该目标的下一回合只能选择下列行为中的一项：移动、执行一个动作或执行一个附赠动作。

击昏（花费：6d6）。 目标必须通过一个成功的体质豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Unconscious] 状态，持续 1 分钟或受到任何伤害。昏迷的目标每在自己的回合结束时都可以重新进行豁免，若通过，则状态结束。

眩目（花费：3d6）。 你对目标的眼睛发动袭击。目标必须通过一个成功的敏捷豁免，否则将陷入目盲状态，直到它的下一回合结束。

Foundry Note

使用诡诈打击效应后，请使用[[/item Cunning Strike activity=Cunning Sneak Attack]]{诡诈偷袭打击}行动。系统将弹出提示框供你选择在效果中消耗的骰子数量，并自动从偷袭骰总数中扣除对应数值。

您可通过伤害掷骰对话框中的下拉菜单选择伤害类型。

恍惚行动包含用于跟进恍惚目标的主动效应，但不会自动化状态应用。

击昏行动包含施加昏迷状态的主动效应。

炫目行动包含施加目盲状态的主动效应。

original: When you deal Sneak Attack damage
translation: 当你的偷袭攻击造成伤害时

original: When you deal Sneak Attack damage
translation: 当你的偷袭攻击造成伤害时

original: When you deal Sneak Attack damage
translation: 当你的偷袭攻击造成伤害时

original: On its next turn, the target can do only one of the following: move or take an action or a Bonus Action.
translation: 你的下一回合只能选择下列行为中的一项：移动、执行一个动作或执行一个附赠动作。

original: The target has the Unconscious condition for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. The Unconscious target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
translation: 你必须通过一个成功的体质豁免，否则将陷入昏迷状态，持续 1 分钟或受到任何伤害。昏迷的目标每在自己的回合结束时都可以重新进行豁免，若通过，则状态结束。

original: The target has the Blinded condition until the end of its next turn
translation: 陷入目盲状态，直到攻击者的下一回合结束。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 12+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvThirstingB]{Thirsting Blade} Invocation

The Extra Attack of your Thirsting Blade invocation confers two extra attacks rather than one.
translation:
先决条件：12 级及以上的魔契师，具有 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvThirstingB]祈唤

饥渴魔刃祈唤为你提供的额外攻击变为两次而非一次。

original:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to disarm the target. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or drop one object of your choice that it's holding, with the object landing in its space.

Foundry Note

This feature will automatically use the higher of your Strength/Dexterity for the save.

The Damage included in the save allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog. It will remember your choice going forwards.
translation:
你以攻击检定命 中一个生物时，可消耗一枚卓越骰以尝试缴械目标。将消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。目标必须通过一次力量豁免，豁免失败则其丢弃手中持握的一件物品（由你选择）。被丢弃的物品将掉落在该生物处于的空间中。

Foundry Note

该特性将自动使用你的力量或敏捷属性中较高值进行豁免检定。

豁免检定时包含的伤害类型可由你在掷骰对话框中选择，系统将记住你本次选择的伤害类型用于后续检定。

original:
When a spell you cast with a spell slot restores Hit Points to a creature, that creature regains additional Hit Points on the turn you cast the spell. The additional Hit Points equal 2 plus the spell slot's level.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a healing activity. Set the scale to the spell slot level you cast and it will provide a healing roll for you.
translation:
当你消耗法术位为一个生物施展恢复生命值的法术时，该生物在你施法的回合额外恢复2+法术环阶的生命值。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项治疗行动。将比例值设定为施展法术的环阶，它就会为你提供一次治疗检定。

original:
Your physical and mental discipline grant you proficiency in all saving throws.

Additionally, whenever you make a saving throw and fail, you can expend 1 Focus Point to reroll it, and you must use the new roll.

Foundry Note

You will automatically be granted the additional Saving Throw proficiencies as you level up.

Use this feature to expend 1 Focus Point.
translation:
你的身心修行已然有所成就，你获得所有豁免的熟练。

此外，当你豁免失败时，你可以消耗 1 点功力重掷豁免，但必须使用重掷的结果。

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，将自动获得额外的豁免熟练。

使用该特性需消耗 1 点功力。

original:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell that has a range of at least 5 feet, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to double the spell’s range. Or when you cast a spell that has a range of Touch, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to make the spell’s range 30 feet.
translation:
消耗：1 术法点

当你施展一个射程至少为 5 尺的法术时，你可以消耗 1 术法点来将法术的射程翻倍。

当你施展一个射程为触及的法术时，你可以消耗 1 术法点来将法术的射程改为 30 尺。

original: When you cast a spell that has a range of at least 5 feet or when you cast a spell that has a range of Touch
translation: 当你施展一个射程至少为 5 尺的法术时或者当你施展一个射程为触及的法术时

original:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to distract the target. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than you has Advantage if the attack is made before the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking the distracted target but does not automate the Advantage.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.
translation:
你以攻击检定 命中一个生物时，可以消耗一枚卓越骰以扰乱该目标，让你的盟友有机可乘。将消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。此后直到你下个回合开始前，下一次由除你之外的生物对目标进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项主动效应，可用于跟进扰乱目标，但不会自动化应用优势。

伤害行动可让你在掷骰对话框中选择该攻击应造成的伤害类型。

original:
Choose two Wizard spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Divination school} (change the Grouping mode to "School" for easier selection), each of which must be no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Divination school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.
translation:
从 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{预言学派 Divination}选择两道不高于二环的预言学派法术，并将其免费加入你的法术书中。

此外，每当你在本职业中获得一个新环阶的法术位时，你都能免费将一道法师法术列表中的预言学派法术加入你的法术书中。你所选的法术都必须是你当前拥有法术位的环阶。

original:
You can channel divine power into your strikes. On each of your turns while your Rage is active, the first creature you hit with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike takes extra damage equal to 1d6 plus half your Barbarian level (round down). The extra damage is Necrotic or Radiant; you choose the type each time you deal the damage.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for each type of damage.
translation:
你可以引导神性的怒火，将其注入打击之中。你的狂暴激活期间，每个你的回合中你首次以武器或徒手打击命中的生物将受到等于1d6 + 你野蛮人等级的一半（向下取整）的额外伤害。额外伤害的伤害类型为光耀或暗蚀，在每次造成伤害时由你选择伤害类型。

Foundry Note

此特性为每种伤害类型都设有行动。

original:
You can call on your deity or pantheon to intervene on your behalf. As a Magic action, choose any @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell} of level 5 or lower that doesn't require a Reaction to cast. As part of the same action, you cast that spell without expending a spell slot or needing Material components. You can't use this feature again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

Uncheck the "Consumption" box when casting the spell for the free use. This feature can be used to track available uses.
translation:
你能呼唤你所信奉的神祇或神系来代你降下干预。以一个魔法动作，你选择一道 5 环或更低的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]（施法时间不能为 1 反应），并将该法术作为执行此动作的一部分施展，无需消耗法术位也无需对应的施法材料。直到你完成一次长休前，你都无法再次使用此特性。

Foundry Note

在以免费使用施放此法术时，取消勾选“消耗”框。 此特性可用于跟进可用次数。

original:
You have dedicated yourself to one of the following sacred roles of your choice.

Protector. Trained for battle, you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Heavy armor.

Thaumaturge. You know one extra cantrip from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell list}. In addition, your mystical connection to the divine gives you a bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Religion) checks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).

Foundry Note

During advancement you will be able to choose which option you prefer.
translation:
你让自己投身于以下一种由你自己选择的神圣职能：

守护者。通过战斗训练，你获得军用武器熟练与重甲受训。

奇术使。你从 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]中额外获得一个戏法，此外你与神明的紧密联系使你的智力（奥秘或宗教）检定将会获得等同感知调整值的加值（至少 +1）。

Foundry Note

在升级过程中，你可以选择自己偏好的选项

original:
You have dedicated yourself to the following sacred role:

Protector. Trained for battle, you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Heavy armor.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which grants the proficiency and training.
translation:
你已将自己奉献给以下一种神圣职能：

保护者 Protcetor。 通过战斗训练，你获得军用武器熟练与重甲受训。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个被动效应，授予熟练和受训。

original:
You have dedicated yourself to the following sacred role:

Thaumaturge. You know one extra cantrip from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell list}. In addition, your mystical connection to the divine gives you a bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Religion) checks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1, currently [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which increases the number of cantrips you can know and grants the bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Religion) checks.
translation:
你让自己投身于以下一种由你自己选择的神圣职能：

奇术使 Thaumaturage。 你从牧师 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]学会一道额外的戏法。此外，你与神性的神秘链接使你在智力（奥秘和宗教）检定中获得等同于你感知调整值的加值（最低为1）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个被动效果，能增加你已知法术数量，并且在智力（奥秘或宗教）检定中为你提供加值。

original:
Learn the Secrets of the Multiverse

The counsel of a Diviner is sought by those who want a clearer understanding of the past, present, and future. As a Diviner, you strive to part the veils of space, time, and consciousness. You work to master spells of discernment, remote viewing, supernatural knowledge, and foresight.
translation:
探究多元宇宙之秘

那些寻求对过去、现在和未来有更清晰了解的人会寻求预言师的建议。作为一位预言师，你致力于揭开空间、时间与意识的面纱。你努力掌握的法术囊括识别能力、千里眼、超自然学识和预警等内容。

original:
The magic in your body manifests physical traits of your draconic gift. Your Hit Point maximum increases by 3, and it increases by 1 whenever you gain another Sorcerer level.

Parts of you are also covered by dragon-like scales. While you aren’t wearing armor, your base Armor Class equals 10 plus your Dexterity and Charisma modifiers.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that automatically increases your Hit Point maximum and sets up your Unarmored Defense which can be disabled if you would prefer to use armor.
translation:
魔法在你的体内流动，并使你显露出你巨龙先祖的部分身体特质。你的生命值上限提升 3 点，此后每提升一个术士等级，都将再次提升 1 点。

此外，你部分皮肤覆盖着龙鳞样式的柔鳞。未着装护甲时，你的AC等于 10 ＋ 你的魅力调整值 ＋ 你的敏捷调整值。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项主动效应，可自动提升你的生命值上限并启用无甲防御机制（若你希望使用护甲，可停用该效应）。

original:
Breathe the Magic of Dragons

Your innate magic comes from the gift of a dragon. Perhaps an ancient dragon facing death bequeathed some of its magical power to you or your ancestor. You might have absorbed magic from a site infused with dragons’ power. Or perhaps you handled a treasure taken from a dragon’s hoard that was steeped in draconic power. Or you might have a dragon for an ancestor.
translation:
吐纳巨龙魔法

你的天赋魔法源于龙族的魔力。也许一条远古龙在将死之际把自己部分魔力遗留给了你的先祖，也有可能你是从一个注入了龙之魔力的地方吸取得来，还有一种可能是你触碰到了出土于龙穴，浸入龙族力量的珍宝，甚至你的祖先就是龙也说不定。

original:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Draconic Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Draconic Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlterSelf0]{Alter Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChromaticO]{Chromatic Orb}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDragonsBre]{Dragon’s Breath}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFear000000]{Fear}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}
7@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplArcaneEye0]{Arcane Eye}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmMonst]{Charm Monster}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLegendLore]{Legend Lore}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonDrag]{Summon Dragon}

Foundry Note

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.

术士等级 法术

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

original:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonDrag]{Summon Dragon} without a Material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a Long Rest.

Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn’t require Concentration. If you do so, the spell’s duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking your free usage. When you cast the spell you can uncheck the "Consumption" box and, optionally, the "Concentration" box.
translation:
你可以在无需材料成分的情况下施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonDrag] 龙类召唤术。并且你也可以在不消耗法术位的情况下施展该法术一次。你会在完成一次长休后恢复消耗的次数。

当你施展该法术时，你可以对其调整，使其无需专注。若你这样做，此次法术的持续时间变为 1 分钟。

Foundry Note

该特性可用于跟进免费使用次数。当施放该法术时，您可以取消勾选消耗选框，并可选择取消勾选专注选框。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can cause draconic wings to appear on your back. The wings last for 1 hour or until you dismiss them (no action required). For the duration, you have a Fly Speed of 60 feet.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you spend 3 Sorcery Points (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

The Dragon Wings activity includes an Active Effect that grants you a Fly Speed of 60 feet.

The Restore Use activity can be used to expend the Sorcery Points to restore a use of the Dragon Wings activity.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以使背后张开一对龙翼，翅膀持续存在 1 小时，你也可以将翅膀合拢来提前结束（无需动作）。在此期间你获得 60 尺的飞行速度。

一旦你使用了此能力，直到你完成一次长休前你都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗 3 点术法点以再次使用此能力。

Foundry Note

龙翼行动包含一项主动效应，使你获得 60 尺的飞行速度。

恢复使用次数行动可通过消耗术法点，恢复龙翼行动的使用次数。

original: he wings last for 1 hour or until you dismiss them (no action required). For the duration, you have a Fly Speed of 60 feet.
translation: 翅膀持续存在 1 小时，你也可以将翅膀合拢来提前结束（无需动作）。在此期间你获得 60 尺的飞行速度。

original:
You have mastered the art of creating fearsome ambushes, granting you the following benefits.

Ambusher’s Leap. At the start of your first turn of each combat, your Speed increases by 10 feet until the end of that turn.

Dreadful Strike. When you attack a creature and hit it with a weapon, you can deal an extra 2d6 Psychic damage. You can use this benefit only once per turn, you can use it a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Initiative Bonus. When you roll Initiative, you can add your Wisdom modifier to the roll.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automatically adds your Wisdom modifier to your Initiative roll.

The Dreadful Strike activity includes the additional damage and tracks your limited number of uses. It's damage will automatically increase when you gain the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrStalkersFl]{Stalker's Flurry} feature.

The Ambusher's Leap activity includes an Active Effect that can be used to increase your Speed by 10 feet.
translation:
你精通于伏击的恐怖技艺，并获得了以下增益。

伏兵出击 。 每场战斗你的第一个回合开始时，你的速度增加 10 尺，持续直到该回合结束。

恐惧打击。 每回合一次，当你用武器命中敌人时，可以对目标额外造成 2d6 点心灵伤害。你可以使用此能力的次数等于你的感知调整值（至少为 1），长休后可恢复所有已消耗次数。

先攻加值。 你的感知调整值会被额外加入到你的先攻检定中。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项主动想要，可自动将你的感知调整值加入先攻检定。

恐惧打击行动包含额外伤害数值并跟进使用次数限制。当你获得@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrStalkersFl]{追猎如风}特性时，其伤害值将自动提升。

伏兵出击行动包含一项主动想要，可使你的移动速度提升 10 尺。

original: When you attack and hit a creature with a weapon
translation: 每回合一次，当你用武器命中敌人时

original: At the start of your first turn of each combat
translation: 每场战斗你的第一个回合开始时

original:
You can augment your weapon strikes with mind-scarring magic drawn from the murky hollows of the Feywild. When you hit a creature with a weapon, you can deal an extra 1d4 Psychic damage to the target, which can take this extra damage only once per turn. The extra damage increases to 1d6 when you reach Ranger level 11.

Foundry Note

The Damage activity includes the extra damage. It automatically scales as you level up.
translation:
你能够使用来自妖精荒野中黑暗空洞的摄心魔法以强化你的武器攻击。当你用一把武器击中一个生物时，你可以对目标造成额外的 1d4 点心灵伤害。每个生物在每个回合只能够受到这一额外伤害一次。你的游侠等级达到 11 级时，这一额外伤害变为 1d6。

Foundry Note

伤害行动包含额外伤害数值，该数值会随着角色等级提升自动提升。

original: When you hit a creature with a weapon
translation: 当你用一把武器击中一个生物时

original:
A Nature Priest of Primal Power

Core Druid Traits

Primary Ability

Wisdom

Hit Point Die

D8 per Druid level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Intelligence and Wisdom

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Animal Handling, Arcana, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, or Survival

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons

Tool Proficiencies

Herbalism Kit

Armor Training

Light armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSickle0000]{Sickle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDruidicFocu]{Druidic Focus} (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff}), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagExplorersPa]{Explorer's Pack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulHerbalismK]{Herbalism Kit}, and [[/award 9GP]]; or (B) [[/award 50GP]]

Druids belong to ancient orders that call on the forces of nature. Harnessing the magic of animals, plants, and the four elements, Druids heal, transform into animals, and wield elemental destruction.

Revering nature above all, individual Druids gain their magic from nature, a nature deity, or both, and they typically unite with other Druids to perform rites that mark the passage of the seasons and other natural cycles.

Druids are concerned with the delicate ecological balance that sustains plant and animal life and with the need for people to live in harmony with nature. Druids often guard sacred sites or watch over regions of unspoiled nature, but when a significant danger arises, Druids take a more active role as adventurers who combat the threat.

Becoming a Druid …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Druid Traits table.
  • Gain the Druid's level 1 features, which are listed in the Druid Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Druid Traits table: Hit Point Die and training with Light armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Druid's level 1 features, which are listed in the Druid Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
原初伟力的自然祭司

德鲁伊核心特质

关键属性

感知

生命骰

每德鲁伊等级 D8

豁免熟练项

智力与感知

技能熟练项

从奥秘、驯兽、洞察、医药、自然、察觉、宗教或生存中选择两项

武器熟练项

简易武器

工具熟练项

草药工具

护甲受训

轻甲和盾牌

选择 A 或 B：(A)皮甲、盾牌、镰刀、德鲁伊法器（长棍）、探索套组、草药工具，以及 9 GP；或(B)：50 GP

德鲁伊属于呼唤自然之力的古老教派。利用动物、植物和四大元素的魔力，德鲁伊们可以治愈疾病、变身动物，乃至驾驭元素施加毁灭。

德鲁伊崇敬自然至上，他们的魔法来自自然、自然神祇，或两者兼有。通常，德鲁伊会与其他德鲁伊一起进行仪式，以记录季节和自然周期的变化。

德鲁伊不仅会关注维持动植物生命的微妙生态平衡，还尤为注重人类与自然的和谐相处。德鲁伊常常守护神圣的地点或照看未受破坏的自然区域，但若世界出现重大危险时，德鲁伊会更加积极地作为冒险者参与其中，打击威胁。

成为德鲁伊 ...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“德鲁伊核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“德鲁伊特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“德鲁伊核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰以及轻甲和盾牌的训练。
  • 获得“德鲁伊特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章中的兼职规则来确定你的可用法术位。

original:
You know Druidic, the secret language of Druids. While learning this ancient tongue, you also unlocked the magic of communicating with animals; you always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithA]{Speak with Animals} spell prepared.

You can use Druidic to leave hidden messages. You and others who know Druidic automatically spot such a message. Others spot the message's presence with a successful [[/check inv 15]] check but can't decipher it without magic.

Foundry Note

Druidic and Speak with Animals are automatically added during advancement.
translation:
你学会德鲁伊语，一门德鲁伊之间的秘密语言。在学会这门古老语言的同时，你也解锁了和动物交谈的魔法：你始终准备 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithA]法术。

你可以使用德鲁伊语来传递隐藏的信息。你和其他知晓这门语言的对象能够自动辨认出信息。其他人需要通过 [[/check inv 15]] 才能意识到信息的存在，但不借助魔法则无法解读

Foundry Note

德鲁伊语和“动物交谈术”在升级时会自动放入角色卡。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can imbue your Aura of Protection with primal power, granting the benefits below for 1 minute or until you end them (no action required). Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).

Diminish Defiance. Enemies in the aura have Disadvantage on saving throws against your spells and Channel Divinity options.

Regeneration. At the start of each of your turns, you regain 10 Hit Points.

Swift Spells. Whenever you cast a spell that has a casting time of an action, you can cast it using a Bonus Action instead.

Foundry Note

The Elder Champion activity will consume a use and includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking creatures impacted by Diminished Defense.

The Regeneration activity includes the 10 Hit Points you can regain each turn.

The Restore Use activity will consume a 5th level spell slot and restore a use of this feature.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你将远古自然的力量注入你的守护灵光，赋予以下增益，该持续一分钟或直到你主动结束（无需动作）。你必须完成一次长休才能再次使用该特性，或者消耗一个 5 环法术位（无需动作）来重新使用他。

削弱。 在你守护灵光内的敌人对抗你圣武士法术和引导神力特性进行豁免检定时具有劣势。

再生。 你在每个自己的回合开始时，恢复 10 点生命值。

迅捷施法。 你施展施法时间为1动作的圣武士法术时，可以用一个附赠动作而不是一个动作来施展它。

Foundry Note

上古斗士行动将消耗 1 次使用次数，其中包含一项可用于跟进受削弱状态影响生物的主动效应。

再生行动包含每回合可恢复的 10 点生命值。

恢复使用次数行动将消耗 1 个 5 环法术位，并为该特性恢复 1 次使用次数。

original:
Your alien patron grants you a powerful curse. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHex0000000]{Hex} spell prepared. When you cast Hex and choose an ability, the target also has Disadvantage on saving throws of the chosen ability for the duration of the spell.

Foundry Note

The spell is automatically added to your sheet when you level up.
translation:
你的异界宗主给予你强大的诅咒之力。你始终准备了 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHex0000000]法术。当你施展脆弱诅咒并选择了一项属性时，目标在法术持续时间内还会在以这项属性进行的豁免上具有劣势。

Foundry Note

当你升级时，该法术将自动添加至角色卡中。

original:
You have unearthed Eldritch Invocations, pieces of forbidden knowledge that imbue you with an abiding magical ability or other lessons. You gain one invocation of your choice, such as @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactTome00]{Pact of the Tome}. Invocations are described in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWarlock000000.JournalEntryPage.FA4hxx49eazhISIt]{Eldritch Invocation Options} section.

Prerequisites. If an invocation has a prerequisite, you must meet it to learn that invocation. For example, if an invocation requires you to be a level 5+ Warlock, you can select the invocation once you reach Warlock level 5.

Replacing and Gaining Invocations. Whenever you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one of your invocations with another one for which you qualify. You can’t replace an invocation if it’s a prerequisite for another invocation that you have.

When you gain certain Warlock levels, you gain more invocations of your choice, as shown in the Invocations column of the Warlock Features table.

Current Max Eldritch Invocations: [[lookup @scale.warlock.invocations-known]]

You can’t pick the same invocation more than once unless its description says otherwise.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for your choices as you level up. The advancement system does not prevent you from taking any invocations so be sure that you meet the requirements before selecting one.
translation:
你在神秘学识的研习过程中发掘出魔能祈唤的方式，这些禁忌的知识残章让你获得了持久的魔法能力。你获得一个自选的魔能祈唤，如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactTome00]（详见后文 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWarlock000000.JournalEntryPage.FA4hxx49eazhISIt] 选项）。

先决。如果一个魔能祈唤具有先决，那你必须满足它才能选取。例如，若一个魔能祈唤需要你具有 5 级或更高的魔契师等级，你便可以于你在该职业达到 5 级时选择该祈唤。

替换与获取魔能祈唤。 每当你获得一级魔契师等级时，你都可以用新的祈唤替换一个已学会的祈唤，但你必须满足其先决条件。如果一个祈唤是另一祈唤的先决条件，那你也无法替换它。

当你获得特定的魔契师等级时，你还可以习得更多的魔能祈唤，具体数据见魔契师特性表中“祈唤”一栏。

当前最大魔能祈唤数： [[lookup @scale.warlock.invocations-known]]

你不能多次重复选择同一个魔能祈唤，除非该祈唤自身允许你这样做。

Foundry Note

在升级时，系统会提示您做出选择。升级流程中不会阻止您选择任何祈唤，所以在选择之前请确保您已满足其要求。

original:
Support Combat Skills with Arcane Magic

Eldritch Knights combine the martial mastery common to all Fighters with a careful study of magic. Their spells both complement and extend their combat skills, providing additional protection to shore up their armor and also allowing them to engage many foes at once with explosive magic.
translation:
奥法遍身附剑戟

奥法骑士将所有战士共通的高超武技与对魔法的精妙研究融合贯通。法术补足并拓展了他们的武技，为甲胄提供额外的保护 ，并使他们能够使用爆发性的魔法同时与多个敌人鏖战。

original:
When you use your Magical Cunning feature, you regain all your expended Pact Magic spell slots.

Foundry Note

Use this feature to restore all expended Pact Magic spell slots. It will consume the free use from your Magical Cunning feature.
translation:
当你使用秘法回流特性时，你可以重新获得你所有已消耗的法术位。

Foundry Note

使用此特性可恢复所有已耗尽的契约魔法法术位。这会消耗你 秘法回流特性的免费使用次数。
当你使用秘法回流特性时

original: You have Advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain Concentration.
translation: 你为保持专注所进行的体质豁免具有优势。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]{Pact of the Blade} Invocation

Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon, you can expend a Pact Magic spell slot to deal an extra 1d8 Force damage to the target, plus another 1d8 per level of the spell slot, and you can give the target the &Reference[Prone] condition if it is Huge or smaller.

Foundry Note

The Smite activity consumes a Pact Magic spell slot and increases the damage based on your pact spell level.
translation:
5 级及以上的魔契师，具有 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]祈唤

每回合一次，当你用契约武器命中一个生物时，你可以消耗一枚契约魔法特性的法术位，以此对目标造成额外 1d8 + 每法术位等级 1d8 点的力场伤害，如果目标的体型在巨型或以下，则你还可以令目标陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态

Foundry Note

斩击 行动会耗费一个契约魔法的法术位，并且依据你的契约法术环阶来提升伤害值。

original: Hit a creature with your pact weapon
translation: 每回合一次，当你用契约武器命中一个生物时

original:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock, a Warlock Cantrip That Deals Damage

Choose one of your known Warlock cantrips that deals damage and has a range of 10+ feet. When you cast that spell, its range increases by a number of feet equal to 30 times your Warlock level.

Repeatable. You can gain this invocation more than once. Each time you do so, choose a different eligible cantrip.

Foundry Note

Use the Increase Range enchantment activity and drag your chosen cantrip to the chat card to increase its range and append ", Eldritch Spear" for easier identification.
translation:
先决条件：2 级及以上的魔契师，已知一道造成伤害的魔契师戏法

选择一道你已知的造成伤害且射程至少为10尺的魔契师戏法。当你施展此法术时，其射程增加等于你魔契师等级30倍的尺数。

可复选。 你可以多次选择本祈唤。每次这么做时，你都必须选择不同的戏法。

Foundry Note

使用增距附魔功能，将选定的戏法拖拽至聊天卡牌即可提升其射程，并在名称后追加魔能长枪后缀以便于识别。

original:
You learn how to make your weapon strikes undercut a creature's ability to withstand your spells. When you hit a creature with an attack using a weapon, that creature has Disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell you cast before the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking but does not automate the Disadvantage.
translation:
你习得用武器攻击削弱敌人对你法术抵抗能力的方法。当你用武器攻击命中一个生物后，直至你的下个回合结束前，该生物在下一次对抗你的法术所进行的豁免检定具有劣势。

Foundry Note

该关系包含一种主动效应，可用于跟进，但不会自动应用劣势。

original:
Your draconic magic has an affinity with a damage type associated with dragons. Choose one of those types: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison.

You have Resistance to that damage type, and when you cast a spell that deals damage of that type, you can add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll of that spell.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted to choose the damage type as you level up. The additional damage is not automatically added but this feature includes an activity for each type of damage.

You can speed up use of this feature by moving your chosen damage type to the top and it will be used automatically when using this feature.
translation:
你的龙族术法拥有某些更亲和的元素，该元素类型和某种龙息息相关。选择一种伤害类型：强酸、冷冻、火焰、闪电或毒素。

你对该伤害具有抗性。此外当你施展伤害类型与之相对应的法术时，可以将你的魅力调整值附加到该法术其中一次伤害掷骰中。

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，系统将提示你选择伤害类型。附加伤害不会自动叠加，但该功能为每种伤害类型都配备了对应的行动机制。

你可以通过将选择的伤害类型排序置顶来加速使用该功能，当启用该功能时，置顶的伤害类型将自动生效。

translation: 当你施放造成属于你元素亲合属性的伤害的法术时

translation: 当你施放造成属于你元素亲合属性的伤害的法术时

original:
At the start of your turn, you can expend 1 Focus Point to imbue yourself with elemental energy. The energy lasts for 10 minutes or until you have the Incapacitated condition. You gain the following benefits while this feature is active.

Reach. When you make an Unarmed Strike, your reach is 10 feet greater than normal, as elemental energy extends from you.

Elemental Strikes. Whenever you hit with your Unarmed Strike, you can cause it to deal your choice of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage rather than its normal damage type. When you deal one of these types with it, you can also force the target to make a DC 8 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, you can move the target up to 10 feet toward or away from you, as elemental energy swirls around it.

Foundry Note

The Elemental Attunement activity expends 1 Focus Point and includes an Active Effect for tracking this feature.

The Elemental Strike activity can be used for your Unarmed Strike and will allow you to select the damage type in the roll dialog.

The Elemental Save activity includes the Strength saving throw.
translation:
在你回合开始时，你可以消耗 1 点功力让元素能量浸润己身。这股能量将会持续存在 10 分钟，或直至你陷入失能状态。持续时间内，你获得以下好处：

触及。 元素能量从你的身体向外延伸，使你发动的徒手打击触及距离增加 10 尺。

元素注拳。 当你进行徒手打击时，你可以将伤害类型改为强酸、冷冻、火焰、闪电或雷鸣伤害。当你的徒手打击造成以上类型的伤害时，你可以迫使目标进行一次 [[/save ability=str dc=8+@prof+@abilities.wis.mod format=long]]。豁免失败时，你的元素能量形成涡流将目标向你拉近或推离至多 10 尺。

Foundry Note

进行元素同调行动时将消耗 1 点功力，并包含用于跟进此特性的主动效应。

进行元素注拳行动时可运用于徒手打击，且能在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。

进行元素豁免行动时将包含力量豁免检定。

original: At the start of your turn
When you deal Elemental Strike damage
translation: 当你的元素注拳造成伤害时

original: You gain the following benefits while this feature is active: Reach and Elemental Strikes.
translation: 持续时间内，你获得以下好处：触及 和 元素注拳。

original:
As a Magic action, you can expend 2 Focus Points to cause elemental energy to burst in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of yourself. Choose a damage type: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

Each creature in the Sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes damage of the chosen type equal to three rolls of your Martial Arts die. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

Foundry Note

The damage type can be selected in the roll dialog.
translation:
以一个魔法动作，你可以消耗 2 点功力，凝聚元素能量，在你周围120尺内的一点产生一场半径 20 尺球状区域的能量爆发。你选择一种伤害类型：强酸，寒冷，火焰，闪电或雷鸣。

球体内的每个生物需进行一次敏捷豁免，失败则受到等同于你 3 枚武艺骰的伤害，成功则伤害减半。

Foundry Note

伤害类型可在掷骰对话框中选择。

original:
While your Elemental Attunement is active, you also gain the following benefits.

Damage Resistance. You gain Resistance to one of the following damage types of your choice: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. At the start of each of your turns, you can change this choice.

Destructive Stride. When you use your Step of the Wind, your Speed increases by 20 feet until the end of the turn. For that duration, any creature of your choice takes damage equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die when you enter a space within 5 feet of it. The damage type is your choice of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Empowered Strikes. Once on each of your turns, you can deal extra damage to a target equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die when you hit it with an Unarmed Strike. The extra damage is the same type dealt by that strike.

Foundry Note

This Damage Resistance activity includes 5 Active Effects which you can toggle between to select your preferred Resistance.

The Destructive Stride activity includes an Active Effect which can increase your Movement Speed by 20 feet and allows you to choose the type of damage in the roll dialog.

The Empowered Strike activity allows you to choose the damage type in the roll dialog.
translation:
当你处于元素同调特性激活期间，你在持续时间内获得以下增益：

伤害抵抗。 你你选择获得以下一种伤害抗性：强酸、冷冻、火焰、闪电或雷鸣。每当你回合开始时，你可以更换成另一种伤害抗性。你

破灭奔行 。 当你使用疾步如风后，直至这回合结束，你的速度增加20尺，期间当你走进你所选择的生物5尺内，该生物受到一枚你的武艺骰伤害，该伤害类型与你先前所选的伤害抗性一致。每个生物本回合内只会受到一次这种伤害。

注能打击。每个你的回合一次，当你徒手打击命中生物时，你可以造成等同于你一枚武艺骰的额外伤害。该伤害类型与你先前所选的伤害抗性一致。

Foundry Note

此伤害抵抗 行动包含 5 种主动效应，可切换选择以指定偏好抗性类型。

进行破灭奔行行动时将应用生效效果：提升 20 尺移动速度，并可在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。

进行注能打击行动时，可在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。

original: When you use your Step of the Wind
Once on each of your turns when you hit with an Unarmed Strike
translation: 每个你的回合一次，当你徒手打击命中生物时

original: While your Elemental Attunement is active

key: entries->Elemental Epitome->effects->Step of the Wind Bonus->name

original:
The might of the elements flows through you. You gain one of the following options of your choice.

Potent Spellcasting. Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any Druid cantrip.

Primal Strike. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or a Beast form's attack in Wild Shape, you can cause the target to take an extra 1d8 [[/damage 1d8 type=cold]]{cold}, [[/damage 1d8 type=fire]]{fire}, [[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]{lightning}, or [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]{thunder} damage (choose when you hit).

Foundry Note

You will be prompted to choose during advancement.
translation:
元素的力量在你身上流淌。你选择获得以下其中一种效果：

强力施法。 你可以将你的感知调整值加到你德鲁伊戏法造成的伤害中。

原力蛮击。 一回合一次，当你以一次武器攻击或荒野变形后野兽形态的攻击命中一个生物时，你可以对目标额外造成 1d8 [[/damage 1d8 type=cold]]{寒冷}、[[/damage 1d8 type=fire]]{火焰}、[[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]{光耀} 或 [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]{雷鸣} 伤害（由你命中时选择）。

Foundry Note

在升级过程中，系统会提示您进行选择。

original:
Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any Druid cantrip (currently, [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]).

Foundry Note

This feature does not automate the addition of the Wisdom modifier to Druid cantrips.
translation:
你将你的感知调整值加在你的以德鲁伊戏法造成的伤害上 (当前, [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]])。

Foundry Note

该特性不会自动将感知属性调整值加到德鲁伊戏法上。

original:
Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or a Beast form's attack in Wild Shape, you can cause the target to take an extra 1d8 [[/damage 1d8 type=cold]]{cold}, [[/damage 1d8 type=fire]]{fire}, [[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]{lightning}, or [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]{thunder} damage (choose when you hit).

Foundry Note

This feature's damage will automatically increase when you gain @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdImprovedEl]{Improved Elemental Fury}. If using the activity you will be able to select the damage type when rolling. It will default to your previously chosen damage type.
translation:
一回合一次，当你以一次武器攻击或荒野变形后野兽形态的攻击命中一个生物时，你可以对目标额外造成 1d8 [[/damage 1d8 type=cold]]{寒冰}, [[/damage 1d8 type=fire]]{火焰}, [[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]{闪电} 或 [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]{雷鸣} 伤害（由你命中时选择）。

Foundry Note

在您获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdImprovedEl] 时，该特性所造成的伤害会自动提升。若使用该行动，您在掷骰时能够选择伤害类型。默认情况下，会采用您之前选定的伤害类型。

original: You’re so evasive that attackers rarely gain the upper hand against you. No attack roll can have Advantage against you unless you have the Incapacitated condition.
translation: 你飘忽不定的身形让敌人攻击时无从下手。除非你处于失能状态，否则以你为目标的攻击检定无法取得优势。

original:
Whenever you cast a Wizard spell from the Evocation school, you can add your Intelligence modifier to one damage roll of that spell.

Foundry Note

You can add your Intelligence modifier to the spell's Situational Bonus in the damage dialog or use this feature's Damage activity which allows you to select the type in the damage dialog.
translation:
当你施展一道法师法术列表里的塑能学派法术时，你能将你的智力调整值加入该法术的其中一颗伤害骰中。

Foundry Note

你可以在伤害对话框中将你的智力调整值添加到法术的环境加成中，或者使用此特性的伤害行动，它允许你在伤害对话框中选择类型。

original: Whenever you cast a Wizard spell from the Evocation school
translation: 当你施展一道法师法术列表里的塑能学派法术时

original:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you roll damage for a spell, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to reroll a number of the damage dice up to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one, currently [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]), and you must use the new rolls.

You can use Empowered Spell even if you’ve already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
translation:
消耗：1 术法点

当你为一个法术进行伤害掷骰时，你可以消耗 1 术法点来重掷最多等同于你魅力调整值数量 [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]的伤害骰（至少一个），你必须使用新的结果。

即使你已经在一道法术上使用了其他超魔，你仍然可以使用强效法术

original: When you roll damage for a spell
translation: 当你为一个法术进行伤害掷骰时

original:
Whenever you deal damage with your Unarmed Strike, it can deal your choice of Force damage or its normal damage type.

Foundry Note

The Empowered Strike activity on this feature can allows you to choose between Force and Bludgeoning damage in the roll dialog. It will remember your choice going forward.

It uses your Martial Arts Die (currently [[lookup @scale.monk.die]] for damage and will automatically update as you level up.
translation:
当你徒手打击造成伤害时，你可以将伤害类型替换为力场伤害

Foundry Note

此特性上的真力驻拳行动允许你在掷骰对话框中选择造成力场或钝击伤害。该伤害使用武艺骰进行计算，并将随角色等级提升自动更新。

original:
When you use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity="Poison"]]{Poison} option of your Cunning Strike, the target also takes [[/damage 2d6 poison]] damage whenever it fails the saving throw. This damage ignores Resistance to Poison damage.

Foundry Note

The Poison activity on this feature includes the save and poison damage.

Alternatively, you can use the inline roll above if you've already used the original activity.

Important: This damage does not automatically bypass resistances so ensure the correct damage is being applied.
translation:
当你使用诡诈打击时，每当目标在对抗你的 [[/item Cunning Strike activity="Poison"]]{淬毒} 选项时豁免检定失败，它会受到额外 [[/damage 2d6 poison]] 点毒素伤害。这次伤害无视对毒素伤害的抗性。

Foundry Note

此特性上的毒素行动包括保存和毒素伤害。

或者，如果你已经使用了原始行动，你可以使用上面的内联掷骰。

重要提示： 此伤害不会自动绕过抗性，因此请确保应用了正确的伤害。

original: When you deal Sneak Attack damage
translation: 当你使用诡诈打击造成伤害时
