你获得一个 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC]（见第5章）或另一个你所选择符合条件的专长。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbBoonofSpellRe]。

Foundry Note

当你升级时，系统会提示您做出选择。

original:
When you're subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw and only half damage if you fail.

You don't benefit from this feature if you have the Incapacitated condition.
translation:
你在成为某一范围效应影响对象时，若该效应允许你通过成功的敏捷豁免来使伤害减半，则你在该豁免成功时不受伤害，而豁免失败时只受一半伤害。

若你陷入失能状态，则无法使用该特性。

original:
You can nimbly dodge out of the way of certain dangers. When you’re subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw and only half damage if you fail. You can’t use this feature if you have the Incapacitated condition.

Foundry Note

With your token selected you can either right click on the damage roll's chat card and select  Apply Half Damage or click the "1/2" button and then the  Apply button.
translation:
你可以灵巧躲过某些特定的区域效应。你在成为某一范围效应影响对象时，若该效应允许你通过成功的敏捷豁免来使伤害减半，则你在该豁免成功时不受伤害，而豁免失败时只受一半伤害。若你陷入失能状态，则无法使用该特性。

Foundry Note

选中你的指示物后，你可以右键点击伤害掷骰的聊天卡片并选择  应用半伤 或者点击 "1/2" 按钮，然后点击  应用 按钮。

original: As a Bonus Action, you can expend one Superiority Die and take the Disengage action. You also roll the die and add the number rolled to your AC until the start of your next turn.
translation: 以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一枚卓越骰并执行撤离动作，并将卓越骰结果加入你的AC中，直到你下回合开始为止。

original:
Choose two Wizard spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Evocation school} (change the Grouping mode to "School" for easier selection), each of which must be no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Evocation school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.
translation:
从法师法术列表中选择两道不高于二环的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{塑能学派 Evocation} 法术，并将其免费加入你的法术书中。

此外，每当你在本职业中获得一个新环阶的法术位时，你都能免费将一道法师法术列表中的塑能学派法术加入你的法术书中。你所选的法术都必须是你当前拥有法术位的环阶。

original:
Create Explosive Elemental Effects

Your studies focus on magic that creates powerful elemental effects such as bitter cold, searing flame, rolling thunder, crackling lightning, and burning acid. Some Evokers find employment in military forces, serving as artillery to blast armies from afar. Others use their power to protect others, while some seek their own gain.
translation:
轰天震地元素奥能

你专注于研习以魔力创造威力惊人的元素力量，诸如苦寒、灼焰、惊雷、汲电和烈酸。一些塑能师会接受军队的雇佣，充当从远处轰炸敌人的炮兵。其他人以其惊人力量保护弱小，另一些人则作为冒险者寻求自身的利益。

original:
When you take a Bonus Action to command your Primal Companion beast to take an action, you can also command it to take the &Reference[Dash], &Reference[Disengage], &Reference[Dodge], or &Reference[Help] action using its Bonus Action.

In addition, whenever it hits with an attack roll and deals damage, it can deal your choice of Force damage or its normal damage type.

Foundry Note

The Primal Companion's damage roll dialog's will allow you to choose the type of damage. It defaults to your previous choice each time going forward.
translation:
当你用附赠动作给你的野兽下达命令时，你还可以额外命令野兽在其回合以一个附赠动作执行 &Reference[Dash], &Reference[Disengage], &Reference[Dodge] 或 &Reference[Help] 此外，当你的野兽造成伤时，你可以选择造成力场伤害或是原本的伤害类型。

Foundry Note

原初伙伴的伤害掷骰对话框将允许您选择伤害类型。每次掷骰时，它都会默认为您的上次选择

original:
Casting Divination spells comes so easily to you that it expends only a fraction of your spellcasting efforts. When you cast a Divination spell using a level 2+ spell slot, you regain one expended spell slot. The slot you regain must be of a level lower than the slot you expended and can’t be higher than level 5.

Foundry Note

You can manually regain the expended spell slot or use the Regain Spell Slot activity which will prompt you for the slot to restore.
translation:
你对施展预言法术的技巧驾轻就熟，几乎不用使什么力气。你用法术位施展一个环阶不低于 2 环的预言系法术时，可以恢复 1 个已耗用的法术位。所恢复的法术位环阶必须比你正施展的预言系法术所用的法术位低，且不能高于5环。

Foundry Note

您可以手动恢复已消耗的法术位或使用 恢复法术位行动，提示你恢复法术位。

original:
You gain &Reference[Expertise] in two of your skill proficiencies of your choice. Performance and Persuasion are recommended if you have proficiency in them.

At Bard level 9, you gain Expertise in two more of your skill proficiencies of your choice.
translation:
你获得两项由你选择的你已熟练的技能的 &Reference[Expertise]推荐选择表演和游说，如果你具有这两项技能的熟练。

当你的吟游诗人等级为 9 级时，你额外再获得两项由你选择的你已熟练的技能的专精。

original:
You gain Expertise in two of your skill proficiencies of your choice. Sleight of Hand and Stealth are recommended if you have proficiency in them.

At Rogue level 6, you gain Expertise in two more of your skill proficiencies of your choice.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for your expertise choices as you level up.
translation:
你对手中武器足够理解。对于你拥有熟练项的武器，你可以任选其中两项并获得其精通属性，比如说匕首和短弓。

每当你完成长休后，你可以改变你所选的两把武器，比如说你可以改为获得弯刀和短剑的武器精通属性。

Foundry Note

当你升级时，系统会提示你选择你的专精方向。

original:
Choose two of your skill proficiencies with which you lack Expertise. You gain Expertise in those skills.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted with a choice when you reach this level.
translation:
你选择一个已有技能熟练项，获得它的专精。

Foundry Note

当你升级时，系统会提示您做出选择。

original:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell that has a duration of 1 minute or longer, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to double its duration to a maximum duration of 24 hours.

If the affected spell requires Concentration, you have Advantage on any saving throw you make to maintain that Concentration.
translation:
消耗：1术法点

当你施展一个持续时间为 1 分钟或更长的法术时，你可以消耗 1 术法点使其持续时间翻倍，最多变为 24 小时。

如果被你延效的法术需要专注，你在为维持此法术专注所做的豁免上具有优势。

original: When you cast a spell that has a duration of 1 minute or longer
translation: 当你施展一个持续时间为 1 分钟或更长的法术时

original: You can attack twice instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
translation: 当你在自己的回合执行攻击动作时，你可以发动两次攻击而非一次。

original:
You can attack twice instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

In addition, you can cast one of your cantrips that has a casting time of an action in place of one of those attacks.
translation:
当你在自己的回合执行攻击动作时，你可以发动两次攻击而非一次。

此外，你可以将这些攻击中的一次，替换为施展一道施法时间为一动作的戏法。

original:
You can call on the aid of an otherworldly steed. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindSteed0]{Find Steed} spell prepared.

You can also cast the spell once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Find Steed spell is added to your spell list as always prepared and with a free use per Long Rest when you reach this level.
translation:
你能唤来异界坐骑的协助。你总是视为准备了 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindSteed0]。此外，你可以不消耗法术位地施展该法术一次，而后你必须完成一次长休才能再次这么做。

Foundry Note

当你达到此等级时，寻获坐骑法术将被添加至法术列表并视为始终准备，且每长休可获得一次免费使用次数。

original: Once per active Rage, if you fail a saving throw, you can reroll it with a bonus equal to your Rage Damage bonus (currently [[/r @scale.barbarian.rage-damage]]), and you must use the new roll.
translation: 每个狂暴期间仅一次，若你失败于某次豁免检定，你可以重骰这次检定并在检定中获得等于你狂暴伤害的加值 （当前 [[/r @scale.barbarian.rage-damage]]），你必须使用重骰后的结果。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can do one of the following.

Sleight of Hand. Make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check to pick a lock or disarm a trap with Thieves’ Tools or to pick a pocket.

Use an Object. Take the Utilize action, or take the Magic action to use a magic item that requires that action.

Foundry Note

The Sleight of Hand and Thieves' Tools activities include the relevant checks.

The Use an Object activity can be used for tracking Bonus Action use.
translation:
作为一个附赠动作，你可以做以下一件事。

巧手。进行一次敏捷（巧手）检定，使用盗贼工具开锁或解除陷阱，或者扒窃。

使用物件。 采取使用动作，或者采取魔法动作来使用需要该动作的魔法物品。

Foundry Note

进行巧手与盗贼工具 行动时将包含相关检定。

进行使用物件行动时可用于跟进附赠动作的使用。

original:
Your speed increases by 10 feet while you aren't wearing Heavy armor.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will automatically increase your movement speed. Disable the Fast Movement Active Effect if you're wearing Heavy armor.
translation:
当你未着装重甲时，你的速度增加 10 尺

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个被动效应，会自动提升你的移动速度。如果你穿着重甲，请禁用快速移动被动效果。

original:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter’s Mark} spell prepared. You can cast it twice without expending a spell slot, and you regain all expended uses of this ability when you finish a Long Rest.

The number of times you can cast the spell without a spell slot increases when you reach certain Ranger levels, as shown in the Favored Enemy column of the Ranger Features table.

Foundry Note

The spell is granted to you at this level and will increase the number of free uses available automatically as you level up.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]总会在你的准备法术列表中。你可以不消耗法术位的情况下施展两次，完成一次长休后，你重获所有已消耗的使用次数。当你达到特定的游侠等级时， 你无需法术位便可以施展猎人印记的次数相应地增加， 游侠特性表里的宿敌列对此进行了说明。

Foundry Note

该法术将在当前等级授予你，其免费使用次数将随角色等级提升自动增加。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can expend one Superiority Die to feint, choosing one creature within 5 feet of yourself as your target. You have Advantage on your next attack roll against that target this turn. If that attack hits, add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking the target but it does not automate the Advantage.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一枚卓越骰并指定一个位于你5尺范围内的生物为目标，对其虚晃一招。你在 本回合内对该生物发动的下一次攻击检定具有优势。如果该攻击命中，则将消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。

Foundry Note

该特性包含用于跟进目标的主动效应，但不会自动化处理优势判定。

进行伤害行动时，可在掷骰对话框中选择应造成的伤害类型。

original: Your instincts are so honed that you have Advantage on Initiative rolls.
translation: 你的直觉变得格外敏锐。你的先攻检定具有优势。

original:
Your connection to the forces of nature grants you Blindsight with a range of 30 feet.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which upgrades your Blindsight to 30 feet if you do not already have it.
translation:
你与自然力量所链接，你获得 30 尺的盲视。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项主动效应：若你未拥有盲视，可将盲视感应范围提升至30尺。

original:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonFey0]{Summon Fey} without a Material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a Long Rest.

Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn’t require Concentration. If you do so, the spell’s duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking the free use. Then cast the spell and uncheck the "Consumption" box and optionally the "Concentration" option.
translation:
你施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonFey0] 时无需材料成分。你可以免费施展这个法术一次而不需要消耗法术位，在你完成一次长休后，你重获免费施展该法术的能力。
每当你施展 精类召唤术 前，你都可以微调这一法术使其本次施展与维持无需你保持专注。以无需专注的方式施展时，该法术的持续时间将变为一分钟。

Foundry Note

该特性可用于追踪免费使用次数。施放该法术时，请取消勾选“消耗”复选框，并可选取消勾选“专注”选项。

original:
Wield Fey Mirth and Fury

A fey mystique surrounds you, thanks to the boon of an archfey or a location in the Feywild that transformed you. However you gained fey magic, you are now a Fey Wanderer. Your joyful laughter brightens the hearts of the downtrodden, and your martial prowess strikes terror in your foes, for great is the mirth of the fey and dreadful is their fury.
translation:
驾驭妖精的哀与乐

或来自一位至高妖精的恩惠，或是在妖精荒野中的一次奇遇，你的身侧因那次奇遇而有妖精的魔力缠绕。无论你是怎么得到了来自妖精的魔法的，你现在是一名妖精漫游者。你轻快的笑声为受压迫者们带来欣喜的希望，你英勇的技艺直击你敌人的恐惧，你所就的伟绩乃是妖精的喜悦，你散布的恐惧乃是妖精的愤怒。

original:
When you reach a Ranger level specified in the Fey Wanderer Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Fey Wanderer Spells
Ranger LevelSpell
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonFey0]{Summon Fey}
13@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}
17@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMislead000]{Mislead}

You also possess a fey blessing. Choose it from the Feywild Gifts table or determine it randomly.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbFeywildGifts0 rollable]

Foundry Note

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.
translation:
当你达到妖精漫游者法术表中所示的游侠等级时，你将同时获得其对应的妖精漫游者法术。妖精漫游者法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

妖精漫游者法术
游侠等级 法术
3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]
5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]
9 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonFey0]
13 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]
17 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMislead000]

你还获得了一种妖精祝福。你可以在下方精野之赐的表格中选择你的祝福，或者随机决定它。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbFeywildGifts0 rollable]

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

original:
Make a Deal with the Lower Planes

Your pact draws on the Lower Planes, the realms of perdition. You might forge a bargain with a demon lord such as Demogorgon or Orcus; an archdevil such as Asmodeus; or a pit fiend, balor, yugoloth, or night hag that is especially mighty. That patron’s aims are evil—the corruption or destruction of all things, ultimately including you—and your path is defined by the extent to which you strive against those aims.
translation:
和下层位面之物签订契约

你的契约从众下层位面——诸类邪魔之乡处取得力量。当你选择此子职业时，你可能完成了一次交易——对方可能是一位恶魔领主，诸如狄魔高根，奥喀斯；一位大魔鬼，诸如阿斯蒙蒂斯；亦可能是一位极为强大的深狱炼魔，巴洛炎魔，尤格罗斯魔，甚至是夜鬼婆。无论如何，你的宗主的目标都是邪恶的——邪魔们追求着世间万物的堕落与毁灭，而最终连你本身也无法独善其身。

original:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Fiend Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Fiend Spells
Warlock LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBurningHan]{Burning Hands}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScorchingR]{Scorching Ray}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{Suggestion}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStinkingCl]{Stinking Cloud}
7@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireShield]{Fire Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGeas000000]{Geas}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInsectPlag]{Insect Plague}

Foundry Note

As you level up these spells will be granted to you automatically.
translation:
宗主赐予的魔法令你始终准备了特定的法术；当你达到邪魔法术列表中提及的魔契师等级时，你便始终准备了列出的法术：

邪魔法术
魔契师等级 法术
3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBurningHan]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScorchingR]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]
5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStinkingCl]
7 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireShield]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]
9 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGeas000000]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInsectPlag]

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

original:
Choose one damage type, other than Force, whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest. You have Resistance to that damage type until you choose a different one with this feature.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for each type of damage which will grant you the correct Resistance. Apply and disable the effects as necessary when you change types.
translation:
当你完成一次短休或长休时，选择一种除力场伤害之外的伤害类型。直到你以此特性选择另外一种伤害类型之前，你都拥有对于所选伤害类型的抗性。

Foundry Note

该特性包含针对每种伤害类型的一项主动效果，可赋予您恰当的抗性。在您更换类型时，视情况需要启用和禁用这些效果。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]{False Life} on yourself without expending a spell slot. When you cast the spell with this feature, you don’t roll the die for the Temporary Hit Points; you automatically get the highest number on the die.

Foundry Note

The False Life activity includes the maximum amount of healing.
translation:
先决条件：2 级及以上的魔契师

你可以施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]且无需消耗法术位。当你以此特性施展该法术时，你不需要掷骰以决定临时生命数值；你自动在此骰子上获得最大值。

Foundry Note

虚假生命 行动能提供一次治疗掷骰，其中已包含最大骰数，以及根据你当前的契约魔法环阶，以更高环阶施展时所额外获得的生命值。

original:
A Master of All Arms and Armor

Core Fighter Traits

Primary Ability

Strength or Dexterity

Hit Point Die

D10 per Fighter level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Strength and Constitution

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, Perception, or Survival

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple and Martial weapons

Armor Training

Light, Medium, and Heavy armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A, B, or C: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainMail0]{Chain Mail}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepFlail00000]{Flail}, 8 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Javelins}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDungeoneers]{Dungeoneer's Pack}, and 4 GP; (B) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmStuddedLea]{Studded Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Short­sword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow}, 20 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoArrows0000]{Arrows}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDungeoneers]{Dungeoneer's Pack}, and [[/award 11GP]]; or (C) [[/award 155GP]]

Fighters rule many battlefields. Questing knights, royal champions, elite soldiers, and hardened mercenaries—as Fighters, they all share an unparalleled prowess with weapons and armor. And they are well acquainted with death, both meting it out and defying it.

Fighters master various weapon techniques, and a well-equipped Fighter always has the right tool at hand for any combat situation. Likewise, a Fighter is adept with every form of armor. Beyond that basic degree of familiarity, each Fighter specializes in certain styles of combat. Some concentrate on archery, some on fighting with two weapons at once, and some on augmenting their martial skills with magic. This combination of broad ability and extensive specialization makes Fighters superior combatants.

Becoming a Fighter …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Fighter Traits table.
  • Gain the Fighter's level 1 features, which are listed in the Fighter Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Fighter Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Fighter's level 1 features, which are listed in the Fighter Features table.
translation:
百兵之君，万甲之王 A Master of All Arms and Armor

战士核心特质

关键属性

力量或敏捷

生命骰

每战士等级 D10

豁免熟练

力量与体质

技能熟练

从体操、驯兽、运动、历史、洞悉、威吓、游说、察觉或求生中选择两项

武器熟练

简易武器和军用武器

护甲受训

轻甲、中甲、重甲和盾牌

起始装备

选择 A 、 B 或 C： (A) 链甲、巨剑、连枷、8 支标枪、探索套组和 4 金币 ；(B) 镶钉皮甲、弯刀、短剑、长弓、20 支箭、箭袋、探索套组和 11 GP ；(C) 155 GP

战士往往驰骋于战场。战士可以是探险骑士，皇家斗士，精英士兵或是老练佣兵，他们熟习各种武器与护甲，他们的生活与死亡相伴，既不害怕手上染满鲜血，也不畏惧迎接死亡。
战士精通各种武器技艺，装备精良的战士总能在任何战斗中找到合适的武器。同样，战士对于各种盔甲也驾轻就熟。除掌握基本使用技巧外，每位战士还专精于某种特定的战斗风格。有些专攻箭术，有些专精双持武器战斗，有些则擅长于用魔法增强自己的战斗能力。泛用与专精相结合，让战士在各处都能有卓越的表现。

成为战士……

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“战士核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“战士特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“战士核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰，军用武器熟练项，以及轻甲和盾牌的训练。
  • 获得“战士特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

original:
You have honed your martial prowess and gain a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.sbHImaCB8ZMEHYkb]{Fighting Style feat} of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbfstDefense000]{Defense} is recommended.

Whenever you gain a Fighter level, you can replace the feat you chose with a different Fighting Style feat.

你不断磨练你的武艺。你获得一项你选择的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.sbHImaCB8ZMEHYkb]。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbfstDefense000]。

每当你获得战士等级时，你可以将其改为另一个战斗风格专长。

original: When you take a Bonus Action other than Step of the Wind, you can also use Step of the Wind immediately after that Bonus Action.
translation: 当你以附赠动作执行除疾步如风以外的行为，你可以同时使用疾步如风，作为该附赠动作的一部分。

original:
When you use Flurry of Blows, you can replace each of the Unarmed Strikes with a use of Hand of Healing without expending Focus Points for the healing.

In addition, when you make an Unarmed Strike with Flurry of Blows and deal damage, you can use Hand of Harm with that strike without expending a Focus Point for Hand of Harm. You can still use Hand of Harm only once per turn.

You can use these benefits a total number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking your available uses.
translation:
当你使用疾风连击时，每一次徒手打击都可以替换为使用你的予命之手，且都不需要为治疗额外消耗功力。

此外，当你在疾风连击中发动徒手打击并造成伤害时，你可以无需消耗功力就使用一次夺命之手。不过你仍然只能在每回合中使用一次夺命之手。

你能使用此增益的次数等于你的感知调整值（最少 1 次）。你在完成一次长休后回复所有消耗的次数。

Foundry Note

该特性可用于跟进你的可用使用次数。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter’s Mark} is a d10 rather than a d6.

Foundry Note

You may use this feature in place of the Bonus Mark Damage activity on the Hunter's Mark spell.
translation:
你的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]的额外伤害骰从 d6 变为 d10。

Foundry Note

你可使用该特性替代猎人印记法术中的印记伤害加值行动。

original:
You now regain all your expended uses of Bardic Inspiration when you finish a Short or Long Rest.

In addition, you can expend a spell slot (no action required) to regain one expended use of Bardic Inspiration.

Foundry Note

You must update the Bardic Inspiration feature on your sheet to refresh on Short Rest as it defaults to Long rest.

The Recharge with Spell Slot activity will expend a spell slot and grant another use of Bardic Inspiration.
translation:
现在你可以在完成短休或长休后恢复你已消耗的诗人激励次数。

此外，你可以消耗一个法术位（无需行动）来恢复一次已消耗的吟游诗人激励。

Foundry Note

你必须在角色卡中更新吟游诗人激励特性，使其在短休时恢复，因为默认情况下是长休时恢复。

以法术位充能行动会耗费一个法术位，并赋予一次吟游诗人灵感的使用次数。

key: entries->Font of Inspiration->activities->Recharge with Spell Slot->name

original:
You can tap into the wellspring of magic within yourself. This wellspring is represented by Sorcery Points, which allow you to create a variety of magical effects.

You have 2 Sorcery Points, and you gain more as you reach higher levels, as shown in the Sorcery Points column of the Sorcerer Features table. You can’t have more Sorcery Points than the number shown in the table for your level. You regain all expended Sorcery Points when you finish a Long Rest.

You can use your Sorcery Points to fuel the options below, along with other features, such as Metamagic, that use those points.

Converting Spell Slots to Sorcery Points. You can expend a spell slot to gain a number of Sorcery Points equal to the slot’s level (no action required).

Creating Spell Slots. As a Bonus Action, you can transform unexpended Sorcery Points into one spell slot. The Creating Spell Slots table shows the cost of creating a spell slot of a given level, and it lists the minimum Sorcerer level you must be to create a slot. You can create a spell slot no higher than level 5.

Any spell slot you create with this feature vanishes when you finish a Long Rest.

Creating Spell Slots
Spell Slot LevelSorcery Point CostMin. Sorcerer Level
122
233
355
467
579

Foundry Note

The Regain Spell Slot activity will convert your Sorcery Points into spell slots.

The Regain Sorcery Points activity will convert your chosen spell slot into Sorcery Points.
translation:
你开始运用体内的魔法源泉，从中涌现的魔力体现为你的可用术法点。你可以使用术法点创造各种魔法效应。

你拥有 2 个术法点。此后你每提升一个术士等级，都会获得更多的术法点，详见“术士职业表”中“术法点”一栏。你的术法点永远不能超过表中所列对应你当前等级的数值。而已消耗的术法点则可以通过完成一次长休进行恢复。
你可以使用你的术法点来激活以下选项，其他特性也是如此，比如超魔法需要消耗术法点来使用。

将法术位转换为术法点。 你消耗一枚法术位并获得等于该法术位环阶的术法点。（无需动作）。

创造法术位。 你可以在自己回合内以附赠动作将未使用的术法点转换为法术位。表格“生成法术位”中列出了生成各法术位所需的术法点数，以及所需的最低术士等级。另外，你无法生成高于5环的法术位。

以此方式生成的法术位将在完成一次长休后消散。

生成法术位 Creating Spell Slots
法术位环阶 术法点消耗 最低术士等级
1 2 2
2 3 3
3 5 5
4 6 7
5 7 9

Foundry Note

进行恢复法术位行动时，将把术法点转化为对应环阶的法术位。

进行恢复术法点行动时，可将法术位转化为术法点。

original:
If you use Reckless Attack while your Rage is active, you deal extra damage to the first target you hit on your turn with a Strength-based attack. To determine the extra damage, roll a number of d6s equal to your Rage Damage bonus, and add them together. The damage has the same type as the weapon or Unarmed Strike used for the attack.

Foundry Note

The Damage activity scales automatically as you level up and allows you to select the type of damage to use in the damage roll's dialog box. It will then remember your choice going forward.
translation:
在你的回合内，当你在狂暴激活时使用鲁莽攻击，你基于力量发起的攻击将对首个命中的目标造成额外伤害。掷等同于你狂暴伤害加值数量的 d6，结果即为造成的额外伤害数值。此额外伤害与你所用武器或徒手打击造成的伤害类型相同。

Foundry Note

伤害行动会随着你等级的提升而自动升级，并且能让你在伤害掷骰的对话框中选择所要使用的伤害类型。之后，它会记住你的选择。

original:
While in your Starry Form, you become partially incorporeal, giving you Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the addition of the Resistances. It is not automatically applied when entering your Starry Form though. It can be activated by using this feature and applying it or by turning the Active Effect on in your character sheet's Effects tab.
translation:
当你处于星耀形态时，你的身体部分无实质化，使你获得钝击、穿刺、与挥砍伤害的抗性。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效果，可自动添加抗性。进入星耀形态时其不会自动应用。您可以通过使用此特性并应用它，或者在角色卡的“效果”选项卡中开启主动效应来激活它。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can use a Bonus Action to touch a willing creature and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn. As long as the creature is on the same plane of existence as you, you can take a Bonus Action on subsequent turns to maintain this connection, extending the duration until the end of your next turn. The connection ends if you don’t maintain it in this way.

While perceiving through the other creature’s senses, you benefit from any special senses possessed by that creature, and you can cast spells as if you were in your space or the other creature’s space if the two of you are within 60 feet of each other.
translation:
先决条件：5 级及以上的魔契师

你用附赠动作触碰一个自愿的生物，并与其建立起感官的连接。连接状态持续到你下回合结束时终止。其间，只要你与该生物还处于同一位面中，就可以用附赠动作继续维持连接，使其持续时间延长至你下回合结束时终止。如果你不再使用这种方式延续持续时间，这种连接便会结束。

以所连接生物的感官进行观察时，你将拥有该生物所有的特殊感官收益，且若你们之间距离不超过 60 尺，则你可以如同在该生物的位置上般施展法术。

key: entries->Gaze of Two Minds->activities->Gaze of Two Minds->name

original:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can breathe underwater, and you gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

You can also cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterBreat]{Water Breathing} once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way again when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Gift Water Breathing activity consumes a limited use and includes an Active Effect for tracking the chosen creatures.
translation:
先决条件：5 级及以上的魔契师

你可以在水下呼吸，且你获得等于你步行速度的游泳速度。

此外，你还可以施展一次 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterBreat]且无需消耗法术位。完成一次长休后，你重获以此法施展该法术的能力。

Foundry Note

水下呼吸馈赠 行动会消耗有限的使用次数，且包含一个主动效果，用于跟进选定的生物。

key: entries->Gift of the Depths->activities->Gift Water Breathing->name

original:
Prerequisite: Level 9+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactTome00]{Pact of the Tome} Invocation

A new page appears in your @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.CwWbeQ6XyqFzbMYw]{Book of Shadows} when you conjure it. With your permission, a creature can take an action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one name).

When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, the creature magically drops to 1 Hit Point instead. Once this magic is triggered, no creature can benefit from it until you finish a Long Rest.

As a Magic action, you can erase a name on the page by touching it.

Foundry Note

The Protect activity consumes a use of its activity which refreshes every Long Rest.

The Write Name activity consumes a use of the item which can be used for tracking how many names you've written down.

The Erase Name activity will restore a use of the item and allows you to add another name.
translation:
先决条件：9 级及以上的魔契师，具有 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactTome00]祈唤

一张新的书页出现在你的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.CwWbeQ6XyqFzbMYw]中。在你的允许之下，一个生物可以使用一个动作来将他的名字写在这一页上，这一页能包括的名字数量等于你的魅力调整值（至少为 1）。

当一个名字在这一页上的生物生命值降为 0，但是还没有完全死亡，这个生物的生命值魔法化的变为1点。每当这个魔法效应被触发，没有任何生物可以触发该效应直到你完成一次长休。

你可以使用一个魔法动作，以触摸的形式消除一个在书页上的名字。

Foundry Note

保护 行动会消耗一次行动使用次数，使用次数每次长休时恢复。

写下名字 行动会消耗一次物品使用次数，这能用于跟进已写下多少个名字。

消除名字 行动会恢复物品使用次数，并允许您写下另一个名字。

original: When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright
translation: 当一个名字在这一页上的生物生命值降为 0，但是还没有完全死亡

original:
Draw on Shadow Magic to Fight Your Foes

Gloom Stalkers are at home in the darkest places, wielding magic drawn from the Shadowfell to combat enemies that lurk in darkness.
translation:
利用阴影魔法制敌

幽域追猎者们以至暗之地为家，驾驭着来自堕影冥界的魔法，与潜伏在黑暗中的敌人作战。

When you reach a Ranger level specified in the Gloom Stalker Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.

当你达到幽域追踪者法术表中所示的游侠等级时，你将同时获得其对应的幽域追踪者法术。幽域追踪者法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

original:
You can turn defense into a sudden strike. When you or another creature you can see within 10 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to grant a bonus to the target’s AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier (minimum of +1). If the attack misses, you can make one attack with a weapon against the attacker as part of this Reaction if the attacker is within your weapon’s range.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
你能将防御转化为突然的反击。当你或周围 10 尺内你可见的其他生物被一次攻击检定击中时，你可以用反应使受击生物获得AC加值，此举可能使该次攻击失手。此加值等同于你的魅力调整值（至少为 +1）。若该次攻击因此失手，且攻击者在你武器的触及范围内，你可以对那个攻击者进行一次武器攻击（作为此反应的一部分）。

你可以使用此能力的次数等同于你的魅力调整值次（至少 1 次）。当你完成一次长休后，你重获全部已消耗的使用次数。

original: When you or another creature you can see within 10 feet of you is hit by an attack roll
translation: 你或周围 10 尺内你可见的其他生物被一次攻击检定击中时

original:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to goad the target into attacking you. Add the [[/damage @scale.battle-master.superiority.die]]{Superiority Die} to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have Disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes activities for saving against your Strength or Dexterity. You can use the inline damage roll for the extra damage or the Damage activity.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.
translation:
你以攻击检定命中一个生物时，可以消耗一枚卓越骰以尝试挑衅该目标攻击你。所消耗的 [[/damage @scale.battle-master.superiority.die]]{卓越骰} 还会被加到此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。目标必须通过一次感知豁免，豁免失败者对除你之外的生物进行 的攻击检定具有劣势，直到你的下个回合结束。

Foundry Note

该特性包含针对你以攻击检定命中一个生物时，可以消耗一枚卓越骰以尝试挑衅该目标攻击你。所消耗的 [[/damage @scale.battle-master.superiority.die]]{卓越骰} 还会被加到此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。目标必须通过一次感知豁免，豁免失败者对除你之外的生物进行 的攻击检定具有劣势，直到你的下个回合结束。

Foundry Note

该特性包含针对力量或敏捷的豁免行动。你可使用行内伤害掷骰进行额外伤害计算，或选择伤害活动。

进行伤害活动时，可在掷骰对话框中选择应造成的伤害类型。

ong>力量或敏捷的豁免行动。你可使用行内伤害掷骰进行额外伤害计算，或选择伤害活动。

进行伤害活动时，可在掷骰对话框中选择应造成的伤害类型。

original:
Unearth Forbidden Lore of Ineffable Beings

When you choose this subclass, you might bind yourself to an unspeakable being from the Far Realm or an elder god—a being such as Tharizdun, the Chained God; Zargon, the Returner; Hadar, the Dark Hunger; or Great Cthulhu. Or you might invoke several entities without yoking yourself to one. The motives of these beings are incomprehensible, and the Great Old One might be indifferent to your existence. But the secrets you’ve learned nevertheless allow you to draw strange magic from it.
translation:
洞见不可名状的存在与知识

当你选择此子职业时，你可能缚身遥远国度中的不可名状之存在，或是只在传说中出现过的失落古神——诸如潜伏者关纳德；受缚之神萨瑞兹顿；暗夜巨蛇丹德尔；归来者扎贡；伟大克苏鲁；或是其它不可观测的冷漠存在。或者，你靠着骇异的学识祈唤众多此等存在之名，并择取一位，与之结合。此等存在行为无法让凡人理解，这些旧日支配者可能完全没有意识到你的存在，或是对你的存在无动于衷——但你所学的神秘知识让你得以从其身上获得魔法。

original:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Great Old One Spells
Warlock LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW]{Dissonant Whispers}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbPhantasmalFor]{Phantasmal Force}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTashasHide]{Tasha's Hideous Laughter}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHungerofHa]{Hunger of Hadar}
7@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConfusion0]{Confusion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonAber]{Summon Aberration}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplModifyMemo]{Modify Memory}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}

Foundry Note

As you level up these spells will be granted to you automatically.
translation:
宗主赐予的魔法令你始终准备了特定的法术；当你达到旧日支配者法术列表中提及的魔契师等级时，你便始终准备了列出的法术：

旧日支配者法术
魔契师等级 法术
3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbPhantasmalFor]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTashasHide]
5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplClairvoyan]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHungerofHa]
7 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConfusion0]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonAber]
9 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplModifyMeo]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

original:
You can call on even more powerful divine intervention. When you use your Divine Intervention feature, you can choose @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} when you select a spell. If you do so, you can't use Divine Intervention again until you finish [[/r 2d4]] Long Rests.

Foundry Note

This feature will consume a use of your Divine Intervention but it can not automatically recharge the usage after the rolled number of Long Rests.
translation:
你能够呼唤更加强大的神圣干预。当你使用神圣干预特性时，你可以在选择法术时选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000] 如果你这样做，你只有在完成 [[/r 2d4]] 次长休后才能再次使用神圣干预。

Foundry Note

此特性会消耗 1 次神圣干预的使用次数，经过一定次数的长休后，其使用次数不会自动恢复。

original: The visions in your dreams intensify and paint a more accurate picture in your mind of what is to come. Roll three d20s for your Portent feature rather than two.
translation: 你梦中的景象更为清晰精确的在你意识中描绘出了将要发生的一切。你的预兆特性获得三个预知骰，而不再是两个。

original:
You have Resistance to Psychic damage. Moreover, if you start your turn with the Charmed or Frightened condition, you can expend a Psionic Energy Die (no action required) and end every effect on yourself giving you those conditions.

Foundry Note

The Psychic Resistance is granted as you level up.

The End Effects activity can be used to consume a use of your Psionic Energy Die. It does not automatically end the effects though.
translation:
你获得心灵伤害的抗性。此外，如果你在你的回合开始时处于魅惑或者恐慌的状态，你可以消耗一个灵能骰（无需动作）并结束自己身上全部包含这些状态的效应。

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，将会授予心灵抗性。

结束效应 行动可以消耗一个灵能骰的使用次数，弹这并不会自动结束自身上的状态效应。

original:
When you or a creature within 30 feet of you misses with an attack roll, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity and give that roll a +10 bonus, potentially causing it to hit. When you use this feature to benefit another creature's attack roll, you must take a Reaction to do so.

Foundry Note

The Guide Yourself activity doesn't consume a reaction.

The Guide Another Creature activity does.
translation:
当你或者距离你 30 尺内的一个生物在一次攻击检定中失手时，你可以消耗一次引导神力次数来让这次攻击检定获得+ 10 加值，这可能导致该次攻击命中。当你使用此特性让另一个生物的攻击检定获得此增益时，你必须使用你的反应。

Foundry Note

导引自身行动不会消耗反应。

导引其他生物行动会消耗反应。

original: When you miss with an attack roll
translation: 当你攻击检定中失手时

original: When you or a creature within 30 feet of you misses with an attack roll
translation: 距离你 30 尺内的一个生物在一次攻击检定中失手时

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike and deal damage, you can expend 1 Focus Point to deal extra Necrotic damage equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die plus your Wisdom modifier.
translation: 每回合一次，当你用徒手打击命中一个生物并造成伤害时，你可以消耗 1 点功力来额外造成等于一枚你的武艺骰 + 感知调整值的暗蚀伤害。

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike and deal damage
translation: 每回合一次，当你用徒手打击命中一个生物并造成伤害时

original:
As a Magic action, you can expend 1 Focus Point to touch a creature and restore a number of Hit Points equal to a roll of your Martial Arts die plus your Wisdom modifier.

When you use your Flurry of Blows, you can replace one of the Unarmed Strikes with a use of this feature without expending a Focus Point for the healing.

Foundry Note

For the free use when replacing an Unarmed Strike uncheck the Consume Item Use prompt.
translation:
以一个魔法动作，你能消耗1点功力来接触一个生物，恢复目标一枚你的武艺骰 + 感知调整值的生命值。

当你使用疾风连击时，你能将其中一次徒手打击改为使用此特性治疗一个生物，且不需要为治疗额外消耗功力。

Foundry Note

若要在替换徒手打击时免费使用，请取消勾选消耗物品使用次数的提示弹窗。

original:
Your mastery of life energy opens the door to the ultimate mercy. As a Magic action, you can touch the corpse of a creature that died within the past 24 hours and expend 5 Focus Points. The creature then returns to life with a number of Hit Points equal to 4d10 plus your Wisdom modifier. If the creature died with any of the following conditions, the creature revives with the conditions removed: Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, Poisoned, and Stunned.

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a single use per Long Rest and a healing roll.
translation:
你对生命能量的掌握打开了通往命流奥义的大门。以一个魔法动作，你可以消耗 5 点功力，触碰一个死亡不超过 24 小时的生物的尸体。该生物会起死回生，并拥有相当于 4d10 + 你的感知调整值的生命值。如果该生物死前具有以下这些状态，这些状态都会在复活时被移除：目盲、耳聋、麻痹、中毒和震慑。

使用此特性后，你必须完成一次长休才能再次使用。

Foundry Note

该特性包含每次长休一次使用次数，并包含一次治疗检定。

original:
You gain the ability to channel celestial energy to heal wounds. You have a pool of d6s to fuel this healing. The number of dice in the pool equals 1 plus your Warlock level.

As a Bonus Action, you can heal yourself or one creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself, expending dice from the pool. The maximum number of dice you can expend at once equals your Charisma modifier (minimum of one die). Roll the dice you expend, and restore a number of Hit Points equal to the roll’s total. Your pool regains all expended dice when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Heal activity allows you to scale the number of dice expended from your pool and is automatically limited to your Charisma modifier.
translation:
你获得了引导天界能量以治愈伤口的能力。它是一个有着 1 + 你的魔契师等级枚 d6 骰的骰池，用以施展你的治愈能力。

以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗骰池中的任意数量骰子，以此治疗一个你距周围 60 尺以内的生物。每次你能消耗的最大骰子数量等同于你的魅力调整值枚（至少 1 枚）。投掷你消耗的全部骰子，这些骰值相加的总值即为所能恢复的生命值。

当你完成一次长休后，你的骰池将重获所有已消耗的骰子。

Foundry Note

进行治疗行动时，你可动态调整从池中消耗的骰子数量，该数值会自动受限于你的魅力调整值上限。

original:
Your Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind gain the following benefits.

Flurry of Blows. You can expend 1 Focus Point to use Flurry of Blows and make three Unarmed Strikes with it instead of two.

Patient Defense. When you expend a Focus Point to use Patient Defense, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to two rolls of your Martial Arts die.

Step of the Wind. When you expend a Focus Point to use Step of the Wind, you can choose a willing creature within 5 feet of yourself that is Large or smaller. You move the creature with you until the end of your turn. The creature's movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

Foundry Note

The Flurry of Blows activity will expend 1 Focus Point and you can then make three Unarmed Strikes.

The Patient Defense activity will roll the Temporary Hit Points for you.
translation:
你的疾风连击、闪转腾挪和疾步如风将获得以下额外效果。

疾风连击。 你可以消耗 1 点功力并以一个附赠动作发动三次徒手打击，而非两次。

闪转腾挪。 当你消耗 1 点功力使用闪转腾挪时，你掷两枚武艺骰，获得等同于掷骰结果的临时生命值。

疾步如风。 当你消耗 1 点功力使用疾步如风时，你可以选择一名距你5尺内，大型或更小的自愿生物，你带着该生物一起移动直至该回合结束，该生物以此进行的移动不触发借机攻击。

Foundry Note

进行疾风连击行动将消耗 1 点功力，随后你可发动三次徒手打击。

闪转腾挪行动中，系统将为你自动投骰临时生命值。

original: When you expend a Focus Point to use Patient Defense
translation: 当你消耗 1 点功力使用闪转腾挪时

original:
Cost: 2 Sorcery Points

When you cast a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw, you can spend 2 Sorcery Points to give one target of the spell Disadvantage on saves against the spell.
translation:
消耗：2 术法点

当你施展一个强迫生物进行豁免的法术时，你可以消耗 2 术法点来强迫法术影响的某一个生物对此法术的豁免具有劣势。

original: When you cast a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw
translation: 当你施展一个强迫生物进行豁免的法术时

original: The thrill of battle drives you toward victory. During combat, you can give yourself Heroic Inspiration whenever you start your turn without it.
translation: 战斗的艰难只会使你朝胜利更进一步。在战斗中，若你回合开始时没有英雄激励，你可以获得之。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can imbue your Aura of Protection with holy power, granting the benefits below for 10 minutes or until you end them (no action required). Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).

Holy Ward. You have Advantage on any saving throw you are forced to make by a Fiend or an Undead.

Radiant Damage. Whenever an enemy starts its turn in the aura, that creature takes Radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus.

Sunlight. The aura is filled with Bright Light that is sunlight.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking your Holy Nimbus but it does not automate the Advantage on Saving Throws.

The Holy Nimbus activity includes a damage roll.

The Regain Use activity will consume a 5th level spell slot and restore a use of this feature.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以用圣力盈满你的守护灵光，灵光获得下列的增益。持续 10 分钟或直到你将之提前结束（无需动作）。当你使用此特性后，直到你完成一次长休前都不能再次使用。你也可以消耗一个 5 环法术位恢复其使用次数（无需动作）。

至圣守护。 你被邪魔或不死生物迫使进行的豁免检定具有优势

光耀伤害。 每当敌人在灵光范围内开始回合时，该生物受到等同于你的魅力调整值 + 你的熟练加值的光耀伤害。

阳光。 你的灵光内变为明亮光照，视为阳光。

Foundry Note

该特性包含用于跟进至圣光轮状态的主动效应，但不会自动应用豁免骰的优势。

至圣光轮行动中包含一次伤害骰。

进行恢复使用次数行动将消耗一个 5 环法术位，并重置该特性的使用次数。

original:
Protect Nature and People from Destruction

You stalk prey in the wilds and elsewhere, using your abilities as a Hunter to protect nature and people everywhere from forces that would destroy them.
translation:
保护自然与人民免于毁灭

你追逐猎物直到天涯海角，运用你的猎人的本领去保护自然与人民，使其不受灾祸的毁灭。

original: You can call on the forces of nature to reveal certain strengths and weaknesses of your prey. While a creature is marked by your Hunter’s Mark, you know whether that creature has any Immunities, Resistances, or Vulnerabilities, and if the creature has any, you know what they are.
translation: 你可以召唤自然神力来显露猎物的优势和劣势。当一个生物被你的猎人印记所标记时，若该生物具有对特定伤害的免疫，抗性或易伤时，你可全部获悉。

original:
You gain one of the following feature options of your choice. Whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can replace the chosen option with the other one.

Colossus Slayer. Your tenacity can wear down even the most resilient foes. When you hit a creature with a weapon, the weapon deals an extra 1d8 damage to the target if it’s missing any of its Hit Points. You can deal this extra damage only once per turn.

Horde Breaker. Once on each of your turns when you make an attack with a weapon, you can make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is within 5 feet of the original target, that is within the weapon’s range, and that you haven’t attacked this turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Colossus Slayer activity for the additional damage. You can select the correct damage type in the roll dialog.

For the Horde Breaker option simply make another attack.
translation:
你选择获得以下特性之一。每当你完成一次短休或长休，你可以用另一项特性来替换已选的特性。

斩杀者。 你强而有力的攻击可以击倒最强壮的对手。当你用武器攻击命中敌人时，如果该敌人当前生命值低于其上限，则其额外受到 1d8 点伤害。你每回合只能造成一次这种额外伤害。

破阵者。 进行武器攻击时，你可以用该武器对位于目标 5 尺内，且在你武器射程内的另一生物发动一次攻击。你在每个自己的回合里只能造成一次这种额外攻击。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项斩杀者行动，用于造成额外伤害。你可在掷骰对话框中选择正确的伤害类型。

若选择破阵者选项，只需再次发动一次攻击。

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with a weapon
translation: 每回合一次，当你用武器攻击命中一个生物时

original:
Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can try to instantly transport the target through the Lower Planes. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC, or the target disappears and hurtles through a nightmare landscape. The target takes 8d10 Psychic damage if it isn’t a Fiend, and it has the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition until the end of your next turn, when it returns to the space it previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you expend a Pact Magic spell slot (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

This feature includes one limited use.

The Regain Use activity will expend a Pact Magic spell slot and restore a use of this feature.
translation:
每回合一次，当你以攻击检定命中一个生物时，你可以将目标瞬间传送并穿越下层位面。目标必须进行一次对抗你法术豁免DC的魅力豁免，豁免失败则该生物立刻消失并前往如同噩梦一般的风景。若目标并非邪魔，则它会受到 8d10 点心灵伤害。目标还会陷入&Reference[Incapacitated] 状态直到你的下一回合结束，此时目标返回先前所占据的空间、或是最近的未被占据空间。

一旦你使用了此特性，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一次长休或是消耗一枚契约魔法特性的法术位（无需动作）来恢复其使用次数。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一次有限使用次数。

进行恢复使用次数行动将消耗一个契约魔法法术位，并恢复该特性的一次使用次数。

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack roll
translation: 每回合一次，当你以攻击检定命中一个生物时

original:
Choose two Wizard spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Illusion school} (change the Grouping mode to "School" for easier selection), each of which must be no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Illusion school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.
translation:
从法师法术列表中选择两道不高于二环的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{幻术学派} 法术，并将其免费加入你的法术书中。

  此外，每当你在本职业中获得一个新环阶的法术位时，你都能免费将一道法师法术列表中的幻术学派法术加入你的法术书中。你所选的法术都必须是你当前拥有法术位的环阶。

original:
Weave Subtle Spells of Deception

You specialize in magic that dazzles the senses and tricks the mind, and the illusions you craft make the impossible seem real.
translation:
编织精妙的欺瞒法术

你专精于能扰乱感官、迷惑心灵的魔法，而你创造的幻象足够以假乱真。

original: You have learned to weave shadow magic into your illusions to give them a semi-reality. When you cast an Illusion spell with a spell slot, you can choose one inanimate, nonmagical object that is part of the illusion and make that object real. You can do this on your turn as a Bonus Action while the spell is ongoing. The object remains real for 1 minute, during which it can’t deal damage or give any conditions. For example, you can create an illusion of a bridge over a chasm and then make it real and cross it.
translation: 你习得借由将暗影魔法编入你的幻术，从而使其获得半真实效果的秘密。当你用法术位施展一道幻术学派法术时，你能选择一个属于幻象一部分的非活化非魔法物件，并让该物件化作真实。你可以在法术持续过程中在自己的回合以一个附赠动作这样做。该物件将在接下来 1 分钟内保持真实，它在此期间无法造成伤害或赋予任何状态。例如，你可以创造一座横跨峡谷的桥梁幻象，而后将之化作真实，使你的队友能从桥上跨越峡谷。

original:
When a creature hits you with an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to interpose an illusory duplicate of yourself between the attacker and yourself. The attack automatically misses you, then the illusion dissipates.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Short or Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 2+ spell slot (no action required).
translation:
你能创造一个自身的幻象分身以应对危险。当一名生物对你发动的一次攻击检定命中时，你可以使用你的反应在攻击者与你之间插入幻象分身。这次攻击对你自动打失，随后幻象分身消失。

此特性一经使用，直到完成一次短休或长休都不能再次使用。你也能通过消耗一道二环或更高环阶的法术位（无需动作）来重获其使用次数。

original: When a creature hits you with an attack roll
translation: 当一名生物对你发动的一次攻击检定命中时

original:
You gain proficiency in the Insight and Medicine skills and proficiency with the Herbalism Kit.

Foundry Note

These proficiencies are granted automatically as you level up.
translation:
你获得洞悉和医药的熟练，并且熟练于草药工具

Foundry Note

这些熟练项会随等级提升自动获得。

original:
The option you chose for Blessed Strikes grows more powerful.

Divine Strike. The extra damage of your Divine Strike increases to 2d8.

Potent Spellcasting. When you cast a Cleric cantrip and deal damage to a creature with it, you can give vitality to yourself or another creature within 60 feet of yourself, granting a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to twice your Wisdom modifier.

Foundry Note

If you chose Divine Strike the damage is automatically increased. If you chose Potent Spellcasting you can use the Potent Spellcasting activity on this feature.
translation:
你所选择的受祝击变得更加强大。

神圣打击。 神圣打击的额外伤害提升至 2d8。

强力施法。 当你施展一个牧师戏法并对一个生物造成伤害时，你可以为自己或他人带来活力。选择自己或距离你 60 尺内的一个生物，该生物获得等同于你感知调整值 2 倍的临时生命值。

Foundry Note

若选择了神圣打击，其伤害值会自动提升。若选择了强力施法，你就能在该特性上使用强力施法行动。

original: When you cast a Cleric cantrip and deal damage to a creature with it
translation: 当你施展一个牧师戏法并对一个生物造成伤害时

original:
You have honed new ways to attack furiously. The following effects are now among your Brutal Strike options.

Staggering Blow. The target has Disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes, and it can't make Opportunity Attacks until the start of your next turn.

Sundering Blow. Before the start of your next turn, the next attack roll made by another creature against the target gains a +5 bonus to the roll. An attack roll can gain only one Sundering Blow bonus.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for each option which includes an Active Effect for tracking the Staggering and Sundering Blows but does not automate their effects.
translation:
你训练出了更多种残暴的攻击方式。将以下效应加入到你的凶蛮打击选项中：

震撼猛击。 目标的下一次豁免检定具有劣势，并且在你的下个回合开始前无法进行借机攻击。

破势猛击。 直到你的下个回合开始，另一个生物对目标进行的下一次攻击检定将获得 +5 加值。一次攻击检定只能从一次破势猛击中获得加值。

Foundry Note

该特性为每个选项都设定了一个行动，其中包含一个主动效果，用于跟进震撼和破势猛击，但不会自动执行其效果。

original: Hit by a staggering blow, this character has Disadvantage on the next Saving Throw it makes, and it can't make Opportunity Attacks until the start of the attacker's next turn.
translation: 你的下一次豁免检定具有劣势，并且在攻击者的下个回合开始前无法进行借机攻击。

original: Hit by a sundering blow, the next attack roll made by another creature against the target gains a +5 bonus to the roll.
translation: 在遭受破势猛击后，另一个生物对你进行的下一次攻击检定将获得 +5 加值。

original:
The extra damage of your Brutal Strike increases to 2d10. In addition, you can use two different Brutal Strike effects whenever you use your Brutal Strike feature.

Foundry Note

The damage roll in Brutal Strike will automatically scale to use this new value.
translation:
你的残暴打击造成的额外伤害增加至 2d10。此外，当你使用残暴打击特性时，你可以同时应用两种不同的残暴打击效应。

Foundry Note

在残忍打击中的伤害值会自动调整以使用这个新数值。

original:
While in a Wild Shape form, you gain the following benefits.

Lunar Radiance. Each of your attacks in a Wild Shape form can deal its normal damage type or Radiant damage. You make this choice each time you hit with those attacks.

Increased Toughness. You can add your Wisdom modifier to your Constitution saving throws.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the bonus to Constitution saving throws.
translation:
当处于荒野形态时，你获得以下好处：

月耀辉光。你在荒野形态中的每次攻击可以造成正常伤害类型或光耀伤害。每次攻击命中时你都可以选择。

强化韧性。 你可以将你的感知调整值加到你的体质豁免检定结果中。

Foundry Note

这个特性包括一个被动效应，自动对体质豁免检定加值。

original:
Your attack rolls with weapons and Unarmed Strikes can score a Critical Hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically increases the Critical Hit threshold to 19.
translation:
你的武器攻击和徒手打击在掷出19或20时即可造成重击。

Foundry Note

该特性会自动将重击阈值提升至 19 。

original:
You can use up to two Cunning Strike effects when you deal Sneak Attack damage, paying the die cost for each effect.

Foundry Note

After using Cunning Strike effects use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity=Cunning Sneak Attack]]{Cunning Sneak Attack} activity. It will prompt you to select how many dice you expended on effects and deduct them from your Sneak Attack roll automatically.

You can control the damage type in the damage roll dialog box.
translation:
你在造成偷袭伤害时可以一次性选用两种诡诈打击效果，每种效果都需要独立扣除对应的偷袭伤害骰。

Foundry Note

使用诡诈打击效应后，系统将调用[[/item Cunning Strike activity=Cunning Sneak Attack]]{诡诈打击}行动。弹窗将提示你选择在效应中消耗的骰子数量，并自动从你的偷袭骰数中扣除。

你可在伤害骰对话框中选择控制伤害类型。

original:
The illusion of your Invoke Duplicity has grown more powerful in the following ways.

Shared Distraction. When you and your allies make attack rolls against a creature within 5 feet of the illusion, the attack rolls have Advantage.

Healing Illusion. When the illusion ends, you or a creature of your choice within 5 feet of it regains a number of Hit Points equal to your Cleric level.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for the Healing Illusion but it does not automate the advantage against creatures within 5 feet of the illusion.
translation:
你召现分身特性所创造的幻象在以下方面变得更加强力。

共享干扰。当你或你的盟友对幻象 5 尺内的敌人进行攻击时，此次攻击具有优势。

治愈幻象。当幻象消失时，你或你选择的 5 尺内的一名生物恢复等同于你牧师等级的生命值。

Foundry Note

该特性包含治愈幻象行动，但其无法自动为幻象范围 5 尺内的生物带来优势。

original:
The option you chose for Elemental Fury grows more powerful, as detailed below.

Potent Spellcasting. When you cast a Druid cantrip with a range of 10 feet or greater, the spell's range increases by 300 feet.

Primal Strike. The extra damage of your Primal Strike increases to 2d8.

Foundry Note

The damage for Primal Strike is automatically increased at this level. This feature does not automate the range changes.
translation:
你选择的元素之怒特性变得愈发强大：

强力施法。 当你施展一个施法距离为10尺及以上的德鲁伊戏法时，法术施法距离提升到 300 尺。

原力蛮击。 原力蛮击的额外伤害提升到 2d8。

Foundry Note

在这个等级，原力蛮击的伤害会自动提升。但此特性不会自动改变其攻击范围。

original:
You can cast Illusion spells without providing Verbal components, and if an Illusion spell you cast has a range of 10+ feet, the range increases by 60 feet.

You also know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion} cantrip. If you already know it, you learn a different Wizard cantrip of your choice. The cantrip doesn’t count against your number of cantrips known. You can create both a sound and an image with a single casting of Minor Illusion, and you can cast it as a Bonus Action.

Foundry Note

The Minor Illusion cantrip is added to your sheet as you level up.
translation:
你施展幻术学派法术时无需语言成分，且若你施展的幻术学派法术的施法距离大于等于 10 尺，则其施法距离增加 60 尺。

你同时已知 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus] 戏法。如果你已经已知了此戏法，则你习得另一道你选择的法师戏法。此戏法不计入你的已知戏法数。当你施展次级幻术时，可以在一次施法中同时创造出声音和影像，并且你能以一个附赠动作施展它。

Foundry Note

当你升级时，次级幻影戏法会被添加到你的角色卡上。

original:
You can draw on your Shadowfell connection to empower your teleportation. When you use your Shadow Step, you can expend 1 Focus Point to remove the requirement that you must start and end in Dim Light or Darkness for that use of the feature. As part of this Bonus Action, you can make an Unarmed Strike immediately after you teleport.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity which will expend a Focus Point.
translation:
你可以利用与堕影冥界的连结来增强自己的传送能力。当你使用暗影步特性时，你可以消耗 1 点功力，移除开始和结束时对微光光照或黑暗环境的要求。此外，作为这个附赠动作的一部分，你可以立即在传送之后进行一次徒手打击。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项行动，执行该行动会消耗 1 点功力。

original: When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace two of the attacks with a casting of one of your level 1 or level 2 Wizard spells that has a casting time of an action.
translation: 当你在自己回合内执行攻击动作时，你可以施展一道施法时间为动作的一环或二环的法师法术，以此替代两次攻击。

original:
You regain all expended uses of your Warding Flare when you finish a Short or Long Rest.

In addition, whenever you use Warding Flare, you can give the target of the triggering attack a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to 2d6 plus your Wisdom modifier.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically update Warding Flare to refresh on a Short Rest. You must edit the item and set the Recovery period to Short Rest.

The Heal activity includes the Temporary Hit Point healing.
translation:
完成一次短休或长休后都将重新恢复所有守御闪光的使用次数。

此外，每当你使用守御闪光时，你可以对被攻击的目标额外提供临时生命值，数目为 2d6 + 你的感知调整值。

Foundry Note

该特性不会自动更新守御之光，使其在短休时恢复。你必须自行编辑物品，并将恢复周期设为短休。

治疗行动包含临时生命值的恢复。

original:
If you fail a saving throw, you can reroll it with a bonus equal to your Fighter level (currently, [[lookup @classes.fighter.levels]]). You must use the new roll, and you can't use this feature again until you finish a Long Rest.

You can use this feature twice before a Long Rest starting at level 13 and three times before a Long Rest starting at level 17.

Foundry Note

This feature's maximum usages scale automatically as you level up.
translation:
你可以重掷失败的豁免检定，并加上等同于你战士等级的额外加值。不过你必须采用重掷的结果。你必须完成一次长休才能恢复所有已消耗次数。

当你到达 13 级时，你能够在长休前使用此特性两次，到达 17 级时三次。

Foundry Note

该特性的最大使用次数会随着您的等级提升而自动增加。

original: If your total for a Strength check or Strength saving throw is less than your Strength score, you can use that score in place of the total.
translation: 如果你进行的力量检定或力量豁免检定的总值低于你的力量值，你可以使用你的力量值替代检定总值。

original:
You are expert at the following techniques that aid your infiltrations.

Masterful Mimicry. You can unerringly mimic another person’s speech, handwriting, or both if you have spent at least 1 hour studying them.

Roving Aim. Your Speed isn’t reduced to 0 by using Steady Aim.
translation:
你精通助你潜行之术：

模仿大师。 如果你至少花 1 小时研究某人，那么你可以准确无误的模仿他的口音和笔迹。

游移瞄准。 使用手稳就准时，你的速度不会减少到 0。

original:
An event in your past left an indelible mark on you, infusing you with simmering magic. As a Bonus Action, you can unleash that magic for 1 minute, during which you gain the following benefits:

  • The spell save DC of your Sorcerer spells increases by 1.
  • You have Advantage on the attack rolls of Sorcerer spells you cast.

You can use this feature twice, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will increase your spell save DC. The Advantage on attack rolls is not automated.
translation:
某个奇怪事件在你身上留下了无法磨灭的印记，为你注入了涌动的魔力。以一个附赠动作，你可以解放这股力量，持续一分钟。在此期间你获得以下增益：

  • 你术士法术的法术豁免DC增加 1。
  • 你施放的术士法术攻击检定具有优势。

你可以使用这个特性两次，当你完成一次长休后，你恢复所有已消耗的使用次数。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个主动效应，可提升你的法术豁免DC。但攻击骰的优势需手动应用，未实现自动化。

original:
The spell save DC of your Sorcerer spells increases by 1. (Automated)

You have Advantage on the attack rolls of Sorcerer spells you cast. (Not automated)
translation:
你术士法术的法术豁免DC增加 1。（自动化）

你施放的术士法术攻击检定具有优势。（未自动化）

original:
When an enemy you can see ends its turn within 5 feet of you, you can take a Reaction and expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration to move up to half your Speed (currently [[lookup @attributes.movement.walk]]). Then one ally of your choice within 30 feet of you can also move up to half their Speed using their Reaction.

None of this feature's movement provokes Opportunity Attacks.
translation:
当一个你能看见的敌人在你 5 尺内结束回合时，你可以使用反应来消耗一次吟游诗人激励，移动至多等同于你速度一半的距离（当前 [[lookup @attributes.movement.walk]]）。同时，你可以选择 30 尺内的一名盟友，该盟友也能用反应移动至多等同于其速度一半的距离。

该特性的所有移动均不会引发借机攻击。

original: When an enemy you can see ends it turns within 5 feet o fyou
translation: 当一个你能看见的敌人在你 5 尺内结束回合时

original: Immediately after you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]{Divine Smite}, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity and distribute Temporary Hit Points to creatures of your choice within 30 feet of yourself, which can include you. The total number of Temporary Hit Points equals 2d8 plus your Paladin level, divided among the chosen creatures however you like.
translation: 当你施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]{至圣斩}后，你可以立即消耗一次引导神力的使用次数，并为30尺内由你选择的生物（包括你自己）分配临时生命值。这些生物共获得的临时生命值等于2d8+你的圣武士等级，你可以随意分配这些临时生命值。

original: Immediately after you cast Divine Smite
As part of the Bonus Action you take to enter your Rage, you can move up to half your Speed.
translation: 作为你进入狂暴的附赠动作的一部分，你可以移动至多等同于你速度一半的距离。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can strike terror into others with your menacing presence and primal power. When you do so, each creature of your choice in a 30-foot Emanation originating from you must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 plus your Strength modifier and Proficiency Bonus). On a failed save, a creature has the Frightened condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of the &Reference[Frightened] creature's turns, the creature repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you expend a use of your Rage (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

The Save activity includes an Active Effect which adds the Frightened condition.

The Recharge activity consumes a use of Rage and recharges your use of Intimidating Presence.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以用你那令人魂消胆丧的面相，在原初之力的辅助下将恐惧打入他者内心。当你如此做时，每个位于以你为源点的 30 尺光环区域内的你所选择的生物必须进行一次感知豁免（DC等于 8 ＋ 你的力量调整值＋你的熟练加值）。豁免失败的生物陷入恐慌状态，持续 1 分钟。陷入&Reference[Frightened apply=false] 的生物在其的每个回合结束时，可以重新进行该豁免，成功则其身上的恐慌状态提前结束。

一旦你使用了该特性，直到你完成一次长休时，都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗一次狂暴次数（无需动作）来恢复该特性的使用次数。

Foundry Note

豁免行动包含一种主动效果，该效果会附加恐慌状态。

充能行动会消耗一次狂暴使用次数，并恢复威慑之姿的使用次数。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactChain0]{Pact of the Chain} Invocation

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, you infuse the summoned familiar with a measure of your eldritch power, granting the creature the following benefits.

Aerial or Aquatic. The familiar gains either a Fly Speed or a Swim Speed (your choice) of 40 feet.

Quick Attack. As a Bonus Action, you can command the familiar to take the Attack action.

Necrotic or Radiant Damage. Whenever the familiar deals Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage, you can make it deal Necrotic or Radiant damage instead.

Your Save DC. If the familiar forces a creature to make a saving throw, it uses your spell save DC.

Resistance. When the familiar takes damage, you can take a Reaction to grant it Resistance against that damage.

Foundry Note

The Find Familiar with Flight and with Swimming activities both allow you to summon a familiar with the relevant movement bonus. Both activities consume a Pact Magic spell slot.

The Invest with Resistance activity includes an Active Effect for resisting each type of damage which can be applied to get the relevant resistance. Be sure you disable/delete the previous Active Effect in the "Effects" tab of your sheet when you change Resistances.

The familiar automatically uses your Save DC.
translation:
先决条件：5级以上魔契师，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactChain0]{链之魔契}祈唤

当你施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{寻获魔宠}时，你将一定程度的魔能力量灌注给被召唤的魔宠，给予该生物以下增益：

翔空或潜渊。 该魔宠获得40尺的飞行速度或游泳速度（由你选择）。

迅捷打击。 你可以使用一个附赠动作，指挥你的魔宠执行攻击动作。

光影注能。 当该魔宠造成钝击、穿刺或挥砍伤害时，你可以令其改为造成光耀或暗蚀伤害。

你的豁免DC。 若该魔宠强迫一个生物进行豁免检定，则它使用你的法术豁免DC。

抗性。 当该魔宠受到伤害时，你可以使用反应给予它对此次伤害的抗性。

Foundry Note

具飞行能力的魔宠和具游泳能力的魔宠两种召唤方式均允许你召唤拥有对应移动能力的魔宠。这两种召唤方式均消耗一格契印法术位。

赋予抗性的活动包含一个可激活的效果，使魔宠能够抵抗各种类型的伤害。在更改抗性时，请务必在角色卡的“效果”标签页中禁用或删除之前的激活效果。

该魔宠会自动使用你的法术豁免DC。

key: entries->Investment of the Chain Master->activities->Find Familiar with Flight->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->activities->Find Familiar with Flight->profiles->CR 0 Beast->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->activities->Find Familiar with Swimming->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->activities->Find Familiar with Swimming->profiles->CR 0 Beast->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->activities->Invest with Resistance->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Investment of Flight->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Investment of Swimming->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Acid->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Bludgeoning->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Cold->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Fire->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Force->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Lightning->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Necrotic->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Piercing->name
entries->Investment of the Chain Master->effects->Resist Poison->name

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity to create a perfect visual illusion of yourself in an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet of yourself. The illusion is intangible and doesn't occupy its space. It lasts for 1 minute, but it ends early if you dismiss it (no action required) or have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition. The illusion is animated and mimics your expressions and gestures. While it persists, you gain the following benefits.

Cast Spells. You can cast spells as though you were in the illusion's space, but you must use your own senses.

Distract. When both you and your illusion are within 5 feet of a creature that can see the illusion, you have Advantage on attack rolls against that creature, given how distracting the illusion is to the target.

Move. As a Bonus Action, you can move the illusion up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is within 120 feet of yourself.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一次引导神力次数，选择距你 30 尺内可见且未被占据的一点，创造出一个与你别无二致的幻象。该幻象实际并无形体也并不占据所在空间。幻象将持续一分钟或直到你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态，你也可以提前解消它（无需动作）。幻象将会完全模仿你的表情和姿势。当他存在时，你获得以下增益：

施放法术。你可以如同身处幻象所在的空间一样释放法术，但需要使用自身的感官。

干扰。当你和你的幻象都位于一个可以看见幻象的生物 5 尺范围内，因幻象造成的误导，你在对该生物进行的攻击检定中具有优势。

转移。以一个附赠动作，你可以使幻象移动最多 30 尺至一处你能看见且未被占据的空间，但它必须维持在距离你 120 尺内。

original:
You have honed your ability to resist mind-altering powers. You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intelligence or Charisma saving throws (your choice).

Foundry Note

When you gain this feature during advancement you will be prompted to choose your Saving Throw. You should select Wisdom unless you are already proficient in it.
translation:
你已经磨炼出了抵御精神影响的能力。你获得感知豁免熟练。如果你已经有这项熟练，你可以获得智力或者魅力豁免熟练（由你选择）来代替。

Foundry Note

当你在升级过程中获得此特性时，系统会提示你选择豁免检定。除非你已经熟练感知豁免，否则应选择感知。

original:
You can add half your Proficiency Bonus (round down) to any ability check you make that uses a skill proficiency you lack and that doesn't otherwise use your Proficiency Bonus.

For example, if you make a Strength (Athletics) check and lack Athletics proficiency, you can add half your Proficiency Bonus to the check.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will automatically grant you half proficiency for all skills which you aren't currently proficient in.
translation:
在你进行属性检定时，如果检定适用一项你缺少的技能熟练项，则你可以将自身熟练加值的一半（向下取整）加入到检定结果中。

例如，当你进行力量（运动）检定但没有运动熟练项时，你仍可以将熟练加值的一半加入检定中。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个被动效应，它会自动为所有未熟练技能提供一半的熟练加值。

key: entries->Jack of All Trades->effects->Jack of All Trades->name

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can discern certain strengths and weaknesses of a creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself; you know whether that creature has any Immunities, Resistances, or Vulnerabilities, and if the creature has any, you know what they are.

Once you use this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore a use of the feature by expending one Superiority Die (no action required).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for discerning the strengths and weaknesses and a recharge activity for restoring a use of this feature.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以分析 30 尺内一个生物的优劣之处。你可以得知该生物所拥有的伤害免疫、伤害抗性或易伤。

每当你使用此特性后，直到你完成一次长休前不能再次使用。你也可以通过消耗一枚卓越骰来重新获得该特性的使用次数（无需动作）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项行动，用于识别优势和劣势，还有一项恢复行动，用于恢复该特性的使用次数。

key: entries->Know Your Enemy->activities->Discern Strengths and Weaknesses->name
entries->Know Your Enemy->activities->Recharge with Superiority Die->name

original:
As a Magic action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape and choose a point within 60 feet of yourself. Vitality-giving flowers and life-draining thorns appear for a moment in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. Each creature of your choice in the Sphere must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC, taking 2d6 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. One creature of your choice in that area regains [[/healing @scale.land.lands-aid]]{[[lookup @scale.land.lands-aid]] Hit Points}.

The damage and healing increase by 1d6 when you reach Druid levels 10 (3d6) and 14 (4d6).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for the saving throw and the healing.

The healing/damage values automatically scale as you level up.
translation:
以一个魔法动作，你可以消耗一次荒野变形使用次数并且选择 60 尺内的一点。给予活力的繁花和吸取生命的荆刺在以那一点为源点的 10 尺半径球状范围同时生出。在该区域内每个你所选择的生物必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败时生物受到 2d6 暗蚀伤害，豁免成功时受到 半数伤害。此外，一个区域内你所选择的生物恢复 @scale.land.lands-aid 生命值。

当你达到特定的德鲁伊等级时，伤害和治疗量会提升 1d6 : 10 级（3d6）和 14 级（4d6）。

Foundry Note

此特性包含豁免行动和治疗行动。

治疗/伤害值会随着你的等级提升而自动增加。

original:
Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you finish a Long Rest. With that pool, you can restore a total number of Hit Points equal to five times your Paladin level.

As a Bonus Action, you can touch a creature (which could be yourself) and draw power from the pool of healing to restore a number of Hit Points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in the pool.

You can also expend 5 Hit Points from the pool of healing power to remove the Poisoned condition from the creature; those points don’t also restore Hit Points to the creature.

Foundry Note

The Heal activity allows you to select the number of Hit Points you would like to restore and reduces your Lay on Hands pool by that amount.

The Remove Poison activity reduces your pool by 5 but does not automatically remove the Poisoned condition.
translation:
你的触碰溢满祝福，可以医治伤口。你获得一个治疗能量池，其内的治疗能量在每次完成长休后自动补满。治疗能量池储备的可恢复生命值总值等于你的圣武士职业等级 × 5。

你可以用一个附赠动作触碰一个生物（可以是你自己），并抽取治疗能量池中的能量恢复该生物的生命值，其恢复量最多等于你的治疗能量池中剩余的治疗量。

此外，你也可以使用来自治疗能量池的 5 点治疗量祛除该生物的中毒状态。不过这些治疗量不会恢复该生物的生命值。

Foundry Note

治疗行动允许你选择需要恢复的生命值点数，并会使你的圣疗池减少相应数值。

移除中毒 行动会使你的圣疗池减少 点，但不会自动移除中毒状态。

original:
When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw and only half damage if you fail. If any creatures within 5 feet of you are making the same Dexterity saving throw, you can share this benefit with them for that save.

You can't use this feature if you have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition.
translation:
当你受到一个允许你进行敏捷豁免来只承受一半伤害的效应影响时，你在豁免成功时不受伤害，豁免失败时只承受一半伤害。若位于你 5 尺内的其他生物同样需要进行这次敏捷豁免，你可以令他们也享受到此特性的增益。

你无法在 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态下使用该特性。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You have received knowledge from an elder entity of the multiverse, allowing you to gain one @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.otAeQs0TLHYIBNuj]{Origin feat} of your choice.

Repeatable. You can gain this invocation more than once. Each time you do so, choose a different Origin feat.
translation:
先决条件：2 级及以上的魔契师

你从多元宇宙的一位远古存在那里获得了知识，使你可以获得一项自选的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.otAeQs0TLHYIBNuj]（见第 5 章）。

可复选。你可以多次获得此祈唤。每次需选择不同的起源专长。

original:
Soothe the Hurts of the World

The Life Domain focuses on the positive energy that helps sustain all life in the multiverse. Clerics who tap into this domain are masters of healing, using that life force to cure many hurts.

Existence itself relies on the positive energy associated with this domain, so a Cleric of almost any religious tradition might choose it. This domain is particularly associated with agricultural deities, gods of healing or endurance, and gods of home and community. Religious orders of healing also seek the magic of this domain.
translation:
抚慰世界，疗愈伤痛

生命领域专注于帮助维持多元宇宙中所有生命的 正能量。选择这一领域的牧师都是疗愈上的专家，知晓如何使用生命力治愈各种伤痛。

存在本身就依赖于与此领域相关的正能量，因此几乎所有宗教传统的牧师都可能选择此领域。该领域尤其与农业之神、医疗之神或忍耐之神以及家庭和社会之神有关。治那些投身于治愈他人的教团也十分重视这一领域的魔法。

original:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Life Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

original:
Prerequisite: Level 9+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]{Pact of the Blade} Invocation

Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon, you can deal an extra 1d6 Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage (your choice) to the creature, and you can expend one of your Hit Point Dice to roll it and regain a number of Hit Points equal to the roll plus your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 Hit Point).

Foundry Note

The Damage activity allows you to choose the type of damage in the roll's dialog. It will remember your choice going forward.

The Heal (Largest Hit Die) and Smallest Hit Die activities expends the relevant Hit Die and provides a healing roll with your Constitution modifier included. Which you choose only matters if you are multi-classed with multiple hit die types.
translation:
先决条件 ：9 级及以上的魔契师，具有 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0] 祈唤

每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时，额外造成1d6 暗蚀、心灵或光耀伤害（由你选择），且你可以消耗你的一个生命骰并掷出，恢复总量为掷骰结果加上你体质调整值的生命值（至少为1点生命值）。

Foundry Note

伤害行动可以在掷骰对话框中选择伤害的类型。它会记住你的选择，以便日后使用。

治疗（最大生命骰） 和 治疗（最小生命骰）两项行动会消耗相应生命骰，并以包含体质调整值的方式进行治疗掷骰。只有在兼职且拥有多种生命骰类型时，你的选择才会产生影响。

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon
translation: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon
translation: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon
translation: 每回合一次，当你使用契约武器命中某个生物时

original:
Bring Light to Banish Darkness

The Light Domain emphasizes the divine power to bring about blazing fire and revelation. Clerics who wield this power are enlightened souls infused with radiance and the power of their deities' discerning vision, charged with chasing away lies and burning away darkness.

The Light Domain is associated with gods of truth, vigilance, beauty, insight, and renewal. Some of these gods are identified with the sun or as charioteers who guide the sun across the sky. Others are sentinels who pierce deception. Some are deities of beauty and artistry who teach that art is a vehicle for the soul's improvement.
translation:
携光而来，逐尽黑暗

光明领域致力于以神圣的力量带来烈焰与启示。踏入这一领域的牧师，其灵魂被注入了来自神明的光辉与洞察力，他们肩负驱散虚伪与燃烧黑暗的使命。

光明领域与掌管真理，警觉，美丽，洞察与革新的神明相关联。其通常的象征为太阳。某些这类的神会被描绘为太阳本身，或是驾着战车引领太阳划过天际的存在。还有一些则是不懈的哨兵之眼，时刻洞穿每一片阴影与诡计。而其中某些美与才艺的教义还会诠释艺术即灵魂晋升容器的理念。

original:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Light Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Light Domain Spells
Cleric LevelPrepared Spells

光明领域与掌管真理，警觉，美丽，洞察与革新的神明相关联。其通常的象征为太阳。某些这类的神会被描绘为太阳本身，或是驾着战车引领太阳划过天际的存在。还有一些则是不懈的哨兵之眼，时刻洞穿每一片阴影与诡计。而其中某些美与才艺的教义还会诠释艺术即灵魂晋升容器的理念。
