随着等级提升，这些法术会自动授予。

original:
You can empower yourself with the legends—whether true or exaggerated—of your great deeds. As a Bonus Action, you gain the benefits below for 10 minutes. Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).

Charismatic. You are blessed with an otherworldly presence and have Advantage on all Charisma checks.

Saving Throw Reroll. If you fail a saving throw, you can take a Reaction to reroll it. You must use this new roll.

Unerring Strike. Once on each of your turns when you make an attack roll with a weapon and miss, you can cause that attack to hit instead.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking but the above benefits are not automated.

The Reroll Saving Throw activity is just for tracking Reaction use.

The Restore Use activity can be used to consume a 5th level slot and restore a use of this feature.
translation:
过往传说能激励你的身心，为你所用，不论那传说是确有其事，还是夸大其词。以一个附赠动作，你获得以下增益，持续 10 分钟，你必须完成一次长休才能再次使用该特性。或者消耗一个环法术位（无需动作）来重新使用他。

超凡魅力。一个超凡脱俗的存在赐福于你，你在与魅力相关的全部属性检定上获得优势。

重掷豁免检定。当你进行一次豁免检定并失败时，你可以用你的反应重骰之。你必须使用重骰之后的结果。

必中打击。每个你自己的回合一次，当你发动武器攻击但失手，你可以使其改为击中。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效应，可用于追踪，但上述增益未实现自动。

重掷豁免检定 行动仅用于跟进反应的使用情况。

恢复使用次数/strong> 行动可用来耗费一个五环法术位，并恢复此特性的一次使用次数。

original:
The power of the moon suffuses you, granting you the following benefits.

Improved Lunar Radiance. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 2d10 Radiant damage to a target you hit with a Wild Shape form's attack.

Shared Moonlight. Whenever you use Moonlight Step, you can also teleport one willing creature. That creature must be within 10 feet of you, and you teleport it to an unoccupied space you can see within 10 feet of your destination space.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for dealing the Radiant damage.
translation:
月之力量充盈着你的身体，让你获得以下增益：

月耀炽光。 一回合一次，你可以对一次荒野形态下的攻击命中的目标额外造成 2d10 光耀伤害。

月辉同行。 当你使用月光飞步时，你还能传送另一个自愿的生物。该生物必须在你的 10 尺内，并且你将它传 送到你出现点的 10 尺内的一个你能看见的未被占据空间中。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项能造成光耀伤害的行动。

original: Once per turn when you hit a target with a Wild Shape form's attack
translation: 每回合一次，以荒野形态的攻击命中目标时

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can expend one Superiority Die and take the Dash action. If you move at least 5 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack as part of the Attack action on this turn, you can add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

Foundry Note

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一枚卓越骰并执行疾走动作。若你在本回合中直线移动至少 5 尺后立即以攻击动作中的一次近战攻击命中，你可以将消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。

Foundry Note

伤害行动能让您在掷骰对话框中选择其应造成伤害的类型。

original: When you cast Mage Hand, you can cast it as a Bonus Action, and you can make the spectral hand Invisible. You can control the hand as a Bonus Action, and through it, you can make [[/skill slt]] checks.
translation: 你能以一个附赠动作施放法师之手法术，并且你可以使它隐形。你能以一个附赠动作控制法师之手，并且你可以通过法师之手来进行[[/skill slt]] 属性检定。

original: If you have the &Reference[Invisible] condition when you cast a spell on a creature, it has Disadvantage on any saving throw it makes against the spell on the same turn.
translation: 如果你处于 &Reference[Invisible] 状态对某个生物施法，则该生物在本回合里对抗该法术所进行的豁免检定具有劣势。

original:
You can perform an esoteric rite for 1 minute. At the end of it, you regain expended Pact Magic spell slots but no more than a number equal to half your maximum (round up). Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes one free use and will restore the correct number of Pact Magic spell slots.
translation:
你可以举行一道耗时 1 分钟的秘传仪式，并在仪式结束后恢复一半的已消耗的魔契师法术位（向上取整）。一旦你使用此特性，你都不能再这么做，直到你完成了一次长休。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一次免费使用，并将恢复正确的契约魔法法术位数量。

original:
You learn two spells of your choice. These spells can come from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]{Druid}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Wizard} spell list or any combination thereof. A spell you choose must be a cantrip or a spell for which you have spell slots, as shown in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBard000000000.JournalEntryPage.V8pqIWlaL9GhY61t#equipment]{Bard Features} table.

You always have the chosen spells prepared, and whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace one of the spells with another spell that meets these requirements.
translation:
你学会了两个自选法术。这些法术可以属于 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz] 也可以分属其中不同的法术列表。不论如何，你所选的法术必须是戏法或者是你已有法术位的法术，如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBard000000000.JournalEntryPage.V8pqIWlaL9GhY61t#equipment] 表所示。

所选法术总会在你的准备列表中，并且每当你获得一个吟游诗人等级时，你可以将其中的一个法术替换为另一个符合条件的法术。

original: You've learned secrets from various magical traditions. Whenever you reach a Bard level (including this level) and the Prepared Spells number in the Bard Features table increases, you can choose any of your new prepared spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]{Bard}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]{Druid}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Wizard} spell lists, and the chosen spells count as Bard spells for you. In addition, whenever you replace a spell prepared for this class, you can replace it with a spell from those lists.
translation: 你从各种魔法典籍中了解了大量的秘法知识。当你获得吟游诗人等级（包括得到本特性的等级）且“吟游诗人特性”表中准备法术数量上升时，你可以从 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz] 中选择法术来添加进准备列表。这些法术对你而言都视作吟游诗人法术。此外，当你需要替换准备法术列表时，你也可以从上述各个职业的法术列表中选择。

original: When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to maneuver one of your comrades into another position. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll, and choose a willing creature who can see or hear you. That creature can use its Reaction to move up to half its Speed without provoking an Opportunity Attack from the target of your attack.
translation: 你以攻击检定 命中一个生物时，可以消耗 1 枚卓越骰以让战友移动到更有利的位置。将所消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中，并指定一个能看见你或听到你声音的自愿生物。该生物可以用其反应移动至多等于其速度一半的距离。本次移动不会引发本次所攻击目标的借机攻击。

original: When you hit a creature with an attack roll
translation: 你以攻击检定命中一个生物时

original:
You know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplElementali]{Elementalism} spell. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

Foundry Note

When you reach this level the Elementalism spell will be added to your sheet with Wisdom as your spellcasting ability.
translation:
你已知法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplElementali] 。感知是你的施法属性。

Foundry Note

当你达到该等级时，「四象法门法术将被添加到你的角色卡上，且施法属性为感知。

original: You can weave fey magic into a song or dance to fill others with vigor. As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of Bardic Inspiration, rolling a Bardic Inspiration die. When you do so, choose a number of other creatures within 60 feet of yourself, up to a number equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature, currently [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]). Each of those creatures gains a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to two times the number rolled on the Bardic Inspiration die, and then each can use its Reaction to move up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
translation: 你用编织入妖精魔法的歌曲或舞蹈来激发他人的活力。以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一次吟游诗人激励，并掷出你的诗人激励骰。此时，选择你周围 60 尺内的一定数量的其他生物，其数量至多等同于你的魅力调整值（最少 1 个）。每个所选生物都会获得等同于你诗人激励骰结果两倍的临时生命值。而当一个生物获得这些临时生命值时，它可以用其反应移动至多等同于其速度的距离，此次移动不会引发借机攻击。

original:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command} spell prepared.

As a Bonus Action, you cast Command without expending a spell slot, and you take on an unearthly appearance for 1 minute or until your Concentration ends. During this time, you can cast Command as a Bonus Action without expending a spell slot.

Any creature &Reference[Charmed] by you automatically fails its saving throw against the Command you cast with this feature.

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 3+ spell slot (no action required).

Foundry Note

The Restore with Spell Slot activity grants an additional use of this feature.

The spells are automatically added to your sheet as Always Prepared.
translation:
你始终准备了法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{命令术}。

以一个附赠动作，你施展 命令术 且无需消耗法术位，并在 1 分钟内获得超凡的美貌，或直到你的专注结束。在此期间，你可以以一个附赠动作施展 命令术，且无需消耗法术位。

任何被你 &Reference[Charmed] 的生物在对抗你用该特性施展的 命令术 时，其将在豁免检定中自动失败。

一旦使用该特性，直到你完成一次长休前将无法再次使用。你也可以消耗一个 3+ 环的法术位（无需动作）来重获该特性的使用次数。

Foundry Note

以法术位恢复行动能赋予此特性额外一次使用次数。

始终准备的法术会自动添加到你的角色卡中。

key: entries->Mantle of Majesty->activities->Restore with Spell Slot->name

original:
Your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use your Unarmed Strike and Monk weapons, which are the following:

  • Simple Melee weapons
  • Martial Melee weapons that have the Light property

You gain the following benefits while you are unarmed or wielding only Monk weapons and you aren't wearing armor or wielding a Shield.

Bonus Unarmed Strike. You can make an Unarmed Strike as a Bonus Action.

Martial Arts Die. You can roll 1d6 in place of the normal damage of your Unarmed Strike or Monk weapons. This die changes as you gain Monk levels, as shown in the Martial Arts column of the Monk Features table.

Current Martial Arts Die: [[lookup @scale.monk.die]]

Dexterous Attacks.You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier for the attack and damage rolls of your Unarmed Strikes and Monk weapons. In addition, when you use the Grapple or Shove option of your Unarmed Strike, you can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier to determine the save DC.

Foundry Note

This feature includes activities for enchanting a weapon which adds a Monk Attack activity to it that integrates the changes mentioned above.
translation:
你的武术训练让你精通使用徒手打击和武僧武器， 包括以下类型：

  • 简易近战武器
  • 具有轻型属性的军用近战武器

当你徒手或仅使用武僧武器，并且未着装护甲或持盾时，你会获得以下增益：

额外徒手打击。你能以附赠动作发动一次徒手打击。

武艺骰。 可以选择用 d6 骰代替原本的伤害掷骰。该骰子将随武僧职业等级的提升而增大，具体数据见武僧特性表中“武艺”一栏。

敏捷攻击。 可以用敏捷值代替力量值进行攻击检定和伤害掷骰。此外，当你使用徒手打击来进行推撞或擒抱时，你也可以用敏捷调整值代替力量调整值来计算豁免难度。

original:
You gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Medium armor and Shields.

In addition, you can use a Simple or Martial weapon as a Spellcasting Focus to cast spells from your @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]{Bard spell list}.

Foundry Note

You are automatically granted proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Medium armor and shields during advancement.
translation:
你获得军用武器的熟练，且获得中甲和盾牌的护甲训练。

此外，你可以使用简易或军用武器作为施法法器，以此施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]中的法术

Foundry Note

在角色升级时，你将自动获得使用军用武器的熟练和中型护甲和盾牌的受训。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

The Cast activity can be used in-place of Disguise Self and includes an Active Effect for tracking when you are disguised.
translation:
先决条件：2 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]，且无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

施法行动可以用伪装术代替，并且包含一个主动效应，用于跟进易容状态。

original: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.
translation: 如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlterSelf0]{Alter Self} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

This feature includes Alter Self's activities.

The Aquatic Adaptation, Change Appearance, and Natural Weapons activities include Active Effects for tracking your choice and require Concentration.

The Attack activities can be used for your attack/damage rolls when you choose the Natural Weapons option.
translation:
先决条件：5 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlterSelf0]，且无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

此特性包含“变身术”的行动。

水生适应和改变样貌 以及 天生武器 这些行动包含有主动效应，用于跟进你的选择，并且需要专注。

当你选择天生武器选项时，攻击行动可用于你的攻击/伤害掷骰。

original: You can breathe underwater and gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.
translation: 你可以在水下呼吸，并且获得等同于步行速度的游泳速度。

original: When you use your Unarmed Strike to deal damage with that new growth, it deals 1d6 damage of the type in parentheses instead of dealing the normal damage for your Unarmed Strike, and you use your spellcasting ability modifier for the attack and damage rolls rather than using Strength.
translation: 当你使用徒手打击以这些新长的器官造成伤害时，它会造成 1d6 对应类型伤害，而非你通常的徒手打击伤害，并且你使用你的施法关键属性调整值而非力量调整值来作为攻击和伤害的调整值。

original: Whenever you finish a Short Rest, you can study your spellbook and replace one of the level 1+ Wizard spells you have prepared for your Spellcasting feature with another level 1+ spell from the book.
translation: 每当你完成一次短休时，你可以研究你的法术书并且将其中一道你以 施法 特性准备的一环及以上的法术替换为你法术书中的另一道一环及以上的法术。

original:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to frighten the target. Add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition until the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Strength Save activity and a Dexterity Save activity which will consume a use of your Superiority Die.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.
translation:
你以攻击检定命中一个生物时，可消耗一枚卓越骰以尝试恐吓该目标。所消耗的卓越骰还会被加到此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。目标必须通过一次感知豁免，豁免失败则陷入恐慌状态，直到你下个回合结束为止。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个力量对抗豁免行动和一个敏捷对抗豁免行动，二者均会消耗 1 次你的卓越骰使用次数。

伤害行动允许你在掷骰对话框中选择此次攻击应造成的伤害类型。

original:
Because your magic flows from within, you can alter your spells to suit your needs; you gain two Metamagic options of your choice from “Metamagic Options”. You use the chosen options to temporarily modify spells you cast. To use an option, you must spend the number of Sorcery Points that it costs.

You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it unless otherwise noted in one of those options.

Whenever you gain a Sorcerer level, you can replace one of your Metamagic options with one you don’t know. You gain two more options at Sorcerer level 10 and two more at Sorcerer level 17.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted to choose Metamagic options as you level up.
translation:
由于你的魔法直接从你体内流向外界，你可以修改你的法术来适应自己的需要。你从超魔法选项中选择并获得 2 个你所选的超魔法选项。你使用你所选的超魔法来临时改变你施展的法术。你必须消耗等同于其描述中需求的术法点以使用一个超魔法选项。

当你施展一道法术时，你只能在其上应用一次超魔法选项，除非超魔法选项中另有说明。

每当你获得一级术士等级时，你可以将一个超魔法选项更改为另一个超魔法选项。当你达到10级和17级术士等级时，你可以分别再获得2个超魔法选项。

Foundry Note

随着等级的提升，系统会提示你选择超魔法选项。

original:
You have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed] and &Reference[Frightened] conditions while your Rage is active. If you're Charmed or Frightened when you enter your Rage, the condition ends on you.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which grants the Charmed and Frightened condition immunity. It is not applied automatically when you begin your Rage though.
translation:
你在狂暴激活时对 &Reference[Charmed] 和 &Reference[Frightened] 状态免疫。如果你狂暴时正处于魅惑或恐慌，则这些状态立刻终止。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一种主动效果，能让你对魅惑和恐慌免疫。但当你开始狂暴时，它并不会自动生效。

original:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step} as a Reaction in response to taking damage.

In addition, the following effects are now among your Steps of the Fey options.

Disappearing Step. You have the &Reference[Invisible] condition until the start of your next turn or until immediately after you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.

Dreadful Step. Creatures within 5 feet of the space you left or the space you appear in (your choice) must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d10 Psychic damage.

Foundry Note

The Disappearing Step activity includes an Active Effect which applies the Invisible condition.
translation:
当你受到伤害时，你可以用反应施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]。

此外，你的妖精步伐获得以下选项。

迷踪步伐。你获得 &Reference[Invisible] ，持续直到你的下一回合开始或当你发动一次攻击检定、造成伤害、或是施展一道法术之后。

惊惧步伐。 位于你传送前或传送后的空间（由你选择）5尺内的生物必须进行一次对抗你法术豁免DC的感知豁免，豁免失败则受到2d10心灵伤害。

Foundry Note

迷踪步伐行动包含一种主动效应，可施加“隐形”状态。

当你升级时，这个法术会自动授予你。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSilentImag]{Silent Image} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

This feature includes Silent Image's activities and can be used in its place.
translation:
先决条件：2 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSilentImag]，且无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

此特性包含 无声幻影 行动，可替代其使用。

original:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step} without expending a spell slot. You can do so a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

In addition, whenever you cast Misty Step, you can bring along one willing creature you can see within 5 feet of yourself. That creature teleports to an unoccupied space of your choice within 5 feet of your destination space.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking your limited uses. Then you can cast the spell normally and uncheck the "Consumption" box.
translation:
你可以免费施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]而不需要消耗法术位，次数等同于你的感知调整值次（至少一次），在完成一次长休后，你重获所有的已消耗的次数。

另外，每当你施展 迷踪步 时，你可以携带一个 5 尺以内你可见的自愿生物与你一同传送。那个生物会被传送到由你选择的，位于你的目标位置周围 5 尺范围内的一处未被占据的空间内。

Foundry Note

此特可用于跟进你的有限使用次数。你可以正常施放法术，并取消勾选“消耗”选项框。

original:
A Martial Artist of Supernatural Focus

Core Monk Traits

Primary Ability

Dexterity and Wisdom

Hit Point Die

D8 per Monk level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Strength and Dexterity

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, or Stealth

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons and Martial weapons that have the Light property

Tool Proficiencies

Choose one type of Artisan's Tools or Musical Instrument

Armor Training

None

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}, 5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, Artisan's Tools or Musical Instrument chosen for the tool proficiency above, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagExplorersPa]{Explorer's Pack}, and [[/award 11GP]]; or (B) [[/award 50GP]]

Monks use rigorous combat training and mental discipline to align themselves with the multiverse and focus their internal reservoirs of power. Different Monks conceptualize this power in various ways: as breath, energy, life force, essence, or self, for example. Whether channeled as a striking display of martial prowess or as a subtler manifestation of defense and speed, this power infuses all that a Monk does.

Monks focus their internal power to create extraordinary, even supernatural, effects. They channel uncanny speed and strength into their attacks, with or without the use of weapons. In a Monk's hands, even the most basic weapons can become sophisticated implements of combat mastery.

Many Monks find that a structured life of ascetic withdrawal helps them cultivate the physical and mental focus they need to harness their power. Other Monks believe that immersing themselves in the vibrant confusion of life helps to fuel their determination and discipline.

Monks generally view adventures as tests of their physical and mental development. They are driven by a desire to accomplish a greater mission than merely slaying monsters and plundering treasure; they strive to turn themselves into living weapons.

Becoming a Monk …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Monk Traits table.
  • Gain the Monk's level 1 features, which are listed in the Monk Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die trait from the Core Monk Traits table.
  • Gain the Monk's level 1 features, which are listed in the Monk Features table.
translation:
超凡脱俗，武定乾坤

武僧核心特质

关键属性

敏捷与感知

生命骰

每武僧等级 D8

豁免熟练

力量与敏捷

技能熟练

从体操、运动、历史、洞察、宗教或隐匿中选择两项

武器熟练

简易武器和具有轻型属性的军用武器

工具熟练

选择一种工匠工具或乐器

护甲受训

无

起始装备

选择 A 或 B：（A）短矛、 5 把匕首、所选择的工匠工具或乐器、探索套组和 11GP；（B）50 GP

靠着严苛的战斗训练和精神修炼，武僧与多元宇宙调谐并知晓如何集中内在的力量。不同的武僧对这股力量有着不同的解读，比如说呼吸、能量、生命力、精华或自相。这股力量在武僧的手中，有时化作迅猛狂暴的武技，有时化作精巧快速的防御与速度。
武僧专注于自己体内的力量来创造各种非凡之事，甚至可以说超脱自然。不论是否手持武器，他们的攻击在如此技艺下兼具惊人的速度与力量。在武僧手中，即使是最基本的武器也能化为神兵利器。

许多武僧认为受持戒律的生活有助于维持身心专注，以此更好驾驭自身的力量。也有其他僧侣认为，沉浸在纷乱的世俗生活中才有助于增强他们的决心和纪律。
武僧通常将冒险视为对身体和精神成长的考验。他们的驱动力不仅仅是战胜怪物和寻获财宝，更是希望将自己磨练成钢筋铁骨。

成为武僧...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“武僧核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“武僧特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“武僧核心特质”表中的生命骰。
  • 获得“武僧特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

original:
Your focus and martial training allow you to harness a well of extraordinary energy within yourself. This energy is represented by Focus Points. Your Monk level determines the number of points you have, as shown in the Focus Points column of the Monk Features table.

You can expend these points to enhance or fuel certain Monk features. You start knowing three such features: Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind, each of which is detailed below.

When you expend a Focus Point, it is unavailable until you finish a Short or Long Rest, at the end of which you regain all your expended points.

Some features that use Focus Points require your target to make a saving throw. The save DC equals 8 plus your Wisdom modifier and Proficiency Bonus.

Flurry of Blows. You can expend 1 Focus Point to make two Unarmed Strikes as a Bonus Action.

Patient Defense. You can take the Disengage action as a Bonus Action. Alternatively, you can expend 1 Focus Point to take both the Disengage and the Dodge actions as a Bonus Action.

Step of the Wind. You can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action. Alternatively, you can expend 1 Focus Point to take both the Disengage and Dash actions as a Bonus Action, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

Foundry Note

The Flurry of Blows activity is a Bonus Action which expends a Focus Point and includes the Attack Roll and Damage for an Unarmored Strike using your Martial Arts Die which automatically scales as you level up.

The Patient Defense Bonus Action activity includes an Active Effect for tracking that you're Disengaged. The Patient Defense (Focus Point) activity expends a Focus Point and includes an Active Effect that adds the Dodging status.

The Step of the Wind Bonus Action activity expends 1 Focus Point and includes an Active Effect for tracking that you're Disengaged.
translation:
通过运转玄功和习练武艺，你便得以掌握自身非凡的内在能量。功力点代表着你所能使用的这份能量。你的武僧等级决定了你拥有多少功力点，具体数据见武僧特性表中的功力点一列。

你可以消耗功力点来增强或启动特定的武僧特性。你一开始掌握三种特性：疾风连击，坚强防御，疾步如风。细节见下。

每当你消耗 1 点功力时，直到你完成一次短休或者长休前其将暂时不可以再被使用。在完成休息时，你将回复所有已消耗的功力点。

你的某些特性会要求你的目标进行豁免以对抗该特性的效果，这些特性的豁免DC为 8 + 你的感知调整值 + 你的熟练加值。

疾风连击。 你可以消耗 1 点功力，以一个附赠动作发动两次徒手打击。

闪转腾挪。 你能以一个附赠动作执行撤离动作。此外，你可以消耗 1 点功力，以一个附赠动作同时执行撤离与回避动作。

疾步如风。 你能以一个附赠动作执行疾走动作。此外，你可以消耗 1 点功力，以一个附赠动作同时执行撤离与疾走 动作，同时使你该回合内的跳跃距离翻倍。

Foundry Note

疾风连击行动属于附赠动作，会消耗 1 点功力，其中包括一次以武艺骰进行的徒手打击的攻击检定和伤害，随着等级提升，其伤害会自动增加。

闪转腾挪行动包含一个主动效应，用于跟进撤离动作。闪转腾挪（功力）行动会消耗 1 点功力，并包含一个主动效应，可添加回避状态。

疾步如风 行动会消耗 1 点功力，并包含一个主动效应，用于跟进撤离动作。

original:
You magically transport yourself, reappearing amid a burst of moonlight. As a Bonus Action, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see, and you have Advantage on the next attack roll you make before the end of this turn.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest. You can also regain uses by expending a level 2+ spell slot for each use you want to restore (no action required).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity with an Active Effect for tracking when you have Advantage but it does not automate the Advantage.

It also includes a Recharge with Spell Slot activity which can be used to convert spell slots into uses of this feature. You can select higher level slots by increasing the scale.
translation:
你魔法性地传送自己，在闪耀的月光之中重新出现。以一个附赠动作，你传送到 30 尺内一处你可见且未被占据的空间，并且直到该回合结束前，你的下一次攻击检定带有优势。

你可以使用此能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值（最少 1 次），长休后回复所有使用次数。你也可以消耗一个二环或以上的法术位来回复一次使用次数（无须动作）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项行动，其附带的被动效应用于跟进你何时拥有优势，但优势未自动化。

以法术位充能行动可用于将法术位转换为该特性的使用次数。您可以通过提升等级来选择更高级别的法术位。

original:
Your patron grants you a magical secret called an arcanum. Choose one level 6 Warlock spell as this arcanum.

You can cast your arcanum spell once without expending a spell slot, and you must finish a Long Rest before you can cast it in this way again.

You gain another Warlock spell of your choice that can be cast in this way when you reach Warlock levels 13 (level 7 spell), 15 (level 8 spell), and 17 (level 9 spell). You regain all uses of your Mystic Arcanum when you finish a Long Rest.

Whenever you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one of your arcanum spells with another Warlock spell of the same level.
translation:
你的宗主赐予了你一项被称为秘法的魔法奥秘。从契术师法术列表中选择一个 6 环法术作为该秘法。

你可以在不消耗法术位的情况下施展一次该秘法，如此之后在完成一次长休前你都不能再次以此施展它。

如契术师特性表所示，在更高的契术师等级，你将获得更多可以通过此法施展的契术师法术：13 级时候获得一个 7 环秘法，15 级时获得一个 8 环秘法，17 级时获得一个 9 环秘法。你在完成一次长休后将恢复所有玄奥秘法的使用次数。

每当你获得契术师等级时，你都可以将一个秘法替换为契术师法术列表中，同环位的另一个法术。

original:
You can cast one of the level 1+ spells that you have prepared from your Circle Spells feature without expending a spell slot, and you must finish a Long Rest before you do so again.

In addition, when you finish a Short Rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level that is equal to or less than half your Druid level (round up, currently [[lookup @classes.druid.levels]]), and none of them can be level 6+. For example, if you're a level 6 Druid, you can recover up to three levels' worth of spell slots. You can recover a level 3 spell slot, a level 2 and a level 1 spell slot, or three level 1 spell slots. Once you recover spell slots with this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Cast Spell activity can be used to track its single free use.

The Recover Spell Slot activity does not automate the restoration of spell slots but can be used for tracking its own single use.
translation:
你可以施展一个你以结社法术特性准备的一环及以上法术，而无须消耗法术位，并且你必须在结束一次长休后才能再次这么做。

此外，当你结束一次短休后，你可以选择恢复消耗的法术位。法术环阶的总和等于你德鲁伊职业等级的一半（向上取整），且不能是六环或更高环阶的法术位。比如说，作为一位 6 级德鲁伊，你可以恢复环阶总和最多为 3 的法术位。你可以恢复一个三环法术位，或者一个二环和一个一环法术位，或者 3 个一环法术位。一旦你以此特性恢复过法术位，直到结束一次长休以前你无法再次这么做。

Foundry Note

施法 行动可用于跟进其单次免费使用。

恢复法术位行动并不能自动恢复法术位，但可用于跟进其自身的一次性使用。

original: When you finish a Short Rest

You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommunewit]{Commune with Nature} spell but only as a Ritual. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

Foundry Note

The spell is granted to you as ritual-only spell and is pre-configured with Wisdom as your spellcasting modifier.
translation:
你可以施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommunewit]{问道自然} 但只能以仪式的方式来施展。感知是你施展这些法术的施法属性。

Foundry Note

该法术仅作为仪式法术授予你，并且已设定以感知值作为施法调整值。

original:
As a Magic action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape and cause spectral trees and vines to appear in a 15-foot Cube on the ground within 120 feet of yourself. They last there for 1 minute or until you have the Incapacitated condition or die. You and your allies have Half Cover while in that area, and your allies gain the current Resistance of your Nature's Ward while there.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the Cube up to 60 feet to ground within 120 feet of yourself.

Foundry Note

This feature includes Active Effects for each Nature's Ward land type and adds the Half Cover status effect which automatically applies the relevant bonuses. Apply the relevant effect to your allies.

These Active Effects are not automatically added/removed to/from Actors in the designated area however.

It also includes an activity which can be used for tracking your Bonus Action usage when moving the spectral trees and vines.
translation:
以一个魔法动作，你可以消耗一次荒野形态次数，在距离你 120 尺内的一处 15 尺立方体内召唤出灵体树木和藤蔓。将持续存在 1 分钟或直到你陷入失能或死亡。你和你的盟友在该区域内视为半身掩护，且位于区域内的盟友会获得你自然守御特性所提供的伤害抗性。

你可以用一个附赠动作，将立方体移动至多 60 尺，但必须距你 120 尺内。

Foundry Note

该特性涵盖了每种“自然守御”地形类型的主动效果，并添加了半身掩护状态效应，该效应会自动授予相关加值。将相关效应施加于您的盟友身上。

但指定区域内的角色的主动效应并不会自动被添加/移除。

该特性包含一项行动，可用于跟进你在移动灵体树木和藤蔓时附赠动作的使用情况。

original:
You invoke spirits of nature to magically hide yourself. As a Bonus Action, you can give yourself the Invisible condition until the end of your next turn.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which applies the Invisible condition.
translation:
你可以暂时地使用自然的力量将你的身形遮蔽。以一个附赠动作，你可以魔法地使自己变得隐形，直到你的下个回合开始。

你可以使用该特性的次数同等于你的感知调整值（至少为 1），完成一次长休后，你重获全部已消耗的使用次数。

Foundry Note

该特性包含施加隐形状态的主动效应。

original:
You are immune to the Poisoned condition, and you have Resistance to a damage type associated with your current land choice in the Circle Spells feature, as shown in the Nature's Ward table.

Nature's Ward
Land TypeResistance
AridFire
PolarCold
TemperateLightning
TropicalPoison

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for the Poison condition immunity and an Active Effect for each land type. You can activate the Active Effect for your chosen land type.
translation:
你免疫中毒状态，并且你具有和你目前在结社法术特性中选择的土地相关的伤害类型的抗性，如自然守御表格所示。

自然守御
地形 抗性
荒漠 火焰
极地 寒冷
温带 光耀
热带 毒素

Foundry Note

该特性包含毒素免疫的被动效应，以及针对每种地形类型的主动效应。您能够激活您所选地形类型的主动效应。

original:
As a Magic action, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity to conjure spectral vines around nearby creatures. Each creature of your choice that you can see within 15 feet of yourself must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the Restrained condition for 1 minute. A Restrained creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which applies the Restrained condition.
translation:
>你可以消耗一次引导神力特性唤起原初之力来诱捕敌人。以一个魔法动作，你可以让特殊的藤蔓生长并缠绕一个距离你 15 尺内，你能看见的生物。该生物必须进行一次力量或敏捷豁免（由其选择），豁免失败者将陷入束缚状态，藤曼持续存在一分钟。此后，每当该生物结束其回合时，都可以再进行一次该豁免。一旦豁免成功，则该生物挣脱束缚，藤蔓也就此消失。

Foundry Note

该特性包含施加束缚状态的主动效应。

original:
Uphold the Ideals of Justice and Order

The Oath of Devotion binds Paladins to the ideals of justice and order. These Paladins meet the archetype of the knight in shining armor. They hold themselves to the highest standards of conduct, and some—for better or worse—hold the rest of the world to the same standards.

Many who swear this oath are devoted to gods of law and good and use their gods’ tenets as the measure of personal devotion. Others hold angels as their ideals and incorporate images of angelic wings into their helmets or coats of arms.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Let your word be your promise.
  • Protect the weak and never fear to act.
  • Let your honorable deeds be an example.
translation:
当仁不让知行正。

圣武士立下奉献之誓，只为维护正义和秩序。他们是身披闪亮的盔甲的正派骑士形象代表，躬行着公正的教条，追寻崇高的目标。
追随该誓言的许多圣武士都献身于守序和善良的神，并将其的信条视作奉献的标准。他们将善良阵营的完美侍从天使视作其典范，并在头盔或盾徽上饰以天使羽翼的形象。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 实事求是，言出必行。
  • 锄强扶弱，临危不惧。
  • 荣誉为典，以身作则。

original:
The magic of your oath ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Paladin level specified in the Oath of Devotion Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Oath of Devotion Spells
Paladin LevelSpells

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.

当你达到奉献之誓法术表中所示的圣武士等级时， 你将同时获得其对应的圣誓法术。圣誓法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

original:
Strive for the Heights of Heroism

Paladins who take the Oath of Glory believe they and their companions are destined to achieve glory through deeds of heroism. They train diligently and encourage their companions, so they’re all ready when destiny calls.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Endeavor to be known by your deeds.
  • Face hardships with courage.
  • Inspire others to strive for glory.
translation:
砥身励行蜚声英

对荣耀宣誓的圣武士坚信他们将与同伴一起达成英勇的伟业，并命中注定以此取得荣耀。他们将刻苦训练，砥砺前行，从而确保当命运决定的时刻到来之际，他们都已有所准备。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 力争上游，行胜于言。
  • 无惧挑战，勇往直前。
  • 振奋人心，力争荣耀。

original:
The magic of your oath ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Paladin level specified in the Oath of Glory Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

original:
Preserve Life and Light in the World

The Oath of the Ancients is as old as the first elves. Paladins who swear this oath cherish the light; they love the beautiful and life-giving things of the world more than any principles of honor, courage, and justice. They often adorn their armor and clothing with images of growing things—leaves, antlers, or flowers—to reflect their commitment to preserving life and light.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Kindle the light of hope.
  • Shelter life.
  • Delight in art and laughter.
translation:
护生驱暗济世界

古贤之誓存在的时间与精灵一族的历史那般古老。立下此誓言的圣武士珍视光明，比起荣耀、勇气和正义的准则，他们更热爱美与生命。他们在盔甲和服饰上饰以树叶、鹿角、花朵等等生机勃勃的纹样，以象征自己立下承诺保护世上的生命与光明。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 救死扶伤，点亮希望。
  • 守护光明，庇护生命。
  • 乐人之乐，善济天下。

original:
The magic of your oath ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Paladin level specified in the Oath of the Ancients Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Oath of the Ancients
Paladin LevelSpells

original:
Punish Evildoers at Any Cost

The Oath of Vengeance is a solemn commitment to punish those who have committed grievously evil acts. When evil armies slaughter helpless villagers, when a tyrant defies the will of the gods, when a thieves’ guild grows too violent, when a dragon rampages through the countryside—at times like these, paladins arise and swear an Oath of Vengeance to set right what has gone wrong.

These paladins share the following tenets:

  • Show the wicked no mercy.
  • Fight injustice and its causes.
  • Aid those harmed by injustice.
translation:
铁面无情伏妖魔

复仇之誓，是立誓惩戒那些严重罪行的庄严承诺。当邪恶势力屠杀无助居民，当暴君背离神的意志，当某个盗贼行会过于强横霸道，当恐怖巨龙横行乡野——每当这种时刻，复仇之誓的圣武士就会出现来拨乱反正。
立下此誓言的圣武士都赞成以下信条：

  • 对恶徒，绝无怜悯。
  • 抗不义，追究到底。
  • 遇不平，拔刀相助。
