original:
Instead of manifesting the Emanation of Wrath of the Sea around yourself, you can manifest it around one willing creature within 60 feet of yourself. That creature gains all the benefits of the Emanation and uses your spell save DC and Wisdom modifier for it.

In addition, you can manifest the Emanation around both the other creature and yourself if you expend two uses of your Wild Shape instead of one when manifesting it.

Foundry Note

You can use this feature in place of Wrath of the Sea and Stormborn. It includes an activity for a single emanation or a double manifestation. It also includes the Active Effect from Stormborn which can be applied to both characters when manifesting a second emanation.
translation:
当你使用海洋之怒时，你可以改为 60 尺内的一名生物获得海洋之怒的所有效果而不是你自己，该生物将会获得海洋之怒的所有增益。海洋之怒的效果将会使用你的法术DC和你的感知调整值。

此外，若你一次性消耗两次荒野形态而非一次，你可以让该生物和自己同时获得海洋之怒的效果。

Foundry Note

您可以用此特性来替代 瀚海之怒和 风暴之子。它包含了一项行动，可为单个光环或双倍显现提供支持。它还包含 风暴之子的主动效果，当显现第二个光环时，可同时应用于两个角色。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

While you’re in an area of &Reference[Dim Light] or &Reference[Darkness], you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on yourself without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

The Cast activity can be used in place of the Invisibility spell and includes an Active Effect that sets the Invisible status effect.
translation:
先决条件：5 级及以上的魔契师

当你身处 &Reference[Dim Light] 或 &Reference[Darkness]时，你可以对自己施放@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]，而无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

施法行动可以代替隐形术，并包含设置隐形状态效应的主动效应。

original: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.
translation: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

original:
Whenever you hit a creature with an attack granted by your Flurry of Blows, you can impose one of the following effects on that target.

Addle. The target can't make Opportunity Attacks until the start of its next turn.

Push. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away from you.

Topple. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the Prone condition.

Foundry Note

The Addle activity includes an Active Effect for tracking the addled target.

The Topple activity includes an Active Effect that applies the Prone status.
translation:
当你用疾风连击特性的攻击击中敌人时，你可以让该目标承受下列效应之一：

截击。 目标直到你的下一回合结束前，无法执行借机攻击。

击退。 目标必须进行一次力量豁免，豁免失败则被往远离你的方向推动至多15尺。

击倒。 目标必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则应击倒地。

Foundry Note

截击行动包含用于跟进受截击目标的主动效应。

击倒行动包含施加倒地状态的主动效应。

original: Whenever you hit a creature with an attack granted by your Flurry of Blows
translation: 当你用疾风连击特性的攻击击中敌人时

original: Whenever you hit a creature with an attack granted by your Flurry of Blows
translation: 当你用疾风连击特性的攻击击中敌人时

original: Whenever you hit a creature with an attack granted by your Flurry of Blows
translation: 当你用疾风连击特性的攻击击中敌人时

original:
Whenever you make a Charisma check, you gain a bonus to the check equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).

You also gain proficiency in one of these skills of your choice: Deception, Performance, or Persuasion.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will automatically add the bonus to your Charisma checks.

You will be prompted to choose your proficiency as you level up.
translation:
每当你进行一次魅力检定时，你都可以在那次检定中获得等同于你的感知调整值的加值（至少 +1）。

另外，你获得下列技能之一的熟练项（由你选择）：欺瞒、表演、或游说。

Foundry Note

该特性包含自动为魅力检定添加加值的主动效应。

随着等级提升，系统会提示你选择熟练项。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplJump000000]{Jump} on yourself without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used in place of the Jump spell and includes an Active Effect for tracking.
translation:
先决条件 ：2 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplJump000000]，且无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

该特性可代替跳跃术，并包含用于跟进的主动效果。

original: Once on each of its turns until the spell ends, that creature can jump up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.
translation: 在法术结束前，每个你的回合内一次，可以消耗 10 尺移动力来跳跃 30 尺。

original:
You can increase the power of your spells. When you cast a Wizard spell with a spell slot of levels 1–5 that deals damage, you can deal maximum damage with that spell on the turn you cast it.

The first time you do so, you suffer no adverse effect. If you use this feature again before you finish a Long Rest, you take 2d12 Necrotic damage for each level of the spell slot immediately after you cast it. This damage ignores Resistance and Immunity.

Each time you use this feature again before finishing a Long Rest, the Necrotic damage per spell level increases by 1d12.

Foundry Note

This feature has Limited Uses to track how many times it has been used to automate the damage.

The First Use activity includes one free activity use and restores all uses of the feature.

The Second+ Use activity consumes a use and increases the damage automatically and should be used for all subsequent uses until you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
你能增强你法术的力量。当你用一个 1 至 5 环的法术位施展一个会造成伤害的法师法术时，你能在施展它的回合中令其造成的伤害取最大值。

你首次这么做时不会承受任何负面效应。但如果你在完成一次长休前再次使用该特性，则你会在施展法术后立即受到每环阶 2d12 点暗蚀伤害。该伤害无视任何对伤害的抗性@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbAppendixCRule.JournalEntryPage.Uk3xhCTvEfx8BN1O] 或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbAppendixCRule.JournalEntryPage.vuK6Tth0DFgU74A6]。

你在完成一次长休前每多使用此特性一次，每环阶造成的伤害就提升 1d12。

Foundry Note

此特性用于跟进自动伤害的有限使用次数。

第一次使用 行动包括 1 次免费行动使用次数，并恢复该特性的所有使用次数。

第二次+使用 行动消耗 1 次使用次数并自动增加伤害，并应用于所有后续使用次数，直到你完成一次长休

original: When you cast a Wizard spell with a spell slot of levels 1-5 that deals damage
translation: 当你用一个 1 至 5 环的法术位施展一个会造成伤害的法师法术时

original: When you cast a Wizard spell with a spell slot of levels 1-5 that deals damage
translation: 当你用一个 1 至 5 环的法术位施展一个会造成伤害的法师法术时

original:
Through occult ceremony, you have formed a pact with a mysterious entity to gain magical powers. The entity is a voice in the shadows—its identity unclear—but its boon to you is concrete: the ability to cast spells. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Warlock spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.sSzagq8GvYXpfmfs]{Warlock spell list}.

Cantrips. You know two Warlock cantrips of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEldritchBl]{Eldritch Blast} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation} are recommended. Whenever you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one of your cantrips from this feature with another Warlock cantrip of your choice.

When you reach Warlock levels 4 and 10, you learn another Warlock cantrip of your choice, as shown in the Cantrips column of the Warlock Features table.

Current Max Cantrips Known: [[lookup @scale.warlock.cantrips-known]]

Spell Slots. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWarlock000000.JournalEntryPage.znue6EaGDDXgeQb0#class-features]{Warlock Features table} shows how many spell slots you have to cast your Warlock spells of levels 1–5. The table also shows the level of those slots, all of which are the same level. You regain all expended Pact Magic spell slots when you finish a Short or Long Rest.

For example, when you’re a level 5 Warlock, you have two level 3 spell slots. To cast the level 1 spell @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWitchBolt0]{Witch Bolt}, you must spend one of those slots, and you cast it as a level 3 spell.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose two level 1 Warlock spells. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHex0000000]{Hex} are recommended.

Current Max Prepared Spells: [[lookup @scale.warlock.max-prepared]]

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Warlock levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Warlock Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Warlock spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the table. The chosen spells must be of a level no higher than what’s shown in the table’s Slot Level column for your level. When you reach level 6, for example, you learn a new Warlock spell, which can be of levels 1–3.

If another Warlock feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don’t count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Warlock spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one spell on your list with another Warlock spell of an eligible level.

Spellcasting Ability. Charisma is the spellcasting ability for your Warlock spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use an Arcane Focus as a Spellcasting Focus for your Warlock spells.
translation:
通过玄妙的仪式，你与一个神秘实体签订了契约，获得了魔法力量。该实体有如阴影中的呢喃，其本体更是尚不可知，但他对你的益处却是肉眼可见的：你可以施展法术了。有关 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]请参见第 7 章。以下信息详细说明了如何将这些规则与契术师法术结合使用。契术师法术即该职业描述后的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.sSzagq8GvYXpfmfs] 中罗列的法术。

戏法。你已知两个由你选择的契术师戏法。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEldritchBl] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]。每当你获得契术师等级时，你可以将一个由该特性获得的戏法替换为另一个由你选择的契术师戏法。

当你达到契术师 4 级和 10 级时，你学习一个新的契术师戏法，正如“契术师特性”表中“戏法”一栏所示。

当前最大已知戏法数： [[lookup @scale.warlock.cantrips-known]]

法术位。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWarlock000000.JournalEntryPage.znue6EaGDDXgeQb0#class-features]{契术师特性表}记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1-5 环的契术师法术。表格中还记录了法术位对应的法术环阶，且所有的法术位都属于同一环阶。当你完成一次短休或长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的契约魔法法术位。

例如，作为一名 5 级契术师，你拥有两枚 3 环法术位。为了施展 1 环法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWitchBolt0]，你必须消耗其中一枚法术位，将该法术作为一道 3 环法术施展。

准备 1+ 环法术。 通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，选择两个 1 环 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHex0000000]。

当前最大准备法术数： [[lookup @scale.warlock.max-prepared]]

高于1级时的准备法术。你能准备的法术其最高环位等同于你能够以此特性施展的最高环法术的环位。起始时，你从魔契师法术列表中选择并准备两个1环法术。推荐选择魅惑人类和巫术箭。

魔契师特性表中准备法术一栏记录了你能准备更多法术时的相应等级。每个新准备的法术都必须在当前等级拥有可用以施展该法术的法术位，具体见表。比如，当你达到第6级时，你可以新准备一个1-3环的魔契师法术。

如果其他魔契师职业特性给予你总是准备了的法术，这些法术不计入你的准备法术数量，但遵循此特性的其他施法规则，且那些法术对你而言是魔契师法术。

改变你的准备法术。 每当你获得一个契术师等级时，你可以将准备列表中的一个法术，替换为另一个符合准备条件的契术师法术。

施法属性。 魅力是你施展契术师法术的施法属性。

施法法器。 你可以使用奥术法器作为契术师法术的施法法器。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can conjure a pact weapon in your hand—a Simple or Martial Melee weapon of your choice with which you bond—or create a bond with a magic weapon you touch; you can’t bond with a magic weapon if someone else is attuned to it or another Warlock is bonded with it. Until the bond ends, you have proficiency with the weapon, and you can use it as a Spellcasting Focus.

Whenever you attack with the bonded weapon, you can use your Charisma modifier for the attack and damage rolls instead of using Strength or Dexterity; and you can cause the weapon to deal Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage or its normal damage type.

Your bond with the weapon ends if you use this feature’s Bonus Action again, if the weapon is more than 5 feet away from you for 1 minute or more, or if you die. A conjured weapon disappears when the bond ends.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你在空中勾勒出秘法印记，在手中咒唤出一把契约武器——一把与你连结了的简易或军用近战武器——或者与一个你所触摸的魔法武器建立连结。你不能与一把已经被其它生物同调或是和另一魔契师建立连结的魔法武器建立连结。直到连结结束，你拥有其熟练项，且你可以将其用作施法的法器。

当你用你连结的武器发动攻击时，你能使用魅力调整值进行攻击检定和伤害投掷，取代使用力量或敏捷，且你可以令该武器造成暗蚀，心灵或光耀伤害，取代原先的伤害类型。

你与武器的连结会在你再次使用此特性的附赠动作时，武器在你 5 尺外 1 分钟或更久或是你死亡时结束。一个被咒唤出的武器会在连结结束时消失。

key: entries->Pact of the Blade->activities->Forge Pact Weapon->name

original:
You learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar} spell and can cast it as a Magic action without expending a spell slot.

When you cast the spell, you choose one of the normal forms for your familiar or one of the following special forms: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobImp0000000]{Imp}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobPseudodrag]{Pseudodragon}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobQuasit0000]{Quasit}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSkeleton00]{Skeleton}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSlaadTadpo]{Slaad Tadpole}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSphinxofWo]{Sphinx of Wonder}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSprite0000]{Sprite}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobVenomousSn]{Venomous Snake}.

Additionally, when you take the Attack action, you can forgo one of your own attacks to allow your familiar to make one attack of its own with its Reaction.

Foundry Note

The Summon Familiar activity includes the normal summoning options and the Summon Familiar (Expanded Options) activity includes the additional options.
translation:
你习得法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]，并可以在不消耗法术位的情况下以魔法动作施展。

施展该法术时，你可以选择召唤一个普通的生物，或是下列特殊生物之一： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobImp0000000]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobPseudodrag]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobQuasit0000]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSkeleton00]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSlaadTadpo]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSphinxofWo]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSprite0000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobVenomousSn]。

此外，当你执行攻击动作时可以放弃所有攻击中的一次攻击，转而让你的魔宠使用其反应发动一次攻击。

Foundry Note

召唤魔宠 行动涵盖了常规的召唤选项，召唤魔宠（扩展选项） 行动则包含了额外的选项。

key: entries->Pact of the Chain->activities->Find Familiar->profiles->CR 0 Beast->name
entries->Pact of the Chain->activities->Find Familiar (Expanded Options)->name

original:
Stitching together strands of shadow, you conjure forth a book in your hand at the end of a Short or Long Rest. This @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkBookOfShad]{Book of Shadows} (you determine its appearance) contains eldritch magic that only you can access, granting you the benefits below. The book disappears if you conjure another book with this feature or if you die.

Cantrips and Rituals. When the book appears, choose three cantrips, and choose two level 1 spells that have the Ritual tag. The spells can be from any class’s spell list, and they must be spells you don’t already have prepared. While the book is on your person, you have the chosen spells prepared, and they function as Warlock spells for you.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use the book as a Spellcasting Focus.
translation:
通过将暗影丝线缝合拼接，一本名为 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbwlkBookOfShad]的魔法书会在你短休或长休之后，唤至你的手中。书中的骇人魔法仅有你可以使用，并给予你以下益处。若你唤出一本新的“影之书”，或你死亡，这本书就会直接消失。

戏法和仪式。 从任意职业法术列表中选择三个戏法和两个带有仪式标签的一环法术，这些法术还需是你未准备的。该魔法书在你身上时，你视作准备了书中所有法术。这些法术将被视为契术师法术。

法器。 你可以使用这本书作为法器。

original:
A Devout Warrior of Sacred Oaths

Core Paladin Traits

Primary Ability

Strength and Charisma

Hit Point Die

D10 per Paladin level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Wisdom and Charisma

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, or Religion

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple and Martial weapons

Armor Training

Light, Medium, and Heavy armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainMail0]{Chain Mail}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongsword0]{Longsword}, 6 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Javelins}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPriestsPack]{Priest’s Pack}, and [[/award 9GP]]; or (B) [[/award 150GP]]

Paladins are united by their oaths to stand against the forces of annihilation and corruption. Whether sworn before a god’s altar, in a sacred glade before nature spirits, or in a moment of desperation and grief with the dead as the only witnesses, a Paladin’s oath is a powerful bond. It is a source of power that turns a devout warrior into a blessed champion.

Paladins train to learn the skills of combat, mastering a variety of weapons and armor. Even so, their martial skills are secondary to the magical power they wield: power to heal the injured, smite their foes, and protect the helpless and those who fight at their side.

Almost by definition, the life of a Paladin is an adventuring life, for every Paladin lives on the front lines of the cosmic struggle against annihilation. Fighters are rare enough among the ranks of a world’s armies, but even fewer people can claim the calling of a Paladin. When they do receive the call, these blessed folk turn from their former occupations and take up arms and magic.

Becoming a Paladin …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Paladin Traits table.
  • Gain the Paladin’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Paladin Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Paladin Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Paladin’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Paladin Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.

Breaking Your Oath

A Paladin tries to hold to the highest standards of conduct, but even the most dedicated are fallible. Sometimes a Paladin transgresses their oath.

A Paladin who has broken a vow typically seeks absolution, spending an all-night vigil as a sign of penitence or undertaking a fast. After a rite of forgiveness, the Paladin starts fresh.

If your Paladin unrepentantly violates their oath, talk to your DM. Your Paladin should probably take a more appropriate subclass or even abandon the class and adopt another one.
translation:
献身发愿的无私勇者

圣武士核心特质

关键属性

力量和魅力

生命骰

每圣武士等级 D10

豁免熟练

感知与魅力

技能熟练

从运动、洞悉、威吓、医药、游说、宗教中选择两项

武器熟练

简易武器和军用武器

护甲受训

轻甲、中甲、重甲和盾牌

起始装备

选择 A 或 B ：(A) 链甲， 盾牌，长剑，6 支标枪， 一个圣徽，一个祭司套组和 9 GP；或（B）150 GP

圣武士们在各自誓言的驱使下团结一致对抗邪恶势力。他们也许是在神坛前由祭司见证宣誓，或在林中圣地向自然精魄许下承诺，又或是面临绝望与灾难却只有死者见证下立约，所有这些圣武士誓言都是极强的契约。而正是誓言的伟力才让一名虔诚的战士化作身负祝福的勇者。

圣武士经年累月苦练战技，并精通各种武器与护甲。即便如此，其武力的重要性也仅次于其行使的魔力。他们以之治疗伤患，斩杀妄邪，守护清白者和所有为公义而战的同伴。

圣武士的存在本身即决定了其为冒险而生，而这种生活只会一直持续到其伤重到无法继续，否则他们总是会站在宇宙善恶大战的最前线，与邪恶殊死搏斗。在俗世中，真正受到感召成为圣武士的人比民兵团或正规军中的真正战士罕有得多。而这些勇士们受到感召时，都会义无反顾地放弃所拥有的身份地位，义无反顾的加入对抗邪恶的战斗中。

成为圣武士...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“圣武士核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“圣武士特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“圣武士核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰，军用武器熟练项，以及轻甲、中甲和盾牌训练。
  • 获得“圣武士特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章的兼职规则来确定可用的法术位。

original:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]{Divine Smite} spell prepared. In addition, you can cast it without expending a spell slot, but you must finish a Long Rest before you can cast it in this way again.

Foundry Note

When you reach this level the Divine Smite spell is added to your spells as Always Prepared and with a free use.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]法术总会在你的准备法术列表中。你可以不消耗法术位的情况下施展一次，完成一次长休后，你重获所有已消耗的使用次数。

Foundry Note

达到该等级后，至圣斩法术将作为始终准备法术加入你的法术列表并附带一次免费使用次数。

original:
When another creature damages you with a melee attack roll, you can take a Reaction and expend one Superiority Die to reduce the damage by the number you roll on your Superiority Die plus your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice).

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Healing Reaction activity which can be used to reduce the damage.
translation:
其他生物以一次近战攻击检定对你造成伤害时，你可以执行反应消耗一枚卓越骰以减少伤害。减少的数值为卓越骰骰值＋你的力量或敏捷调整值（由你选择）。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个反应治疗行动，可用于减轻伤害。

original: When another creature damages you with a melee attack roll
translation: 其他生物以一次近战攻击检定对你造成伤害时

original:
Channel Rage into Violent Fury

Barbarians who walk the Path of the Berserker direct their Rage primarily toward violence. Their path is one of untrammeled fury, and they thrill in the chaos of battle as they allow their Rage to seize and empower them.
translation:
以心中汹涌澎湃的怒火，步入狂暴。

踏上这条道路的野蛮人认为狂暴便是为了暴力。狂战士之道追求无拘的狂怒。因狂暴与怒火加持，他们在战斗的混沌快感中兴奋，舍生忘死的投入厮杀。

original:
Walk in Community with the Animal World

Barbarians who follow the Path of the Wild Heart view themselves as kin to animals. These Barbarians learn magical means to communicate with animals, and their Rage heightens their connection to animals as it fills them with supernatural might.
translation:
漫步于动物王国的奇妙世界中。

跟随兽心道途的野蛮人将自身视作动物们的家人。他们学习与动物交流的魔法手段，他们的狂暴赋予他们超自然的力量来增强与动物们的联系。

original:
Trace the Roots and Branches of the Multiverse

Barbarians who follow the Path of the World Tree connect with the cosmic tree Yggdrasil through their Rage. This tree grows among the Outer Planes, connecting them to each other and the Material Plane. These Barbarians draw on the tree's magic for vitality and as a means of dimensional travel.
translation:
探索多元宇宙的深邃根源与繁茂分支。

遵行世界树道途的野蛮人通过他们的狂暴与宇宙之树伊格德拉希尔（Yggdrasil）相连。这棵树生长在外层位面之间，连接着外层位面和物质位面。这些野蛮人借助世界之树的魔力获得生命力，并将其作为次元旅行的工具。

original:
Rage in Ecstatic Union with a God

Barbarians who walk the Path of the Zealot receive boons from a god or pantheon. These Barbarians experience their Rage as an ecstatic episode of divine union that infuses them with power. They are often allies to the priests and other followers of their god or pantheon.
translation:
沉浸在与神性合一的至高无上的狂喜之中。

选择狂热者道途的野蛮人可获得神或神系的恩赐。这些野蛮人将神人合一的狂想曲化为自身的狂暴，并因此获得力量。他们通常是其神灵或神系的祭司或是其信徒的盟友。

original: As a Bonus Action, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity to augment your athleticism. For 1 hour, you have Advantage on Strength (Athletics) and Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks, and the distance of your Long and High Jumps increases by 10 feet (this extra distance costs movement as normal).
translation: 以一个附赠动作，你可以使用你的引导神力以增强运动能力。1 小时内，你在力量（运动）检定和敏捷（体操）检定上获得优势，且你跳远和跳高的距离增加10尺（你依然为此正常消耗移动力）。

original: When you make an ability check or attack roll and fail, you can expend one use of Bardic Inspiration; roll the Bardic Inspiration die, and add the number rolled to the d20, potentially turning a failure into a success. On a failure, the Bardic Inspiration isn't expended.
translation: 你进行属性检定或攻击检定失败时，可以消耗一次诗人激励次数；掷出你的诗人激励骰，然后将结果加到你的 D20 上，这可能使失败变为成功。若结果依旧失败，则诗人激励不会被消耗。

original: When you fail an ability check or attack roll
translation: 你进行属性检定或攻击检定失败时

original:
When you roll Initiative and don't use Uncanny Metabolism, you regain expended Focus Points until you have 4 if you have 3 or fewer.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically regain the expended Focus Points.
translation:
若你在投掷先攻，且选择不使用运转周天时，你的功力为 3 点或更少，则你的功力恢复至 4 点。

Foundry Note

该特性不会自动恢复已消耗的功力点。

original:
When you roll Initiative, you can regain all expended uses of Rage. After you regain uses of Rage in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

In addition, your Rage is so fierce that it now lasts for 10 minutes without you needing to do anything to extend it from round to round. Your Rage ends early if you have the &Reference[Unconscious] condition (not just the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition) or don Heavy armor.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity which can be used when you roll Initiative which will recharge all of your Rage uses.
translation:
当你投掷先攻时，你可以重获所有已使用的狂暴次数。你以此法重获狂暴次数后，直到完成一次长休时，你都不能再这么做。

此外，你的狂暴是如此凶悍，现在你的狂暴总是能持续 10 分钟，无需你做任何事来延长狂暴的回合。

你陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态（而不再是陷入&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态）或穿戴重甲时，你的狂暴提前结束。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个行动，在掷出先攻值时可使用，将重新充能狂暴的所有使用次数。

original:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonBeas]{Summon Beast} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonFey0]{Summon Fey} spells prepared. Whenever you cast either spell, you can change its school to Illusion, which causes the summoned creature to appear spectral. You can cast the Illusion version of each spell without expending a spell slot, but casting it without a slot halves the creature’s Hit Points. Once you cast either spell without a spell slot, you must finish a Long Rest before you can cast the spell in that way again.

Foundry Note

The Summon Illusionary Beast and Fey activities can be used for a free cast at the spell's base level and automatically halves the summons HP.
translation:
你总是准备了 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonBeas] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonFey0]。你施展其中任意一道法术时，可以选择将其学派变为幻术学派，这会使召唤出的生物变得虚幻。你可以不消耗法术位地施展这两道法术的幻术版本各一次，但无需法术位地施展这两道法术会使其召唤出的生物只有一半生命值。一旦你无需法术位地施展了其中任意一道法术，则直到完成一次长休，你都不能再次以此法施展那道法术。

Foundry Note

召唤虚幻野兽 和 妖精 行动可以在法术的基础环阶上免费施放一次，并自动将召唤物的HP减半。

original:
Your Hand of Harm and Hand of Healing improve, as detailed below.

Hand of Harm. When you use Hand of Harm on a creature, you can also give that creature the Poisoned condition until the end of your next turn.

Hand of Healing. When you use Hand of Healing, you can also end one of the following conditions on the creature you heal: Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, Poisoned, or Stunned.

Foundry Note

You can use the Hand of Harm and Hand of Healing activities on this feature going forward. Hand of Harm includes an Active Effect which will apply the Poisoned status.
translation:
你的夺命之手和予命之手得到了提升，具体如下：

夺命之手。当你对一个生物使用夺命之手时，你可以使该生物陷入中毒状态，持续到你的下一回合结束。

予命之手。 当你对一个生物使用予命之手时，你还可以结束一种疾病或影响该生物的下列状态之一：目盲、耳聋、麻痹、中毒或震慑。

Foundry Note

今后可随时使用该特性中的夺命之手与予命之手行动。夺命之手包含施加中毒状态的主动效应。

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike and deal damage
translation: 每回合一次，当你用徒手打击命中一个生物并造成伤害时

key: entries->Physician's Touch->effects->Physician's Touch: Hand of Harm->name

original:
Glimpses of the future begin to press on your awareness. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, roll two [[/r d20]] and record the numbers rolled. You can replace any &Reference[D20 Test] made by you or a creature that you can see with one of these foretelling rolls. You must choose to do so before the roll, and you can replace a roll in this way only once per turn.

Each foretelling roll can be used only once. When you finish a Long Rest, you lose any unused foretelling rolls.

Current Portent Rolls: x, y

Foundry Note

When you roll both of the d20 you can edit this feature's description to track them or log it another way.
translation:
预知未来的片段开始在你意识中闪过。每当你完成一次长休时，掷 2 次 [[/r d20]] 你能用其中一个预言骰替换任何你或一个你能看见的生物进行的 &Reference[D20 Test] 。你必须在检定进行前选择这样做，且你每回合只能以这种方式替换一次检定。

每个预言骰只能被使用一次。当你完成一次长休时，你失去所有未消耗的预言骰。

当前预兆骰： x, y

Foundry Note

当您掷骰两个 d20 时，您可以编辑此特性的描述以跟进它们或以另一种方式记录它。

original:
Your damaging cantrips affect even creatures that avoid the brunt of the effect. When you cast a cantrip at a creature and you miss with the attack roll or the target succeeds on a saving throw against the cantrip, the target takes half the cantrip’s damage (if any) but suffers no additional effect from the cantrip.

Foundry Note

With their token selected you can either right click on the damage roll's chat card and select  Apply Half Damage or click the "1/2" button and then the  Apply button.
translation:
你造成伤害的戏法甚至能影响到本可免受戏法效应影响的生物。当你施展一道戏法，却没有命中，或目标对抗你戏法的豁免成功时，它仍会受到一半伤害（若有），但不会受到该戏法的其他效应影响。

Foundry Note

选择指示物，你可以右键单击伤害掷骰的聊天卡，选择  “应用一半伤害” 或单击“1/2”按钮，然后单击  “应用” 按钮。

original:
Whenever you activate your Rage, you gain one of the following options of your choice.

Falcon. While your Rage is active, you have a Fly Speed equal to your Speed if you aren't wearing any armor.

Lion. While your Rage is active, any of your enemies within 5 feet of you have Disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you or another Barbarian who has this option active.

Ram. While your Rage is active, you can cause a Large or smaller creature to have the &Reference[Prone] condition when you hit it with a melee attack.

Foundry Note

The Ram activity includes an Active Effect which applies the Prone condition.

The Falcon and Lion options are not automated.
translation:
每当你激活狂暴时，你选择并获得以下一项。

游隼。狂暴激活期间，若你未着装护甲，你获得等同于你速度的飞行速度。

雄狮。狂暴激活期间，任何位于你5尺内的敌人不以你（或另一个选择该项能力的野蛮人）为目标的攻击检定具有劣势。

角羊。狂暴激活期间，当你的近战攻击命中一名大型或更小体型的生物时，你可以令其陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。

Foundry Note

角羊包含一种主动效果，可施加倒地状态。

游隼和雄狮选项是非自动化的。

original: You gain a Fly Speed equal to your Speed if you aren't wearing any armor.
translation: 若你未着装护甲，你获得等同于你速度的飞行速度。

original: When you a Large or smaller creature with a melee attack
translation: 当你的近战攻击命中一名大型或更小体型的生物时

key: entries->Power of the Wilds->effects->Power of the Wilds: Ram->name

original: You have Advantage on attack rolls against the creature currently marked by your Hunter’s Mark.
translation: 若你攻击的目标已被猎人印记标记，则你对他的攻击具有优势。

original: When you miss with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die, roll that die, and add it to the attack roll, potentially causing the attack to hit.
translation: 当你的一次攻击检定失手时，可以消耗一枚卓越骰 并将其结果加在本次攻击的攻击检定中，这可能会导致其命中。

original: When you miss with an attack roll
translation: 当你的一次攻击检定失手时

original:
As a Magic action, you present your Holy Symbol and expend a use of your Channel Divinity to evoke healing energy that can restore a number of Hit Points equal to five times your Cleric level. Choose &Reference[Bloodied] creatures within 30 feet of yourself (which can include you), and divide those Hit Points among them. This feature can restore a creature to no more than half its Hit Point maximum.

Foundry Note

The Heal activity does not automatically restrict the HP gained to 50% of the target's max.
translation:
以一个魔法动作，你展示圣徽并消耗一次引导神力来引导治疗能量恢复等于你牧师等级 5 倍的生命值。你选择身边 30 尺内处于 &Reference[Bloodied] 状态的生物作为此特性的目标（可以包括你），再为其分配从中获得的治疗能量。该特性至多将目标的生命值恢复至其上限的一半。

Foundry Note

治疗行动不会自动将目标获得的生命值限制为其最大生命值的50%。

original: You embody primal power. Your Strength and Constitution scores increase by 4, to a maximum of 25.
translation: 你本身便是原初之力的象征。你的力量值和体质值各提升 4，你这两项属性的上限变为 25。

original:
You magically summon a primal beast, which draws strength from your bond with nature. Choose its stat block: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbBeastoftheLan]{Beast of the Land}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbBeastoftheSea]{Beast of the Sea}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbBeastoftheSky]{Beast of the Sky}. You also determine the kind of animal it is, choosing a kind appropriate for the stat block. Whatever beast you choose, it bears primal markings indicating its supernatural origin.

The beast is Friendly to you and your allies and obeys your commands. It vanishes if you die.

The Beast in Combat. In combat, the beast acts during your turn. It can move and use its Reaction on its own, but the only action it takes is the Dodge action unless you take a Bonus Action to command it to take an action in its stat block or some other action. You can also sacrifice one of your attacks when you take the Attack action to command the beast to take the Beast’s Strike action. If you have the Incapacitated condition, the beast acts on its own and isn’t limited to the Dodge action.

Restoring or Replacing the Beast. If the beast has died within the last hour, you can take a Magic action to touch it and expend a spell slot. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its Hit Points restored.

Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can summon a different primal beast, which appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you. You choose its stat block and appearance. If you already have a beast from this feature, the old one vanishes when the new one appears.

In addition to the noted usage of your statistics in the companion's Traits and Actions, the following attributes are also affected.

Common
AC13 plus your Wisdom modifier
PBequals your Proficiency Bonus
Beast of the Land
HP5 plus five times your Ranger level
HD[d8s] equal to your Ranger level
Speed40 ft., Climb 40 ft.
SensesDarkvision 60 ft.
Beast of the Sky
HP4 plus four times your Ranger level
HD[d6s] equal to your Ranger level
Speed10 ft., Fly 60 ft.
SensesDarkvision 60 ft.
Beast of the Sea
HP5 plus five times your Ranger level
HD[d8s] equal to your Ranger level
Speed5 ft., Swim 60 ft.
SensesDarkvision 90 ft.

Foundry Note

The Summon activity will allow you to choose the type of your Primal Companion. Its stat block will automatically be configured with the correct values.

The Restore with Spell Slot activity will allow you to resummon it and consume a spell slot.

The Command activity only needs to be used if you're tracking your Bonus Action usage as it does not do anything.
translation:
你魔法般地召出一只原初野兽，其力量来源于你和自然的联系。从: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbBeastoftheLan], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbBeastoftheSea] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbBeastoftheSky] 三种类别里选择其一，该原初野兽数据也在后文有所对应，且是何种动物由你来决定，无论你选择什么样的动物，它身上都带有原初的印记，暗示其神秘的起源。

野兽对你和你的盟友态度友善，会服从你的命令。如果你死亡，它也会消失。

战斗中的野兽。 在战斗中，原初野兽在你的回合中行动，他能自行移动并使用动作。但除非你在你的回合中以一个附赠动作命令他执行其他动作，否则他只会执行闪避动作。该动作可以是其数据中列出的动作或是之外的其他动作。你也能在使用自己的攻击动作时，替换一次自己的攻击动作来命令野兽执行攻击动作。如果你陷入失能，野兽会自主行动，而非仅执行执行闪避动作。

复原或替换野兽。 如果野兽死亡，且死亡时间不超过一小时，你能消耗一个法术位并以一个魔法动作来触碰他，原初野兽便能在一分钟以后以全部生命值重生。
当你结束一次长休后，你能够召唤一只不同的原初野兽，这只新的野兽将会出现在你5尺内未被占据的空间里，并由你选择其数据和外观。如果你已经通过此特性获得了一只原初野兽，他会在新的原初野兽出现时消失。

Foundry Note

召唤行动允许选择原初伙伴类型，其属性数值将自动配置。

用法术位召唤行动可通过消耗法术位重新召唤该伙伴。

命令行动仅在需要追踪附赠动作使用时需操作（无实际游戏效果）。

original: Whenever you finish a Long Rest

You gain proficiency in another skill of your choice from the skill list available to Barbarians at level 1.

In addition, while your Rage is active, you can channel primal power when you attempt certain tasks; whenever you make an ability check using one of the following skills, you can make it as a Strength check even if it normally uses a different ability: Acrobatics, Intimidation, Perception, Stealth, or Survival. When you use this ability, your Strength represents primal power coursing through you, honing your agility, bearing, and senses.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will cause those skills to automatically use your Strength modifier if it is higher than the normal Ability Score associated with the Skill.
translation:
除了 1 级选择的技能以外，你可以从野蛮人技能表中额外获得一个技能的熟练。

此外，你的狂暴激活期间，你可以在尝试完成特定的事项时与原初之力相连。每当你使用以下技能进行一次属性检定时，你可以使用力量进行检定而非通常使用的其他属性：特技，威吓，察觉，隐匿或求生。当你使用这项能力时，你的力量值代表着一种环绕你身的原初之力，强化了你的灵敏度、气质和感知力。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一种被动效应，若力量属性调整值高于与该技能相关联的正常属性调整值，那么该效应会使这些技能自动使用力量属性值的调整值。

original:
You have dedicated yourself to one of the following sacred roles of your choice.

Magician. You know one extra cantrip from the Druid spell list. In addition, your mystical connection to nature gives you a bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Nature) checks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum bonus of +1).

Warden. Trained for battle, you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Medium armor.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted to choose during advancement.
translation:
你将自己投身于所选择的以下一项神圣的角色之中：

术师。 你学会一个额外的德鲁伊法术表中的戏法。此外，你和自然的神秘连接让你在智力（奥秘或自然）检定上获得 加值。加值等于你的感知调整值（最小为1）。

卫士。 你受到了战斗的训练，获得军用武器熟练和中甲熟练。

Foundry Note

在升级过程中，系统会提示您进行选择。

original:
You know one extra cantrip from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU#cantrip]{Druid spell list}. In addition, your mystical connection to nature gives you a bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Nature) checks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum bonus of +1, currently [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the increase to your known cantrips and the bonus to your Arcane and Nature checks.
translation:
你学会一个额外的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU#cantrip] 中的戏法。此外，你和自然的神秘连接让你在智力（奥秘或自然）检定上获得加值。加值等于你的感知调整值（最小为 1，, 当前 [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一种主动效应，能自动提升您已知法术的数量，并为您的奥秘和自然检定提供加值。

original:
Trained for battle, you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Medium armor.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the addition of your Martial weapons proficiency and Medium armor training.
translation:
你受到了战斗的训练，获得军用武器熟练和中甲受训。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个被动效应，自动授予您军用武器熟练和中型护甲受训。

original:
When a creature that you can see within 30 feet of yourself takes damage, you can take a Reaction to cause your Arcane Ward to absorb that damage. If this damage reduces the ward to 0 Hit Points, the warded creature takes any remaining damage. If that creature has any Resistances or Vulnerabilities, apply them before reducing the ward’s Hit Points.

Foundry Note

The Project Ward activity uses your reaction and can be used to reduce the Ward's uses ("HP").
translation:
当 30 尺内一名你可见的生物受到伤害时，你可以用你的反应让你的奥术守御吸收此次伤害。如果该伤害使结界的生命值降为0，则被保护的生物将承受所有剩余伤害。

如果被保护的生物有任何抗性 &Reference[Resistance]或 易伤，则应在计算结界承伤之前先结算抗性和易伤。

Foundry Note

投射守御 行动使用您的反应，可用于减少守御的使用次数（“HP”）。

original: When a creature that you can see within 30 feet of yourself takes damage
translation: 当 30 尺内一名你可见的生物受到伤害时

original:
Augment Physical Might with Psionic Power

Psi Warriors awaken the power of their minds to augment their physical might. They harness this psionic power to infuse their weapon strikes, lash out with telekinetic energy, and create barriers of mental force.
translation:
灵能庇体显神威

灵能武士唤醒他们心灵中的力量以增强自身的体魄，他们将这种被称为灵能的力量注入于刀兵之中，用念动力鞭笞他们的敌人，并以精神力铸造无形壁垒抵御攻击。

original:
You harbor a wellspring of psionic energy within yourself. It is represented by your Psionic Energy Dice, which fuel powers you have from this subclass. The Psi Warrior Energy Dice table shows the die size and number of these dice you have when you reach certain Fighter levels.

Psi Warrior Energy Dice
Fighter LevelDie SizeNumber
3D64
5D86
9D88
11D108
13D1010
17D1212

Current Dice: [[lookup @scale.psi-warrior.die]]

Any features in this subclass that use a Psionic Energy Die use only the dice from this subclass. Some of your powers expend the Psionic Energy Die, as specified in a power's description, and you can't use a power if it requires you to use a die when all your Psionic Energy Dice are expended.

You regain one of your expended Psionic Energy Dice when you finish a Short Rest, and you regain all of them when you finish a Long Rest.

Protective Field. When you or another creature you can see within 30 feet of you takes damage, you can take a Reaction to expend one Psionic Energy Die, roll the die, and reduce the damage taken by the number rolled plus your Intelligence modifier (minimum reduction of 1), as you create a momentary shield of telekinetic force.

Psionic Strike. You can propel your weapons with psionic force. Once on each of your turns, immediately after you hit a target within 30 feet of yourself with an attack and deal damage to it with a weapon, you can expend one Psionic Energy Die, rolling it and dealing Force damage to the target equal to the number rolled plus your Intelligence modifier.

Telekinetic Movement. You can move an object or a creature with your mind. As a Magic action, choose one target you can see within 30 feet of yourself; the target must be a loose object that is Large or smaller or one willing creature other than you. You transport the target up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Alternatively, if the target is a Tiny object, you can transport it to or from your hand.

Once you take this action, you can't do so again until you finish a Short or Long Rest unless you expend a Psionic Energy Die (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

Your Psionic Energy Die will automatically update as you level up.

The Protective Field activity will consume a use and provide a healing roll for reducing the damage.

The Psionic Strike activity will consume a use and provide a Force damage roll.

The Telekinetic Movement activity has a single use that does not consume a use of your Psionic Energy Die. You can use the Telekinetic Movement Using Psionic Energy activity to use it again by consuming a Psionic Energy Die.
translation:
你内心拥有一个灵能力量的源泉。这股能量表现为数个“灵能骰”。这些骰子为你所拥有的各种心灵异能提供能量。灵能武士能量骰表展示了你在达到某些战士等级时拥有的这些骰子的数量，以及骰子的大小。

灵能武士灵能骰
战士等级 骰面 数量
3 D6 4
5 D8 6
9 D8 8
11 D10 8
13 D10 10
17 D12 12

当前骰面： [[lookup @scale.psi-warrior.die]]

此子职中任何使用灵能骰的特性只使用该特性中的骰。你的某些异能消耗灵能骰，如异能描述中所述，如果该使用该异能前你已经失去所有灵能骰，那么你就不能使用该异能。

你在使用灵能武士能力时需要且仅能消耗本职业的灵能骰，如异能描述中所述，如果一些异能在你的灵能骰全部耗尽，你就无法使用该异能。

庇护力场。 当你或者另一个对你 30 尺内可见的生物受到伤害，你可以用反应消耗一枚灵能骰，对其降低等同于灵能骰骰出的数值加你的智力调整值的伤害（至少减少 1 点），如同你创造了一面瞬间的念力盾牌。

灵能打击。 你可以用灵能驱动你的武器。每个你的回合一次，当你用武器命中并对位于你 30 尺范围内的目标造成伤害时，你可以立即消耗一枚灵能骰，对目标造成等同于灵能骰骰出的数值加你的智力调整值的力场伤害。

念力控物。 你可以用意念移动一个物体或生物。你可以使用一个魔法动作选中一个最多大型的松散物体或一个除你以外的自愿生物。如果你可以看见目标且目标在你 30 尺范围内，你就可以将其移动至多 30 尺至另一个对你可见的未被占据的空间内。另外，如果目标是一个微型物件，你可以从你的手中给出或收回。当你使用该异能后，直到你完成一次短休或长休为止你都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗一枚灵能骰（无需动作）来再次使用该异能。

你可以在完成一次长休后恢复所有已使用的灵能骰。此外，你可以在完成一次短休后获得一个灵能骰。

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，你的灵能骰会自动更新。

庇护力场 行动会耗费一次使用次数，并提供一次治疗掷骰来减少伤害。

灵能打击行动会消耗一次使用次数，并进行一次力场伤害掷骰。

念力控物行动仅能使用一次，且不会消耗你的灵能骰。你可使用 以灵能骰使用念力控物 行动，通过消耗 1 枚灵能骰来再次使用它。

original: When you or another creature you can see within 30 feet takes damage
translation: 当你或者另一个对你 30 尺内可见的生物受到伤害时

original: Once on each of your turns, immediately after you hit a target within 30 feet of yourself with an attack and deal damage to it with a weapon
translation: 每个你的回合一次，当你用武器命中并对位于你30尺范围内的目标造成伤害时

original: One target within 30 feet, if an object it must be Large or smaller, if a creature, it must be willing
translation: 30 尺范围内，最多大型的松散物体或一个除你以外的自愿生物

key: entries->Psionic Power->activities->Telekinetic Movement Using Psionic Energy->name
translation: 以灵能骰使用念力控物

key: entries->Psionic Power->activities->Telekinetic Movement Using Psionic Energy->condition
original: One target within 30 feet, if an object it must be Large or smaller, if a creature, it must be willing
translation: 30 尺范围内，最多大型的松散物体或一个除你以外的自愿生物

original:
You harbor a wellspring of psionic energy within yourself. It is represented by your Psionic Energy Dice, which fuel certain powers you have from this subclass. The Soulknife Energy Dice table shows the number of these dice you have when you reach certain Rogue levels, and the table shows the die size.

Soulknife Energy Dice
Rogue LevelDie SizeNumber
3D64
5D86
9D88
11D108
13D1010
17D1212

Any features in this subclass that use a Psionic Energy Die use only the dice from this subclass. Some of your powers expend a Psionic Energy Die, as specified in a power’s description, and you can’t use a power if it requires you to use a die when your Psionic Energy Dice are all expended.

You regain one of your expended Psionic Energy Dice when you finish a Short Rest, and you regain all of them when you finish a Long Rest.

Psi-Bolstered Knack. If you fail an ability check using a skill or tool with which you have proficiency, you can roll one Psionic Energy Die and add the number rolled to the check, potentially turning failure into success. The die is expended only if the roll then succeeds.

Psychic Whispers. You can establish telepathic communication between yourself and others. As a Magic action, choose one or more creatures you can see, up to a number of creatures equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and then roll one Psionic Energy Die. For a number of hours equal to the number rolled, the chosen creatures can speak telepathically with you, and you can speak telepathically with them. To send or receive a message (no action required), you and the other creature must be within 1 mile of each other. A creature can end the telepathic connection at any time (no action required).

The first time you use this power after each Long Rest, you don’t expend the Psionic Energy Die. All other times you use the power, you expend the die.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically regains a use on a Short Rest and all on a Long Rest.

The Psi-Bolstered Knack activity expends a die and includes a bonus roll. If it still fails you can refund the expended die.

This feature includes a Psychic Whispers activity and a Psychic Whispers (Free) activity. They both include an Active Effect which can be used for tracking creatures you've included.
translation:
你内心蕴含着一股灵能力量，这股能量表现为你拥有数枚灵能骰。你可以使用这些灵能骰来驱动你从这个子职中获得的特定心灵异能。下方的魂刃灵能骰列表展示了你在达到特定游荡者等级时会拥有多少颗灵能骰，该列表同样列出了骰子大小。

灵能力量骰
游荡者等级 骰面 数量
3 D6 4
5 D8 6
9 D8 8
11 D10 8
13 D10 10
17 D12 12

你在使用魂刃能力时需要且仅能消耗本职业的灵能骰，如异能描述中所述，某些异能在你的灵能骰全部耗尽后，便无法使用。
你可以在完成一次长休后恢复所有已使用的灵能骰。此外，你可以在完成一次短休后获得一个灵能骰。

灵振诀窍。 如果你使用具有熟练的技能或工具进行一次属性检定，但失败时，你可以投掷灵能骰，并将掷骰结果加到检定结果中，这可能会让失败的检定变为成功。你只在灵能让检定成功时才会消耗那一灵能骰。

心灵低语。 你能够利用灵能力在自己和他人之间建立起基于心灵感应的交流。以一个魔法动作，从可见的生物中选择一到至多等同于你熟练加值数量的生物，掷一枚灵能骰。你在投掷结果数值小时内，获得与选择的生物通过心灵感应进行交流的能力。你可以和选择生物进行双向的心灵感应交流，但在发送或接收信息时（无需动作），你和选择生物之间的距离不可超过一里。而且生物可以随时终止心灵感应的链接（无需动作）。在每次长休后你可以免费使用一次这个异能。除此之外，每次使用它你都得消耗一枚灵能骰。

Foundry Note

此特性在短休时会自动恢复一次使用次数，而在长休时则会自动恢复所有使用次数。

灵振诀窍行动消耗 1 枚骰子，并包含一次掷骰加值。如果该行动仍然失败，可以退还已消耗的骰子。

心灵低语 行动和 心灵低语（免费）行动。这两项行动都包含一个主动效果，可用于跟进所包含的生物。

original: When you fail an ability check using a skill or tool with which you're proficient
translation: 当你使用你熟练的技能或工具进行属性检定时失败时

original: The chosen creatures can speak telepathically with you, and you can speak telepathically with them. To send or receive a message (no action required), you and the other creature must be within 1 mile of each other. A creature can end the telepathic connection at any time (no action required).
translation: 你在投掷结果数值小时内，获得与选择的生物通过心灵感应进行交流的能力。你可以和选择生物进行双向的心灵感应交流，但在发送或接收信息时（无需动作），你和选择生物之间的距离不可超过一里。而且生物可以随时终止心灵感应的链接（无需动作）。

original:
When you cast any level 1+ spell from your Psionic Spells feature, you can cast it by expending a spell slot as normal or by spending a number of Sorcery Points equal to the spell’s level. If you cast the spell using Sorcery Points, it requires no Verbal or Somatic components, and it requires no Material components unless they are consumed by the spell or have a cost specified in it.

Foundry Note

The Expend Sorcery Points activity will allow you to select how many Sorcery Points to expend. You can then cast the spell and uncheck the "Consume Spell Slot" option.
translation:
当你施展一个灵能法术特性中的一环或更高环阶的法术时，你可以改为使用等同于该法术环数数量的术法点而非消耗法术位施放该法术。你依然可以用法术位正常施展这些法术。

当你通过此能力施放法术时，你无视该法术施法需要的语言成分或姿势成分。你同时无视该法术需要的不会消耗的材料成分。

Foundry Note

消耗术法点行动将允许选择要消耗的术法点数量。随后可施展法术并取消勾选“消耗法术位”选项。

original:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Psionic Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Psionic Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplArmsofHada]{Arms of Hadar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCalmEmotio]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW]{Dissonant Whispers}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMindSliver]{Mind Sliver}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHungerofHa]{Hunger of Hadar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSending000]{Sending}
7@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEvardsBlac]{Evard's Black Tentacles}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonAber]{Summon Aberration}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRarysTelep]{Rary's Telepathic Bond}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}

Foundry Note

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.
translation:
当你达到灵能法术表中所示的术士等级时，你将同时获得其对应的灵能法术。灵能法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

灵能法术 Psionic Spells
术士等级 法术
3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplArmsofHada], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCalmEmotio], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMindSliver]
5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHungerofHa], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSending000]
7 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEvardsBlac], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonAber]
9 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRarysTelep], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]

Foundry Note

随着你的等级提升，这些法术将会自动授予你。

original:
You have manifested shimmering blades of psychic energy. Whenever you take the Attack action or make an Opportunity Attack, you can manifest a Psychic Blade in your free hand and make the attack with that blade.

The blade vanishes immediately after it hits or misses its target, and it leaves no mark if it deals damage.

After you attack with the blade on your turn, you can make a melee or ranged attack with a second psychic blade as a Bonus Action on the same turn if your other hand is free to create it. The damage die of this bonus attack is 1d4 instead of 1d6.
translation:
你能将自己的心灵异能塑造为由灵能构成的闪亮刀刃。当你执行攻击动作或者进行一次借机攻击时，你能在空闲的手中塑造出心灵之刃，并使用它来进行攻击。

念刃会在你进行一次近战或远程攻击后立刻消失，并且即使它造成伤害也不会留下任何痕迹。

当你使用念刃发动攻击后的同一回合中，只要你的另一只手空闲，就能以一个附赠动作在那只手中塑造第二把念刃，并再进行一次近战武器攻击或是远程武器攻击。此附赠攻击的伤害骰为 1d4，而非 1d6。

original:
You can manifest shimmering blades of psychic energy. Whenever you take the Attack action or make an Opportunity Attack, you can manifest a Psychic Blade in your free hand and make the attack with that blade. The magic blade has the following traits:

Weapon Category: Simple Melee

Damage on a Hit: 1d6 Psychic plus the ability modifier used for the attack roll

Properties: Finesse, Thrown (range 60/120 feet)

Mastery: Vex (you can use this property, and it doesn’t count against the number of properties you can use with Weapon Mastery)

The blade vanishes immediately after it hits or misses its target, and it leaves no mark if it deals damage.

After you attack with the blade on your turn, you can make a melee or ranged attack with a second psychic blade as a Bonus Action on the same turn if your other hand is free to create it. The damage die of this bonus attack is 1d4 instead of 1d6.

Foundry Note

When you gain this feature you are granted a [[/item Psychic Blade]] as an item that will appear in your inventory and includes the above features.
translation:
你能将自己的心灵异能塑造为由灵能构成的闪亮刀刃。当你执行攻击动作或者进行一次借机攻击时，你能在空闲的手中塑造出心灵之刃，并使用它来进行攻击。这种魔法刀刃具有以下特性：

武器类别： 简易近战

命中伤害： 1d6 心灵伤害+攻击检定的属性调整值

属性： 灵巧，投掷（射程 60/120 尺）

精通： 痛击 （你可以使用这个精通属性，但它不计入你可以使用的武器精通属性的数量）

刀刃在击中或未击中目标后立即消失，如果造成伤害则不会留下任何痕迹。

当你使用念刃发动攻击后的同一回合中，只要你的另一只手空闲，就能以一个附赠动作在那只手中塑造第二把念刃，并再进行一次近战武器攻击或是远程武器攻击。此附赠攻击的伤害骰为1d4，而非1d6。

Foundry Note

获得该特性时将得到[[/item 念刃 Psychic Blade]]，该物品将出现在物品栏中并包含上述特性。

original:
You have Resistance to Psychic damage, and you have Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Charmed or Frightened condition.

Foundry Note

You will receive the Psychic damage resistance as you level up. The Advantage on saving throws is not automated.
translation:
你获得心灵伤害的抗性。此外，你在对抗魅惑或恐慌的豁免检定上获得优势。

Foundry Note

随等级提升将获得心灵伤害抗性，豁免检定优势需手动应用。

original: When you cast a Warlock spell that deals damage, you can change its damage type to Psychic. In addition, when you cast a Warlock spell that is an Enchantment or Illusion, you can do so without Verbal or Somatic components.
translation: 当你施展一道造成伤害的魔契师法术时，你可以将其伤害类型改为心灵伤害。此外，当你施展一道惑控或幻术学派的魔契师法术时，你不需要声音和姿势成分。

original:
You can weave a veil of psychic static to mask yourself. As a Magic action, you gain the &Reference[Invisible] condition for 1 hour or until you dismiss this effect (no action required). This invisibility ends early immediately after you deal damage to a creature or you force a creature to make a saving throw.

Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a Long Rest unless you expend a Psionic Energy Die (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

The Psychic Veil (Free) activity contains a free use. The Psychic Veil activity consumes a Psionic Die. They both include an Active Effect that applies the Invisible condition.
translation:
你可以编织一层灵能面纱来掩盖你。以一个魔法动作，你连同你所穿或携带的任何东西可以 &Reference[Invisible] 至多1小时。若你主动解除隐形（无需动作）、造成伤害、或迫使一个生物进行豁免检定，此隐形状态将会提前结束。

当你使用该特性后，直到你完成一次长休为止你都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗一枚灵能骰（无需动作）来再次使用该特性。

Foundry Note

灵能面纱（免费）活动包含一次免费使用次数，灵能面纱活动将消耗一颗灵能骰。两者均包含施加隐形状态的主动效果。

original: You gain the Invisible condition for 1 hour or until you dismiss this effect (no action required). This invisibility ends early immediately after you deal damage to a creature or you force a creature to make a saving throw.
translation: 你连同你所穿或携带的任何东西可以 &Reference[Invisible] 至多1小时。若你主动解除隐形（无需动作）、造成伤害、或迫使一个生物进行豁免检定，此隐形状态将会提前结束。

original:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, you can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to drive the target back. Add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet directly away from you.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Strength Save activity and a Dexterity Save activity which will consume a use of your Superiority Die.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.
translation:
你以武器攻击或徒手打击发动的攻击检定命中一个生物时，可以消耗一枚卓越骰以尝试将该目标推开。所消耗的卓越骰还会被加到此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。如果该目标体型为大型或更小，则必须通过一次力量豁免，豁免失败将被往远离你的方向直线推动至多15尺。

Foundry Note

该特性包含将消耗 1 枚卓越骰使用次数的力量豁免与敏捷豁免行动。

伤害行动允许在掷骰对话框中选择其造成的伤害类型。

original:
Cost: 2 Sorcery Points

When you cast a spell that has a casting time of an action, you can spend 2 Sorcery Points to change the casting time to a Bonus Action for this casting. You can’t modify a spell in this way if you’ve already cast a level 1+ spell on the current turn, nor can you cast a level 1+ spell on this turn after modifying a spell in this way.
translation:
消耗：2 术法点

当你施展一个施法时间为动作的法术时，你可以消耗 2 术法点来将其施法时间改为附赠动作。如果你已经在同一回合内施展了一个一环或更高环的法术，你不能进行瞬发法术，并且你在使用瞬发法术后也不能在同一回合内施展一环或更高环的法术。

original: When you cast a spell that has a casting time of an action
translation: 当你施展一个施法时间为动作的法术时

original:
You gain the ability to set up lethal vibrations in someone's body. When you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike, you can expend 4 Focus Points to start these imperceptible vibrations, which last for a number of days equal to your Monk level. The vibrations are harmless unless you take an action to end them. Alternatively, when you take the Attack action on your turn, you can forgo one of the attacks to end the vibrations. To end them, you and the target must be on the same plane of existence. When you end them, the target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 10d12 Force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

You can have only one creature under the effect of this feature at a time. You can end the vibrations harmlessly (no action required).

Foundry Note

The Instill Vibrations activity expends 4 Focus Points and includes an Active Effect which can be used to track the target you have set up lethal vibrations in.

The End Vibrations activity includes the Saving Throw and Damage rolls.
translation:
你获得了将内劲击入他人体内的能力。当你以徒手打击命中一个生物时，可以消耗 4 点功力打入暗劲，其持续相当于你武僧等级的天数。在你使用你的动作将之结束前，暗劲是无害的。此外，当你在自己的回合执行攻击动作时，你可以将其中一次攻击替换为这个动作使暗劲结束。若你如此做，你和目标必须处于同一个存在位面。

当你结束暗劲时，目标必须进行一次体质豁免，失败则受到 10d12 力场伤害，成功则只受到一半伤害。

在同一时间你只能用这个特性使一个生物处于此效应中。你可以结束某人身上的暗劲而不造成伤害（不需要动作）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含的打入暗劲行动将消耗4点功力，并附带可追踪已施加致死暗劲目标的主动效应。

该特性包含的结束暗劲行动将触发豁免检定与伤害掷骰。

original: When you take the Attack action on your turn
translation: 当你在自己的回合执行攻击动作时

original: When you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike
translation: 当你以徒手打击命中一个生物时

original: As a Magic action, you present your Holy Symbol and expend a use of your Channel Divinity to emit a flash of light in a 30-foot Emanation originating from yourself. Any magical &Reference[Darkness]—such as that created by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness} spell—in that area is dispelled. Additionally, each creature of your choice in that area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking Radiant damage equal to 2d10 plus your Cleric level on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
translation: 以一个魔法动作，你展现圣徽，消耗一次引导神力次数来释放出一阵闪光，覆盖一处以你为源点的 30 尺光环区域。任何魔法 &Reference[Darkness] 例如法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00] 制造的黑暗——在该区域内都将被解除。此外，区域内你选择的所有生物都必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者将受 2d10 ＋ 你牧师等级的光耀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

original:
Your link to your patron allows you to serve as a conduit for radiant energy. You have Resistance to Radiant damage. Once per turn, when a spell you cast deals Radiant or Fire damage, you can add your Charisma modifier to that spell’s damage against one of the spell’s targets.

Foundry Note

As you level up you will automatically be granted the Resistance to Radiant damage.

The Damage activity includes a damage roll that allows you to select the damage type in the roll's dialog. Alternatively, you can add your Charisma modifier in the Spell's Situational Bonus field when rolling damage.
translation:
你与你天界宗主的链接允许你成为光耀能量的渠道。你获得对光耀伤害的抗性。

每回合一次，当一个你施展的法术造成光耀伤害或火焰伤害时，你可以将你的魅力调整值加到该法术对其中一个目标所造成的伤害上。

Foundry Note

升级时将自动获得光耀伤害抗性。

 伤害行动包含可于掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型的伤害掷骰机制，或通过法术环境加值栏添加魅力调整值进行伤害计算。

original:
Your strikes now carry supernatural power. When you hit a target with an attack roll using a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike, the target takes an extra 1d8 Radiant damage.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automatically adds the Radiant damage to all Damage Rolls made with your Melee Weapon Attacks and Unarmed Strikes.
translation:
你的打击中携带着神圣的力量。当你使用近战武器或徒手打击命中一个生物时，该生物将额外受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。

Foundry Note

该特性包含可自动为所有近战武器攻击与徒手打击的伤害掷骰附加光耀伤害类型的主动效应。

original:
You can imbue yourself with a primal power called Rage, a force that grants you extraordinary might and resilience. You can enter it as a Bonus Action if you aren’t wearing Heavy armor.

You can enter your Rage the number of times shown for your Barbarian level in the Rages column of the Barbarian Features table (currently [[lookup @scale.barbarian.rages]]). You regain one expended use when you finish a Short Rest, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

While active, your Rage follows the rules below.

Damage Resistance. You have Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

Rage Damage. When you make an attack using Strength—with either a weapon or an Unarmed Strike—and deal damage to the target, you gain a bonus to the damage that increases as you gain levels as a Barbarian, as shown in the Rage Damage column of the Barbarian Features table.

Strength Advantage. You have Advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

No Concentration or Spells. You can’t maintain Concentration, and you can’t cast spells.

Duration. The Rage lasts until the end of your next turn, and it ends early if you don Heavy armor or have the Incapacitated condition. If your Rage is still active on your next turn, you can extend the Rage for another round by doing one of the following:

  • Make an attack roll against an enemy.
  • Force an enemy to make a saving throw.
  • Take a Bonus Action to extend your Rage.

Each time the Rage is extended, it lasts until the end of your next turn. You can maintain a Rage for up to 10 minutes.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the Resistance and additional damage. This feature will also automatically recharge your Rage uses on a Short and Long Rest.
translation:
你可以将名为狂暴的原初之力赋予己身，为你带来超越常规的伟力和韧性。未着装重甲时，你可以以一个附赠动作进入狂暴。

你可以进入狂暴的次数见野蛮人特性表中“狂暴次数”一栏。 (当前 [[lookup @scale.barbarian.rage]])。当你完成一次短休时，你重获一次已使用的狂暴次数；当你完成一次长休时，你重获所有已使用的狂暴次数。

你的狂暴激活期间，你将遵循以下这些规则：

伤害抗性。 你具有钝击，穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性。

狂暴伤害。 当你使用力量发动一次攻击并对目标造成伤害时（无论这是一次武器攻击还是一次徒手打击），你的伤害掷骰获得额外加值，这个加值随着你的野蛮人等级提升，见野蛮人特性表中“狂暴伤害”一栏。

力量优势。 你的力量检定和力量豁免具有优势。

无法专注或施法。 你无法保持专注Concentration，也不能施展法术。

持续时间。 狂暴持续到你的下一个回合结束，如果你穿戴重甲或陷入失能状态，狂暴提前结束。如果在你的下一回合你的狂暴仍处于激活状态，你可以执行以下选项之一令你的狂暴延长一轮：

  • 对敌人进行一次攻击检定。
  • 迫使一名敌人进行一次豁免检定。
  • 以一个附赠动作延长你的狂暴。

每当狂暴被延长，都会持续到你的下一个回合结束。你可以维持狂暴至多10分钟。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个主动效果，能自动实现抗性以及额外伤害。此特性还会在短休和长休时自动恢复你的狂暴次数。

original:
When you activate your Rage, you can assume the form of a divine warrior. This form lasts for 1 minute or until you drop to 0 Hit Points. Once you use this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

While in this form, you gain the benefits below.

Flight. You have a Fly Speed equal to your Speed and can hover.

Resistance. You have Resistance to Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant damage.

Revivification. When a creature within 30 feet of you would drop to 0 Hit Points, you can take a Reaction to expend a use of your Rage to instead change the target's Hit Points to a number equal to your Barbarian level (currently [[lookup @classes.barbarian.levels]]).

Foundry Note

The Rage of the Gods activity includes an Active Effect for automatically adding the resistances and hover but does not provide the fly speed.

The Revivification activity includes a healing roll of your Barbarian level.
translation:
狂暴激活期间，你可以化身为神所指名的战士行于世间。这种形态持续一分钟或直至你生命值降至 0。一旦你使用该特性，直到完成一次长休前你无法再次使用。

在此形态下，你会获得以下增益。

飞行 Flight。你获得等同于你速度的飞行速度，并且可以悬浮。

抗性 Resistance。你拥有对暗蚀、心灵和光耀伤害的抗性。

复生 Revivification。当你 30 尺内的一名生物的生命值将要降至 0 时，你可以使用反应并消耗一次狂暴次数，令目标的生命值变为等同于你野蛮人等级的值。

Foundry Note

神之狂暴 行动包含一项主动效果，可自动添加抗性，但不提供飞行速度。

复生行动包含一次以野蛮人等级为基准的治疗掷骰。

original: When a creature within 30 feet of you would drop to 0 Hit Points
translation: 当你 30 尺内的一名生物的生命值将要降至 0 时

key: entries->Rage of the Gods->activities->Rage of the Gods->name
entries->Rage of the Gods->activities->Rage of the Gods->condition
entries->Rage of the Gods->effects->Rage of the Gods->name

original:
While in this form, you gain the benefits below.

Flight. You have a Fly Speed equal to your Speed and can hover.

Resistance. You have Resistance to Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant damage.

Revivification. When a creature within 30 feet of you would drop to 0 Hit Points, you can take a Reaction to expend a use of your Rage to instead change the target's Hit Points to a number equal to your Barbarian level.
translation:
在此形态下，你会获得以下增益。

飞行。你获得等同于你速度的飞行速度，并且可以悬浮。

抗性。你拥有对暗蚀、心灵和光耀伤害的抗性。

复生。当你 30 尺内的一名生物的生命值将要降至 0 时，你可以使用反应并消耗一次狂暴次数，令目标的生命值变为等同于你野蛮人等级的值。

original:
Your Rage taps into the primal power of animals. Whenever you activate your Rage, you gain one of the following options of your choice.

Bear. While your Rage is active, you have Resistance to every damage type except Force, Necrotic, Psychic, and Radiant.

Eagle. When you activate your Rage, you can take the Disengage and Dash actions as part of that Bonus Action. While your Rage is active, you can take a Bonus Action to take both of those actions.

Wolf. While your Rage is active, your allies have Advantage on attack rolls against any enemy of yours within 5 feet of you.

Foundry Note

The Bear activity includes an Active Effect which can automate the addition of the resistances.

The Eagle activity uses a Bonus Action for Disengage and Dash.

The Wolf activity includes a 5 foot target template for identifying impacted creatures.
translation:
你的狂暴可以激发动物的原始力量。每当你激活狂暴时，你选择并获得以下一项。

熊。狂暴激活期间，你获得对心灵、力场、暗蚀和光耀伤害之外所有伤害类型的抗性。

鹰。当你激活狂暴时，作为狂暴的附赠动作的一部分，你可以同时执行撤离和疾走动作。狂暴激活期间，你能以一个附赠动作同时执行撤离和疾走动作。

狼。狂暴激活期间，你的盟友对你 5 尺内的敌人发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Foundry Note

熊行动包含一种主动效应，该效应能够自动添加抗性。

鹰行动会用附赠动作来撤离和疾走。

狼行动包含一个 5 尺的目标模板，用于识别受影响的生物。

key: entries->Rage of the Wilds->effects->Rage of the Bear->name

original: As a Bonus Action, you can expend one Superiority Die to bolster the resolve of a companion. Choose an ally of yours within 30 feet of yourself who can see or hear you. That creature gains Temporary Hit Points equal to the Superiority Die roll plus half your Fighter level (round down).
translation: 以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗 1 枚卓越骰以鼓舞一名战友的士气。选择一名位于你 30 尺内的能看见你或听到你的盟友。该生物获得数量等于你战士等级的一半（向下取整）加卓越骰结果的临时生命值。

original:
A Wandering Warrior Imbued with Primal Magic

Core Ranger Traits

Primary Ability

Dexterity and Wisdom

Hit Point Die

D10 per Ranger level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Strength and Dexterity

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 3: Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple and Martial weapons

Armor Training

Light and Medium armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmStuddedLea]{Studded Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepScimitar00]{Scimitar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow}, 20 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoArrows0000]{Arrows}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDruidicFocu]{Druidic Focus} (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbdfcSprigofmis]{sprig of mistletoe}), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagExplorersPa]{Explorer’s Pack}, and [[/award 7GP]]; or (B) [[/award 150GP]]

Far from bustling cities, amid the trees of trackless forests and across wide plains, Rangers keep their unending watch in the wilderness. Rangers learn to track their quarry as a predator does, moving stealthily through the wilds and hiding themselves in brush and rubble.

Thanks to their connection with nature, Rangers can also cast spells that harness primal powers of the wilderness. A Ranger’s talents and magic are honed with deadly focus to protect the world from the ravages of monsters and tyrants.

Becoming a Ranger …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Ranger Traits table.
  • Gain the Ranger’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Ranger Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Ranger Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, proficiency in one skill of your choice from the Ranger’s skill list, and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Ranger’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Ranger Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
充盈着原初魔法的漫游武者

游侠核心特质

关键属性

敏捷和感知

生命骰

每游侠等级 D10

豁免熟练项

力量与敏捷

技能熟练项

从驯兽、运动、洞悉、调查、自然、察觉、隐匿和生存中选择三项

武器熟练项

简易武器和军用武器

护甲训练

轻甲、中甲、重甲和盾牌

初始装备

选择 A 或 B ：(A) 镶钉皮甲， 弯刀，短剑，长弓，20 支箭，箭袋，德鲁伊法器（槲寄生枝条），探索套组，和 7 GP；或（B）150 GP

离开城镇的喧嚣，即是茂密的森林和广袤的原野。也正是游侠们进行无尽守望之地。他们向掠食者们学习如何追踪猎物，并借助荒野中的灌木丛和碎石在阴影中潜行。
熟悉荒野的游侠们从中获得了利用大自然魔力施展法术的能力。为保护世界免受怪物和暴君的侵袭，游侠的天赋和魔法往往都需要经历刀口舔血般的磨练。

成为游侠...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“游侠核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“游侠特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“游侠核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰，军用武器熟练项，从游侠技能熟练项中选择其一，以及轻甲、中甲和盾牌训练。
  • 获得“游侠特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2章的兼职规则来确定可用的法术位。

original:
You can throw aside all concern for defense to attack with increased ferocity. When you make your first attack roll on your turn, you can decide to attack recklessly. Doing so gives you Advantage on attack rolls using Strength until the start of your next turn, but attack rolls against you have Advantage during that time.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking whether you are reckless or not but it does not automate Advantage on your attacks or attacks against you.
translation:
你可以抛弃一切对防御的顾虑来发起更加狂乱的攻击。你在自己回合中进行第一次攻击检定时，可以不顾一切地发起攻击。若如此做，直到你的下个回合开始时，你使用力量进行的攻击检定具有优势，但在此期间所有以你为目标的攻击检定也具有优势。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一种主动效应，用于跟进你是否鲁莽，但它不会自动为你或针对你的攻击赋予优势。

original: Once per turn, when you use a maneuver, you can roll [[/r 1d8]] and use the number rolled instead of expending a Superiority Die.
translation: 每回合一次，当你使用战技时，你可以不消耗卓越骰，转而骰 [[/r 1d8]] ，将掷点结果作为替代。

original:
Your supernatural focus helps you close off a foe’s retreat. When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, you can reduce the creature’s Speed to 0 until the end of the current turn. You can then move up to half your Speed as part of the same Reaction. This movement doesn’t provoke Opportunity Attacks.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will reduce the enemies Speed to 0.
translation:
你超自然的专注力使你可以拦截敌人撤退。你以借机攻击中命中一个生物时，该生物在本回合剩下时间内的速度降至 0。随后你可以在该攻击后立刻移动至多相当于你速度一半的距离，本次移动是原反应的一部分。且本次移动不引起借机攻击。

Foundry Note

该特性包含可将敌人移动速度归零的主动效应。

original: Taking damage can’t break your Concentration on Hunter’s Mark.
translation: 受到伤害不会影响你维持猎人印记的专注。

original:
Your Rage can keep you fighting despite grievous wounds. If you drop to 0 Hit Points while your Rage is active and don't die outright, you can make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. If you succeed, your Hit Points instead change to a number equal to twice your Barbarian level.

Each time you use this feature after the first, the DC increases by 5. When you finish a Short or Long Rest, the DC resets to 10.

Foundry Note

This feature will automatically increase the DC by 5 if you consume the resource when activating it. It will also automatically reset to 10 after a Short or Long Rest.
translation:
你狂暴的力量让你即使身受重伤也能持续战斗。你的狂暴激活期间，如果你的生命值降至 0 且并未立即死亡，则你可以进行一次DC 10 的体质豁免。成功则你的生命值将变为你野蛮人等级的两倍。

第一次使用此特性后，每当你再次使用此特性时其体质豁免DC提高 5。当你完成一次短休或长休后其DC重置为 10。

Foundry Note

此特性在您激活时若消耗资源，其DC会自动加 5。在短休或长休后，其数值会自动重置为 10。

original:
Whenever you make an ability check that uses one of your skill or tool proficiencies, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the minimum roll of 10 on your skill and tool proficiencies.
translation:
你自身技能经过精炼而更趋于完美。每当你进行的属性检定可以使用熟练加值时，你可以将 d20 骰中 9 或以下的结果都视为 10。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个自动生效的主动效应，使你的技能与工具熟练项骰值保底为 10。

original:
Thanks to your athleticism, you have Advantage on Initiative rolls and Strength (Athletics) checks.

In addition, immediately after you score a Critical Hit, you can move up to half your Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically grants Advantage on Initiative rolls.
translation:
平日的训练锻打出坚实的体能，你的先攻和力量（运动）检定具有优势。

此外，当你造成重击后，你可以马上移动至多等于速度一半的距离。本次移动不会引发借机攻击。

Foundry Note

该特性会自动赋予先攻掷骰的优势。

original:
You can sweep your Psychic Blades through a creature’s mind. When you use your Psychic Blades to deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature, you can force that target to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus). If the save fails, the target has the Stunned condition for 1 minute. The Stunned target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a Long Rest unless you expend three Psionic Energy Dice (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

The Rend Mind (Free) activity includes a free use of this feature. The Rend Mind activity will consume three Psionic Energy Dice. Both activities include the save and an Active Effect that applies the Stunned condition.
translation:
你能让你的念刃直接切削一个生物的心智。当你使用心灵之刃对一个生物造成偷袭攻击伤害时，你能迫使其进行一次感知豁免（DC = 8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的敏捷调整值）。若豁免失败，目标将陷入长达一分钟的震慑。被震慑的目标可以在他的回合结束时重复豁免，如果成功这一效应将结束。
当你使用该特性后，直到你完成一次长休为止你都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗三枚灵能骰来再次使用该特性。

Foundry Note

 撕裂心智（免费）行动自带一次本特性免费使用次数。撕裂心智行动将消耗三次灵能骰使用次数。二者均包含： 目标生物需进行豁免检定、施加震慑状态的主动效果。

original: When you deal Sneak Attack damage with your Psychic Blades
translation: 当你使用心灵之刃对一个生物造成偷袭攻击伤害时

original: When you deal Sneak Attack damage with your Psychic Blades
translation: 当你使用心灵之刃对一个生物造成偷袭攻击伤害时

original: The target has the Stunned condition for 1 minute. The Stunned target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
translation: 你将陷入长达 1 分钟的震慑。你可以在施加者的回合结束时重复豁免，如果成功这一效应将结束。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock, a Warlock Cantrip That Deals Damage via an Attack Roll

Choose one of your known Warlock cantrips that requires an attack roll. When you hit a Large or smaller creature with that cantrip, you can push the creature up to 10 feet straight away from you.

Repeatable. You can gain this invocation more than once. Each time you do so, choose a different eligible cantrip.

Foundry Note

The Make Repelling activity can be used to enchant a cantrip which adds ", Repelling" as a reminder.
translation:
先决条件: 2 级及以上的魔契师，知晓可造成伤害的魔契师戏法

选择一道你已知的需要一次攻击检定的魔契师戏法。当你用该戏法命中了一个大型或更小的生物，你可以将目标推开至多 10 尺。

可复选 Repeatable. 你可以多次选择本祈唤。每次这么做时，你都必须选择不同的戏法。

Foundry Note

释放斥力 行动可用于为一个法术附魔，添加“斥力”作为提示。

original: Choose one of your known Warlock cantrips that requires an attack roll. When you hit a Large or smaller creature with that cantrip, you can push the creature up to 10 feet straight away from you.
translation: 选择一道你已知的需要一次攻击检定的魔契师戏法。当你用该戏法命中了一个大型或更小的生物，你可以将目标推开至多 10 尺。

original:
Your connection to the plane of absolute order allows you to equalize chaotic moments. When a creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself is about to roll a d20 with Advantage or Disadvantage, you can take a Reaction to prevent the roll from being affected by Advantage and Disadvantage.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
你与绝对秩序之位面的联系使你能重整混沌的时刻。当你 60 尺内一个你可见的生物即将带着优势或是劣势进行一次检定时，你可以用反应使这次检定免受优势或劣势的影响。

你可以使用此能力的次数等同于你的魅力调整值（至少 1 次）。当你完成一次长休后，你重获全部已消耗的使用次数。

original: When a creature you can see within 60 feet is about to roll d20 with Advantage/Disadvantage
translation: 当你 60 尺内一个你可见的生物即将带着优势或是劣势进行一次检定时

original:
When you use Lay On Hands on a creature, you can also remove one or more of the following conditions from the creature: Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Paralyzed, or Stunned. You must expend 5 Hit Points from the healing pool of Lay On Hands for each of these conditions you remove; those points don’t also restore Hit Points to the creature.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Scale prompt for selecting how many conditions you would like to remove that will automatically consume the correct number from your Lay on Hands pool.
translation:
当你对一个生物使用圣疗时，你可以终止该生物身上一种或更多种类的效应：目盲、魅惑、耳聋、恐慌、麻痹或震慑。你每终止一个效应，都需要花费圣疗的 5 点治疗能量；这些治疗能量不会恢复该生物的生命值。

显示

Foundry Note

该特性内置调节滑块，允许通过拖拽方式选定拟清除的异常状态数量，系统将根据所选数值自动扣除对应次数的圣疗池使用次数。

original: When you take damage from a creature that is within 5 feet of you, you can take a Reaction to make one melee attack against that creature, using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike.
translation: 当你身边 5 尺内的生物对你造成伤害时，你可以用反应以武器或徒手打击对其发动一次近战攻击。

original: When you take damage from a creature within 5 feet of you
translation: 当你身边 5 尺内的生物对你造成伤害时

original:
You can unleash the aberrant truth hidden within yourself. As a Bonus Action, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point or more to magically alter your body for 10 minutes. For each Sorcery Point you spend, you gain one of the following benefits of your choice, the effects of which last until the alteration ends.

Aquatic Adaptation. You gain a Swim Speed equal to twice your Speed, and you can breathe underwater. Gills grow from your neck or flare behind your ears, and your fingers become webbed or you grow wriggling cilia.

Glistening Flight. You gain a Fly Speed equal to your Speed, and you can hover. As you fly, your skin glistens with mucus or otherworldly light.

See the Invisible. You can see any Invisible creature within 60 feet of yourself that isn’t behind Total Cover. Your eyes also turn black or become writhing sensory tendrils.

Wormlike Movement. Your body, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, becomes slimy and pliable. You can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch, and you can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or the Grappled condition.

Foundry Note

The Expend Sorcery Points activity will let you select the number of Sorcery Points you would like to expend. It includes an Active Effect for each option which can be used for tracking but does not automate their changes.
translation:
你能够释放出潜藏在你内部扭曲的真实形态。以一个附赠动作，你使用1点或更多的术法点以魔法性地转变形态，持续 10 分钟。你每消耗 1 术法点，你便可以从下述内容中选择一项，在转变形态期间你同时获得你选择的每项效应的增益：

水栖适应。 你获得等同于你两倍速度的游泳速度，且你能在水下呼吸。不止如此，你的脖子两侧会长出鳃、或鳃在耳后呈扇状翻出、或你的手指变成蹼趾、或是有卷曲的纤毛从你的衣服底下延展出来。

浮光空游。 你获得等同于你速度的飞行速度，并能悬浮。当你飞行时，你的皮肤表面流出发光的粘液、或是散发出异界的光芒。

看破隐形。 你能看见周围 60 尺内的隐形生物，前提是其对你来说不处于全掩护。你的眼睛也会变成黑色、或是变成扭动的感官触须。

虫躯蠕行。 你的身体和你携带的装备都变得柔韧粘滑。你能够轻松穿过最窄 1 寸宽的狭窄空间而不用挤进去，且你可以消耗 5 尺移动速度以脱离非魔法的束缚状态、或被擒抱的状态。

Foundry Note

消耗术法点 行动启用时，可通过下拉菜单自主设定消耗的术法点数量。系统将为每个选项生成独立的主动效应以供资源跟进，但数值变更需手动更改。

original:
When a creature misses you with a melee attack roll, you can take a Reaction and expend one Superiority Die to make a melee attack roll with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike against the creature. If you hit, add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage.

Foundry Note

The Riposte Damage reaction activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog and will consume a use of your Superiority Die.
translation:
当一个生物对你发动了一次近战攻击检定但失手时，你可以执行一个反应并消耗 1 枚卓越骰使用武器或徒手打击对其发动一次近战攻击检定。如果该攻击命中，则将卓越骰加在此攻击的伤害掷骰中。

Foundry Note

反击伤害 反应行动激活时，可在掷骰对话框中指定此次反击的伤害类型，该操作将消耗 1 次卓越骰使用次数。

original: When a creature misses you with a melee attack roll
translation: 当一个生物对你发动了一次近战攻击检定但失手时

original: You can cast any spell as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.YSB1QtxZW2BI9f4Y#casting-without-slots]{Ritual} if that spell has the Ritual tag and the spell is in your spellbook. You needn’t have the spell prepared, but you must read from the book to cast a spell in this way.
translation: 如果法术带有仪式标签，且该咒语在你的法术书中， 你可以以 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.YSB1QtxZW2BI9f4Y#casting-without-slots]{仪式} 的形式施放该法术。你无需准备该法术，但你必须阅读法术书才能以这种方式施法。

original:
A Dexterous Expert in Stealth and Subterfuge

Core Rogue Traits

Primary Ability

Dexterity

Hit Point Die

D8 per Rogue level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Dexterity and Intelligence

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 4: Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, or Stealth

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons and Martial weapons that have the Finesse or Light property

Tool Proficiencies

Thieves’ Tools

Armor Training

Light armor

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Short­sword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepShortbow00]{Shortbow}, 20 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoArrows0000]{Arrows}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulThievesToo]{Thieves’ Tools}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBurglarsPac]{Burglar’s Pack}, and [[/award 8GP]]; or (B) [[/award 100GP]]

Rogues rely on cunning, stealth, and their foes’ vulnerabilities to get the upper hand in any situation. They have a knack for finding the solution to just about any problem. A few even learn magical tricks to supplement their other abilities. Many Rogues focus on stealth and deception, while others refine skills that help them in a dungeon environment, such as climbing, finding and disarming traps, and opening locks.
