In combat, Rogues prioritize subtle strikes over brute strength. They would rather make one precise strike than wear an opponent down with a barrage of blows.

Some Rogues began their careers as criminals, while others used their cunning to fight crime. Whatever a Rogue’s relation to the law, no common criminal or officer of the law can match the subtle brilliance of the greatest Rogues.

Becoming a Rogue …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Rogue Traits table.
  • Gain the Rogue’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Rogue Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Rogue Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency in one skill of your choice from the Rogue’s skill list, proficiency with Thieves’ Tools, and training with Light armor.
  • Gain the Rogue’s level 1 features, which are listed in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbRogue00000000.JournalEntryPage.gJV8iDqdNhRMLi5r#class-features]{Rogue Features table}.
translation:
专精于潜行与诡计的灵巧大师 A Dexterous Expert in Stealth and Subterfuge

游荡者核心特质

关键属性

敏捷

生命骰

每游荡者等级 D8

豁免熟练

智力与敏捷

技能熟练

从体操、运动、欺瞒、洞悉、威吓、调查、察觉、游说、巧手、隐匿中选择四项

武器熟练

简易武器和具有灵巧或轻型属性的军用武器

工具熟练

盗贼工具

护甲受训

轻甲

起始装备

(A) 皮甲，两把匕首，一把短剑，一把短弓，20 支箭，箭袋，盗贼工具，窃贼套组和 8 GP；或(B)100 GP

游荡者依靠隐匿与技巧，并针对敌人的弱点获得优势。他们总有解决问题的诀窍。其中少数还会学习运用诡术魔法来作为其能力的补充。很多游荡者专注于潜行和骗术，而另一些则精于针对地城环境的有效技能，诸如攀爬、搜索、解除装置和开锁。
战斗时的游荡者更偏爱狡猾而非蛮横。与其用密集攻击放倒敌人，他们更喜欢进行精准打击。
有些游荡者以犯罪为生，但也有些使用其技巧打击犯罪。每当游荡者涉及律法时，那些寻常罪犯或执法官员都无法匹敌最强大游荡者的才智。

成为游荡者...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“游荡者核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“游荡者特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“游荡者核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰，从游荡者技能熟练项中选择其一，盗贼工具熟练项，以及轻甲训练。
  • 获得@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbRogue00000000.JournalEntryPage.gJV8iDqdNhRMLi5r#class-features]{游荡者特性表} 中列出的 1 级特性。

original:
Your Speed increases by 10 feet while you aren’t wearing Heavy armor. You also have a Climb Speed and a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which increases your Speed by 10 feet. It does not automatically grant an equivalent Climb and Swim Speed though. It can be disabled if you choose to wear Heavy armor.
translation:
你在未着装重甲时速度提升 10 尺。同时，你获得等于你速度的攀爬速度和游泳速度。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个使速度提升 10 尺的主动效应，但不会同步赋予等量的攀爬速度与游泳速度。若装备重甲则此效果自动失效。

original:
When you take the Attack action, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity to imbue one Melee weapon that you are holding with positive energy. For 10 minutes or until you use this feature again, you add your Charisma modifier to attack rolls you make with that weapon (minimum bonus of +1), and each time you hit with it, you cause it to deal its normal damage type or Radiant damage.

The weapon also emits Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light 20 feet beyond that.

You can end this effect early (no action required). This effect also ends if you aren’t carrying the weapon.
translation:
当你执行攻击动作时，你可以消耗一次引导神力特性将你正持握的一把武器注入正能量，来作为攻击动作的一部分。效果持续10分钟直到再次使用该特性，你使用该武器进行攻击检定时可以加上你的魅力调整值（至少为 +1），且命中时你可以选择造成正常的伤害类型还是光耀伤害。

该武器同时提供 20 尺半径的明亮光照，该范围外再延伸出20尺微光光照。

你可以提前终止该效应（无需执行动作）。当你不再携带这把武器时，该效应终止。

original: While studying magic, you also specialized in another field of study. Choose one of the following skills in which you have proficiency: Arcana, History, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, or Religion. You have Expertise in the chosen skill.
translation: 学习法术之余，你也在钻研其他的学术领域，从下列技能中选择一项你具有熟练的技能：奥秘、历史、自然或宗教，你获得该技能的专精。

original: You can create pockets of relative safety within the effects of your evocations. When you cast an Evocation spell that affects other creatures that you can see, you can choose a number of them equal to 1 plus the spell’s level. The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell, and they take no damage if they would normally take half damage on a successful save.
translation: 你的塑能学派法术作用范围里可以保留一小部分相对安全的区域。当你施展一个会影响你可见的其他生物的塑能学派法术时，你能从中指定数量等同于 1 + 该法术环阶的生物。被指定的生物进行对抗该法术的豁免时将直接成功，且如果法术在豁免成功后仍然造成一半的伤害，这些生物不会承受任何伤害。

original:
Whenever you use Turn Undead, you can roll a number of d8s equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1d8, currently [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]) and add the rolls together. Each Undead that fails its saving throw against that use of Turn Undead takes Radiant damage equal to the roll's total. This damage doesn't end the turn effect.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used in place of Turn Undead. It consumes a use of Channel Divinity, includes the Save, Active Effects for the conditions, and this feature's damage roll.
translation:
每当你使用驱散亡灵时，你都可以投掷等于你感知调整值枚d8（最少 1d8，当前 [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]])，而每个在对抗驱散亡灵的豁免中失败的亡灵都将受到等同于骰值之和的光耀伤害。此伤害不会终止驱散效应。

Foundry Note

该特性可替代驱散不死生物来使用。它会消耗 1 次“引导神力”的使用次数，引导神力：驱散不死生物 行动包含豁免、主动效果以及该特性所造成的伤害掷骰。
引导神力：驱散不死生物

original:
When you or an ally within 60 feet of you is about to make a Death Saving Throw, you can unleash radiant energy to save the creature. The creature regains Hit Points equal to half its Hit Point maximum and can end the &Reference[Prone] condition on itself. Each creature of your choice that is within 30 feet of the creature takes Radiant damage equal to 2d8 plus your Charisma modifier, and each has the &Reference[Blinded] condition until the end of the current turn.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

Healing up to half their Hit Point maximum is not automated but the Damage activity includes the relevant targeting template and damage roll. It also includes an Active Effect which applies the Blinded condition.
translation:
你引导的光耀能量能让你抵抗死亡。当你或 60 尺内的一个盟友将要进行一次死亡豁免时，你可以释放出一道光能来拯救那个生物。该生物恢复等于其最大生命值一半的生命值且同时结束其 &Reference[Prone] 状态。之后，每个由你选择的位于该生物 30 尺范围内生物的都将受到 2d8 + 你的魅力调整值点的光耀伤害，并陷入 &Reference[Blinded] 状态直至当前回合结束。

一旦你使用了此特性，你都无法再使用它直到你完成一次长休。

Foundry Note

治疗至多其生命值上限一半的效果需手动操作，但伤害行动已包含对应选择目标的测量模板与伤害骰。该能力还附带一个施加目盲状态的主动效应。

original: When you or an ally within 60 feet of you is about to make a Death Saving Throw
translation: 当你或 60 尺内的一个盟友将要进行一次死亡豁免时

original:
You have a limited well of physical and mental stamina that you can draw on. As a Bonus Action, you can use it to regain Hit Points equal to 1d10 plus your Fighter level.

You can use this feature twice. You regain one expended use when you finish a Short Rest, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

When you reach certain Fighter levels, you gain more uses of this feature, as shown in the Second Wind column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFighter000000.JournalEntryPage.wDELe3k25FQvYdrq#class-features]{Fighter Features} table.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically scales in usage and recovers the correct number of uses on a Short and Long Rest.
translation:
你的身心都储有底力，关键时刻尤为重要。你能以一个附赠动作恢复生命值，其总值为1d10 ＋ 你的战士职业等级。

你可以使用该特性两次。完成一次短休后，你恢复一次已消耗的使用次数。完成长休后将恢复所有已消耗的使用次数。

该特性的可用次数将随着战士职业等级的提升而增加，具体数值见 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFighter000000.JournalEntryPage.wDELe3k25FQvYdrq#class-features]表中“回气”一栏。

Foundry Note

该特性会依据使用情况自动调整，并在短休和长休时恢复正确的使用次数。

original:
You’ve trained to get into especially hard-to-reach places, granting you these benefits.

Climber. You gain a Climb Speed equal to your Speed.

Jumper. You can determine your &Reference[Jumping]{jump} distance using your Dexterity rather than your Strength.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically add the Climb Speed and will have to be added manually.
translation:
你接受了训练，能够进入难以到达的地方，这为你提供了以下增益。

攀爬者。 你获得等同于你速度值的攀爬速度。

跳跃者。 你可以用你的敏捷而不是力量来计算你的跳跃距离。

Foundry Note

该特性不会自动添加攀爬速度，必须手动添加。

original:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

If you make an attack roll for a spell and miss, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to reroll the d20, and you must use the new roll.

You can use Seeking Spell even if you’ve already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
translation:
消耗：1 术法点

当你为一道法术进行一次攻击检定并未命中时，你可以使用 1 术法点重投那个 d20。你必须使用重投的结果。

即使你已经在一道法术上使用了其他超魔，你仍然可以使用追踪法术。

original: When you make an attack roll for a spell and miss
translation: 当你为一道法术进行一次攻击检定并未命中时

original:
Through sheer force of will, you can remove one of the following conditions from yourself at the end of each of your turns: &Reference[Charmed apply=false], &Reference[Frightened apply=false], or &Reference[Poisoned apply=false].

In addition, forgoing food and drink doesn't give you levels of &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false].
translation:
凭借强大的意志力，每回合结束时，你可以结束一个正影响你的 &Reference[Charmed apply=false]、&Reference[Frightened apply=false] 或 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态。

此外，放弃进食饮水将不会上涨你的 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] 等级。

original:
You have learned to draw on the power of the Shadow­fell, gaining the following benefits.

Darkness. You can expend 1 Focus Point to cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness} spell without spell components. You can see within the spell's area when you cast it with this feature. While the spell persists, you can move its area of Darkness to a space within 60 feet of yourself at the start of each of your turns.

Darkvision. You gain Darkvision with a range of 60 feet. If you already have Darkvision, its range increases by 60 feet.

Shadowy Figments. You know the Minor Illusion spell. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

Foundry Note

The Expend Focus Point activity expends a use and you can then use the [[/item Darkness]] spell which is granted to you at this level.

This feature includes an Active Effect that increases your Darkvision.

You are granted the Minor Illusion spell when you reach this level.
translation:
你掌握了如何唤出堕影冥界的力量，获得以下好处：

黑暗术。 你可以消耗 1 点功力以施展黑暗术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00] 而无需任何法术材料。你能看透你用此特性创造的黑暗区域。法术持续时间内，每回合开始时，你可以移动黑暗区域至多 60 尺的距离。

黑暗视觉。 你获得 60 尺黑暗视觉。如果你已经获得了黑暗视觉，则黑暗视觉范围额外增加 60 尺。

阴影幻象。 你知晓次级幻影。感知是你的施法属性。

Foundry Note

消耗功力 行动会消耗一次使用次数，随后你可施展当前等级解锁的 [[/item Darkness]]。

此特性包含一个主动效应，可提升你的黑暗视觉范围。

达到此等级后，你将自动获得次级幻影法术。

original: While entirely within Dim Light or Darkness, you can use a Bonus Action to teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in Dim Light or Darkness. You then have Advantage on the next melee attack you make before the end of the current turn.
translation: 你处于微光光照或黑暗环境时，可以用附赠动作传送至多 60 尺，到达一个你能看见且未被占据还必须同样处于微光光照或黑暗环境中的区域。随后直至你本回合结束前，你下一次发动近战攻击时具有优势。

original: While entirely within Dim Light or Darkness
translation: 你处于微光光照或黑暗环境时

original: When a creature makes an attack roll against you, you can take a Reaction to impose Disadvantage on that roll. Whether the attack hits or misses, you can then teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.
translation: 当一个生物对你发动了一次攻击检定时，你能用反应对这次检定施加劣势。不管那次攻击命中或失手，你都能在那之后传送至你 30 尺范围内的一处未被占据的、你可见的空间。

original: When a creature makes an attack roll against you
translation: 当一个生物对你发动了一次攻击检定时

original: When you cast a spell targeting yourself, you can also affect your Primal Companion beast with the spell if the beast is within 30 feet of you.
translation: 当你施展一个目标为自身的法术时，如果你的原初野兽处于你身边 30 尺范围内，则该法术效应同时也作用于你的原初野兽。

original:
Choose two level 3 spells in your spellbook as your signature spells. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast each of them once at level 3 without expending a spell slot. When you do so, you can’t cast them in this way again until you finish a Short or Long Rest. To cast either spell at a higher level, you must expend a spell slot.

Foundry Note

The Make Signature activity can be used to enchant two spells which marks them as "Always Prepared" and adds ", Signature" to their title for easy identification.

The Expend First Spell and Expend Second Spell activities can be used for tracking your free use of each spell and refresh on a Short and Long Rest.
translation:
从你的法术书中选择两道三环法术作为你的招牌法术。你总是准备这些法术，且能不消耗法术位地以三环施展每道法术各一次。此特性一经使用，直到完成一次短休或长休都不能再次以此法施展这两道法术。如果你想升环施展这些法术，则你必须像平时一样消耗一个法术位。

Foundry Note

确定招牌 行动可用于附魔两个法术，标记为“始终准备”，并在其标题中添加 “招牌”，以便于识别。

消耗第一个法术和 消耗第二个法术行动可以用来跟进您对每个法术的免费使用，并在短休和长休时刷新。

original: Choose two level 3 spells in your spellbook as your signature spells. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast each of them once at level 3 without expending a spell slot. When you do so, you can’t cast them in this way again until you finish a Short or Long Rest. To cast either spell at a higher level, you must expend a spell slot.
translation: 从你的法术书中选择两道三环法术作为你的招牌法术。你总是准备这些法术，且能不消耗法术位地以三环施展每道法术各一次。此特性一经使用，直到完成一次短休或长休都不能再次以此法施展这两道法术。如果你想升环施展这些法术，则你必须像平时一样消耗一个法术位。

original:
Your cunning mind is exceptionally difficult to control. You gain proficiency in Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

Foundry Note

These proficiencies are granted automatically as you level up.
translation:
你狡猾的头脑很难被人控制。你获得感知豁免与魅力豁免的熟练项。

Foundry Note

这些熟练项会随着等级提升自动赋予。

original:
You can take a Reaction when you fall to reduce any damage you take from the fall by an amount equal to five times your Monk level.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Reduce activity which can be used to restore lost Hit Points equal to five times your Monk level.
translation:
当你要承受坠落伤害时，你可以使用反应将伤害减少等同于五倍武僧职业等级的数值。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项调息行动，可恢复相当于武僧等级五倍的已损失生命值。

original:
Your magical smite now radiates protective energy. Whenever you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]{Divine Smite}, you and your allies have Half Cover while in your Aura of Protection. The aura has this benefit until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which provides the Half Cover status but it is not automatically granted as creatures enter/exit your aura.
translation:
驱动魔法的斩击现在也会辐射出保护性的光辉。当你施放 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDivineSmit]时，你和你处在你守护灵光中的盟友视作处于半身掩护下。该效果持续到你下一回合开始时。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个可提供半身掩护状态的主动效应，但当生物进入或离开你的灵光范围时，此状态不会自动生效。

original:
You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe’s distraction. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack roll if you have Advantage on the roll and the attack uses a Finesse or a Ranged weapon. The extra damage’s type is the same as the weapon’s type.

You don’t need Advantage on the attack roll if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the target, the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition, and you don’t have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

The extra damage increases as you gain Rogue levels, as shown in the Sneak Attack column of the Rogue Features table.

Current Sneak Attack Damage: [[lookup @scale.rogue.sneak-attack]]

Foundry Note

Your sneak attack damage will automatically scale as you level up. You can select the damage type in the damage roll's dialog box.
translation:
你知道如何精确地攻击分心的敌人。每当你的攻击命中一个生物时，如果该攻击的攻击检定带有优势，则可以造成额外 1d6 的伤害。该伤害每回合可以产生一次，且造成伤害的攻击必须使用带灵巧属性的武器或远程武器。额外伤害的类型与该武器的类型相同。

如果目标生物身边 5 尺内还有其他与之敌对的未失能生物，则只要你的攻击检定不具有劣势，也可以发动偷袭。

你的偷袭伤害也将会随游荡者职业等级的提升而提高，其具体数值见游荡者特性表。

当前偷袭伤害： [[lookup @scale.rogue.sneak-attack]]

Foundry Note

你的偷袭伤害会随着等级提升而自动增加。你可以在伤害掷骰的对话框中选择伤害类型。

original:
A Dazzling Mage Filled with Innate Magic

Core Sorcerer Traits

Primary Ability

Charisma

Hit Point Die

D6 per Sorcerer level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Constitution and Charisma

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, or Religion

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons

Armor Training

None

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcCrystal000]{crystal}), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDungeoneers]{Dungeoneer’s Pack}, and [[/award 28GP]]; or (B) [[/award 50GP]]

Sorcerers wield innate magic that is stamped into their being. Some Sorcerers can’t name the origin of their power, while others trace it to strange events in their personal or family history. The blessing of a dragon or a dryad at a baby’s birth or the strike of lightning from a clear sky might spark a Sorcerer’s gift. So too might the gift of a deity, exposure to the strange magic of another plane of existence, or a glimpse into the inner workings of reality. Whatever the origin, the result is an indelible mark on the Sorcerer, a churning magic that can be passed down through generations.

Sorcerers don’t learn magic; the raw, roiling power of magic is part of them. The essential art of a Sorcerer is learning to harness and channel that innate magic, allowing the Sorcerer to discover new and staggering ways to unleash their power. As Sorcerers master their innate magic, they grow more attuned to its origin, developing distinct powers that reflect its source.

Sorcerers are rare. Some family lines produce exactly one Sorcerer in every generation, but most of the time, the talents of sorcery appear as a fluke. People who have this magical power soon discover that it doesn’t like to stay quiet. A Sorcerer’s magic wants to be wielded.

Becoming a Sorcerer …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Sorcerer Traits table.
  • Gain the Sorcerer’s level 1 features, which are listed in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSorcerer00000.JournalEntryPage.fsqRUA4acVXH4I3O#class-features]{Sorcerer Features table}.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die from the Core Sorcerer Traits table.
  • Gain the Sorcerer’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Sorcerer Features table. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.vcs4jfEKRxPCsgXm]{multiclassing rules} to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
魔力与生俱来的耀眼巫师

术士核心特质

关键属性

魅力

生命骰

每术士等级 D6

豁免熟练项

体质与魅力

技能熟练项

从奥秘、欺瞒、洞悉、威吓、游说或宗教中选择两项

武器熟练项

简易武器

护甲受训

无

初始装备

选择 A 或 B ：（A）短矛、2 把匕首、奥术法器（水晶）、地城套组和 28 GP；或（B）50 GP

术士的魔法力量与生俱来，这种魔力已经融进了他们的血脉里。有些术士已经说不清他们力量起源究竟是什么，而另一些术士认为自己的力量来自于他或是家族的某些奇遇。出生时受到龙或树灵的祝福，又或者万里无云降闪电，这些事情都有可能激起术法天赋的火苗。除此之外，神明的恩赐，暴露在另一个位面的怪诞魔法下，又或是一窥现实世界的内里，也有可能赐予术士力量。不论这股力量起源如何，所造成的结果已然成为术士身上不可磨灭的印记，那便是这世代传承的涌动魔法。
术士无需学习魔法，原始而沸腾的魔力本就已是他们的一部分。但他们只需要掌握驾驭引导天生魔力的方法，以此来寻获更高效，更强力的方式去释放他们的力量。随着术士慢慢掌握他们的魔力，他们与自己的术法起源也会越发协调，最终会发展出反映其来源的独特力量。
术士是罕见的。有些家族每一代都只会出现一个术士，不多也不少。不过大多数时候，术法天赋完全是偶然出现的。拥有这种魔法力量的人很快就会发现，这种力量不喜欢保持沉默。它想要自己被使用。

成为一个术士...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“术士核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSorcerer00000.JournalEntryPage.fsqRUA4acVXH4I3O#class-features]{术士特性表} 中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“术士核心特质”表中的生命骰。
  • 获得“术士特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.vcs4jfEKRxPCsgXm]{兼职规则} 来确定可用的法术位。

original:
When you finish a Short Rest, you can regain expended Sorcery Points, but no more than a number equal to half your Sorcerer level (round down). Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes 1 free user per Long Rest. Use it to automatically regain the correct number of Sorcery Points.
translation:
当你完成一次短休时，你可以恢复不大于你术士等级一半（向下取整）的已消耗术法点。

此特性一经使用，直到你完成一次长休为止不能再次使用。

Foundry Note

该特性每个长休包含 1 次免费使用次数，启用后可自动恢复对应数量的术法点。

original:
If you have no uses of Innate Sorcery left, you can use it if you spend 2 Sorcery Points when you take the Bonus Action to activate it.

In addition, while your Innate Sorcery feature is active, you can use up to two of your Metamagic options on each spell you cast.

Foundry Note

Use this feature to consume 2 Sorcery Points and restore a use of Innate Sorcery.
translation:
如果你的先天术法特性的使用次数耗尽，则你仍可以消耗 2 点术法点来用附赠动作继续激活该特性。

此外，在你的先天术法特性处于激活状态期间，你可以在你施展的每道法术上应用最多两次超魔法选项。

Foundry Note

使用此特性可消耗 2 点术法点，并恢复 1 次先天术法的使用次数。

original:
You can now use the following powers with your Psychic Blades.

Homing Strikes. If you make an attack roll with your Psychic Blade and miss the target, you can roll one Psionic Energy Die and add the number rolled to the attack roll. If this causes the attack to hit, the die is expended.

Psychic Teleportation. As a Bonus Action, you manifest a Psychic Blade, expend one Psionic Energy Die and roll it, and throw the blade at an unoccupied space you can see up to a number of feet away equal to 10 times the number rolled. You then teleport to that space, and the blade vanishes.

Foundry Note

The Homing Strikes activity will expend a die and provides a roll. If the check still fails you can refund the die.

The Psychic Teleportation activity expends a die and provides a roll. You can then place a template within the rolled range to indicate where you would like to teleport to (though you are not automatically teleported).
translation:
你的心灵之刃现在成为了你那充盈灵能之灵魂的具现，这使你能够通过以下的方式更好地控制它：

寻的斩击。 若在使用心灵之刃进行的攻击中失手，你可以掷 1 枚灵能骰，并将掷骰结果加到这次攻击检定中。如果这使攻击变为了命中，那枚灵能骰将被消耗。

心灵传送。以一个附赠动作，你塑造一把心灵之刃，消耗并投掷 1 枚灵能骰，将心灵之刃投掷到至多距离灵能骰结果数字 10 倍尺数的一处可见的未被占据的空间内。你传送到目标位置，同时那把心灵之刃将消失。

Foundry Note

寻的斩击行动需消耗 1 枚灵能骰并进行投掷。若检定仍未通过，你可收回消耗的灵能骰。

心灵传送行动会消耗 1 枚灵能骰并进行掷骰，随后你可在投掷结果范围内放置定位模板选择传送目标位置（但不会立即执行传送）。

original: Miss an Attack Roll with your Psychic Blades
translation: 若在使用心灵之刃进行的攻击中失手

original: Immediately after a creature under the effect of your Vow of Enmity hits or misses with an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to make a melee attack against that creature if it’s within range.
translation: 一个受你仇敌誓言影响的生物攻击命中或失手时，如果其身处你的近战武器攻击范围内，则你就可以用你的反应对其发动一次近战武器攻击。

original:
Strike Foes with Psionic Blades

A Soulknife strikes with the mind, cutting through barriers both physical and psychic. These Rogues discover psionic power within themselves and channel it to do their roguish work. As a Soulknife, your psionic abilities might have haunted you since childhood, revealing their full potential only as you experienced the stress of adventure. Or you might have sought out an order of psychic adepts and spent years learning how to manifest your power.
translation:
以念为刃屠戮敌手

魂刃者利用心灵的力量来攻击和渗透，击穿阻碍他们的物理和心灵障碍。这些盗贼在体内发现了灵能力量，并利用其来完成他们的老本行。作为一个魂刃者，你的灵能可能从你还是个孩子的时候就一直困扰着你，但直到你在面临冒险的压力时才完全显露潜能。又或者，你可能找到了一个隐居的灵能修士团，花了很多年的时间学习如何显现你的力量。

original:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic} spells prepared. In addition, you can cast Dispel Magic as a Bonus Action, and you can add your Proficiency Bonus to its ability check.

When you cast either spell with a spell slot, that slot isn’t expended if the spell fails to stop a spell.

Foundry Note

The spells are granted to you automatically as you level up.
translation:
你总是准备了 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCounterspe] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]。此外，你能以一个附赠动作施展解除魔法，且你能在其属性检定中加入你的熟练加值。

你消耗法术位施展其中任意一道法术时，若该法术未能成功阻止法术施展或未能成功解除法术效应，则你用于施展法术反制或解除魔法的法术位不会被消耗。

Foundry Note

当你升级时，这些法术会自动授予你。

original:
You have achieved such mastery over certain spells that you can cast them at will. Choose a level 1 and a level 2 spell in your spellbook that have a casting time of an action. You always have those spells prepared, and you can cast them at their lowest level without expending a spell slot. To cast either spell at a higher level, you must expend a spell slot.

Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can study your spellbook and replace one of those spells with an eligible spell of the same level from the book.

Foundry Note

The Master activity includes an enchantment that marks the spells as "Always Prepared" and adds ", Mastered" to their name for easy identification.

Uncheck the "Consumption" box when casting at the lowest level. You can drag multiple spells to the same chat card.
translation:
你对特定的法术精熟于心，以至于你可以将其随意施展。选择你法术书中的一个施法时间为动作的一环法术和一个二环法术，你总是准备这些法术，且能不消耗法术位地以最低环施展它们。如果你想升环施展这些法术，则你必须像平时一样消耗一个法术位。

每当你完成一次长休时，你可以研究你的法术书并将其中一个法术更换为另一个符合条件的同环阶法术。

Foundry Note

精通 行动包括一个附魔，将法术标记为“始终准备”，并在其名称后面加上“精通”，以便于识别。

在最低环阶施法时取消勾选“消耗”框。您可以将多个法术拖放到同一张聊天卡片上。

original:
You have Advantage on saving throws against spells, and you have Resistance to the damage of spells.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automate the Advantage or Resistance.

With your token selected you can either right click on the damage roll's chat card and select  Apply Half Damage or click the "1/2" button and then the  Apply button.
translation:
你抵抗法术时进行的豁免检定具有优势，且你对法术造成的伤害具有抗性。

Foundry Note

此功能不会自动授予优势或抗性。

选择指示物后，您可以右键单击伤害掷骰的聊天卡片并选择  应用一半伤害 或单击“1/2”按钮，然后单击  应用 按钮。

original:
You gain the ability to magically steal the knowledge of how to cast a spell from another spellcaster.

Immediately after a creature casts a spell that targets you or includes you in its area of effect, you can take a Reaction to force the creature to make an Intelligence saving throw. The DC equals your spell save DC. On a failed save, you negate the spell’s effect against you, and you steal the knowledge of the spell if it is at least level 1 and of a level you can cast (it doesn’t need to be a Wizard spell). For the next 8 hours, you have the spell prepared. The creature can’t cast it until the 8 hours have passed.

Once you steal a spell with this feature, you can’t use this feature again until you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
你获得盗取其他施法者施法知识的能力。

当一个生物施展的一个法术以你为目标，或其法术效应范围包含你所在区域时，你可以立即用你的反应强迫该生物以其施法属性调整值进行一次豁免。其DC等同于你的法术豁免DC。若其豁免失败，则你取消该法术对你的效应。如果该法术至少为一环且属于你可以施展的环阶（但不需要是法师法术），则你还可以盗取该法术的知识。在接下来的 8 小时内，你视为习得该法术且能用你的法术位施展该法术。而目标生物则无法施展该法术直至 8 小时过去。

一旦你用这个特性窃取了一个法术，直到你完成一次长休之前，你不能再次使用这个特性。

original: Immediately after a creature casts a spell that targets you or includes you in its area of effect
translation: 当一个生物施展的一个法术以你为目标，或其法术效应范围包含你所在区域时

original: This creature has had a spell stolen from it and cannot cast it for 8 hours.
translation: 你无法施展被窃取法术直至 8 小时过去。

original:
You have learned to cast spells through your bardic arts. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{chapter 7} for the rules on spellcasting. The information below details how you use those rules with Bard spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]{Bard spell list}.

Cantrips. You know two cantrips of your choice from the Bard spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplViciousMoc]{Vicious Mockery} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace one of your cantrips with another cantrip of your choice from the Bard spell list.

When you reach Bard levels 4 and 10, you learn another cantrip of your choice from the Bard spell list, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBard000000000.JournalEntryPage.V8pqIWlaL9GhY61t#class-features]{Bard Features} table.

Spell Slots. The Bard Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose four level 1 spells from the Bard spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplColorSpray]{Color Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW]{Dissonant Whispers}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Bard levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Bard Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional spells from the Bard spell list until the number of spells on your list matches the number on the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 3 Bard, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination.

If another Bard feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Bard spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace one spell on your list with another Bard spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your Bard spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Musical Instrument as a Spellcasting Focus for your Bard spells.
translation:
你在你的吟游艺术中学会了如何施展法术。参见 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{第 7 章} 有关施法的规则。下述信息将详述如何将这些规则应用于吟游诗人法术，吟游诗人法术详见本章后文职业描述中的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]。

戏法。你已知2个你选择的吟游诗人戏法。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplViciousMoc]

每当你获得一个吟游诗人等级时，你都能将通过此特性已知的其中一个戏法替换为另一个你所选择的吟游诗人戏法。

当你的吟游诗人等级达到4级和10级时，你都能习得另一个你所选择的吟游诗人戏法，如吟游诗人特性表中戏法一列所示。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI] 。

法术位。“吟游诗人特性”表记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1+ 环阶的法术。当你完成一次长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术。通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，从“吟游诗人法术列表“中选择四个 1 环法术。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplColorSpray]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor] 。

准备列表上的法术数量将随着你的吟游诗人等级而增加，正如“吟游诗人特性”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，从“吟游诗人法术列表”中选择额外的法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“吟游诗人特性”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 3 级吟游诗人，你的准备法术列表应该包括六个任意组合的 1 环或 2 环法术。

如果其他的吟游诗人特性给予了额外的已准备法术，这些法术不会计入你在该特性中的准备法术数量，但是这些法术对你而言仍算作吟游诗人法术。

改变你的准备法术。每当你获得一个吟游诗人等级时， 你可以将准备列表中的一个法术，替换为另一个你拥有法术位的吟游诗人法术。

施法属性。魅力是你施展吟游诗人法术的施法属性。

施法法器。你可以使用乐器作为吟游诗人法术的施法法器。

original:
You have learned to cast spells through prayer and meditation. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{chapter 7} for the rules on spellcasting. The information below details how you use those rules with Cleric spells, which appear on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell list}.

Cantrips. You know three cantrips of your choice from the Cleric spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSacredFlam]{Sacred Flame}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Cleric level, you can replace one of your cantrips with another cantrip of your choice from the Cleric spell list.

When you reach Cleric levels 4 and 10, you learn another cantrip of your choice from the Cleric spell list, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.acPyA6A4DQBSnuZB#class-features]{Cleric Features} table.

Spell Slots. The Cleric Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose four level 1 spells from the Cleric spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]{Shield of Faith} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Cleric levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Cleric Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional spells from the Cleric spell list until the number of spells on your list matches the number on the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 3 Cleric, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination.

If another Cleric feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Cleric spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your list of prepared spells, replacing any of the spells there with other Cleric spells for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your Cleric spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus for your Cleric spells.
translation:
你通过祈祷，冥想与奉献习得如何施法。参见 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{第 7 章} 有关施法的规则。下述信息将详述如何将这些规则应用于牧师法术，牧师法术详见本章后文职业描述中的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]。

戏法。 你已知牧师法术列表中 3 个你选择的戏法。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSacredFlam], 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]。

当你获得牧师等级时，你可以将一道已知戏法用另一道牧师戏法替换。

当你的牧师等级达到 4 级和 10 级时，你都能习得另一道你所选择的牧师戏法，如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.acPyA6A4DQBSnuZB#class-features]特性表中戏法一列所示。

法术位。< /strong> 牧师特性表显示了你可用于施放 1 环及以上法术的法术位数量。你在完成一次长休时恢复所有已消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术。 你准备了一系列一环或更高的法术，以供此特性施法使用。初始时，从牧师法术列表选择 4 个一环法术。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol], 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]。

你的准备列表上的法术数量将随着牧师等级而增加，正如“牧师特性”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，从“牧师法术列表”中选择额外的法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“牧师特性”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 3 级牧师，你的准备法术列表应该包括六个任意组合的 1 环或 2 环法术。

如果其他的牧师特性给予了额外的已准备法术，这些法术不会计入你在该特性中的准备法术数量，但是这些法术对你而言仍算作牧师法术。

改变你的准备法术。每当你完成一次长休后，你可以更改准备法术列表，将其中的任意个法术替换为其他你拥有法术位的牧师法术。

施法属性。 感知是你施展牧师法术的施法属性。

施法法器。你可以使用圣徽作为牧师法术的施法法器。

original:
You have learned to cast spells through studying the mystical forces of nature. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{chapter 7} for the rules on spellcasting. The information below details how you use those rules with Druid spells, which appear on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]{Druid spell list}.

Cantrips. You know two cantrips of your choice from the Druid spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplProduceFla]{Produce Flame} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Druid level, you can replace one of your cantrips with another cantrip of your choice from the Druid spell list.

When you reach Druid levels 4 and 10, you learn another cantrip of your choice from the Druid spell list, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbDruid00000000.JournalEntryPage.UCOh3zlvGxyk5jLr#class-features]{Druid Features} table.

Spell Slots. The Druid Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose four level 1 spells from the Druid spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{Thunderwave} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Druid levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Druid Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional spells from the Druid spell list until the number of spells on your list matches the number on the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 3 Druid, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination.

If another Druid feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Druid spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your list of prepared spells, replacing any of the spells with other Druid spells for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your Druid spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Druidic Focus as a Spellcasting Focus for your Druid spells.
translation:
你通过研究自然的神秘伟力学会了如何施展法术。参考 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{第 7 章} 的施法规则。下文为你详细说明了德鲁伊施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]的规则（具体法术列表见下文德鲁伊法术列表）

戏法。 你习得两个德鲁伊法术列表中的戏法。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplProduceFla]。

每当你获得一级德鲁伊等级，你便可以将一个已知戏法替换为另一个你所选 的德鲁伊戏法。

当你在此职业上达到 4 级和 10 级时，你习得一个额外的德鲁伊戏法，如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbDruid00000000.JournalEntryPage.UCOh3zlvGxyk5jLr#class-features]表中戏法数量一栏所示。

法术位。“德鲁伊特性”表记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1+ 环阶的法术。当你完成一次长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术。 通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，从“德鲁伊法术列表“中选择 4 个一环法术。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderwav]。

你的准备列表上的法术数量将随着德鲁伊等级而增加，正如“德鲁伊特性”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，从“德鲁伊法术列表”中选择额外的法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“德鲁伊特性”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 3 级德鲁伊，你的准备法术列表应该包括六个任意组合的一环或二环法术。

如果其他的德鲁伊特性给予了额外的已准备法术，这些法术不会计入你在该特性中的准备法术数量，但是这些法术对你而言仍算作德鲁伊法术。

改变你的准备法术。每当你完成一次长休后，你可以更改准备法术列表，将其中的任意个法术替换为其他你拥有法术位的德鲁伊法术。

施法属性。感知是你施展德鲁伊法术的施法属性。

施法法器。你可以使用德鲁伊法器作为德鲁伊法术的施法法器。

original:
You have learned to cast spells. See for the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules as an Eldritch Knight.

Cantrips. You know two cantrips of your choice from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Wizard spell list}. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofFrost]{Ray of Frost} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShockingGr]{Shocking Grasp} are recommended. Whenever you gain a Fighter level, you can replace one of these cantrips with another cantrip of your choice from the Wizard spell list.

When you reach Fighter level 10, you learn another Wizard cantrip of your choice.

Spell Slots. The Eldritch Knight Spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose three level 1 spells from the Wizard spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBurningHan]{Burning Hands}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplJump000000]{Jump}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Fighter levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Eldritch Knight Spellcasting table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional spells from the Wizard spell list until the number of spells on your list matches the number on the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 7 Fighter, your list of prepared spells can include five Wizard spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you gain a Fighter level, you can replace one spell on your list with another Wizard spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your Wizard spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use an Arcane Focus as a Spellcasting Focus for your Wizard spells.
translation:
你学会了如何施展法术。参见第 7 章有关 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{施法规则}。下述信息将详述如何将这些规则应用于奥法骑士。

戏法。 你已知 2 个你选择的 来自 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]的戏法（见该职业所列出的表格）。 推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofFrost] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShockingGr]每当你获得一个战士等级时，你都能将通过此特性已知的其中一个戏法替换为另一个你所选择的来自法师法术列表的戏法。

当你的战士等级达到 10 级时，你可以习得另一个你所选择的法师戏法

法术位。 奥法骑士施法表显示了你可用于施展1环及 以上法术的法术位数量。你在完成一次长休时恢复所有已消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术 。 通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，从“法师法术列表“中选择三个 1 环法术。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBurningHan], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplJump000000] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]。

你的准备列表上的法术数量将随着战士等级而增加，正如“奥法骑士施法”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，从“法师法术列表”中选择额外的法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“奥法骑士施法”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 7 级战士，你的准备法术列表应该包括五个任意组合的 1 环或 2 环法师法术。

改变你的准备法术。 每当你获得一个战士等级时， 你可以将准备列表中的一个法术，替换为另一个你拥有法术位的法师法术。

施法属性。 智力是你施展法师法术的施法属性

施法法器。 你可以使用奥术法器作为法师法术的施法法器。

original:
You have learned to cast spells through prayer and meditation. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Paladin spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.8yD9Jgp404hfZ9ie]{Paladin spell list}.

Spell Slots. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbPaladin000000.JournalEntryPage.A34CXe4HdzXHoBEl#class-features]{Paladin Features table} shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose two level 1 Paladin spells. Heroism and Searing Smite are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Paladin levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Paladin Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Paladin spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the Paladin Features table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you’re a level 5 Paladin, your list of prepared spells can include six Paladin spells of level 1 or 2 in any combination.

If another Paladin feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don’t count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Paladin spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace one spell on your list with another Paladin spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your Paladin spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus for your Paladin spells.
translation:
你学会通过冥想与祈祷施法。有关 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{第 7 章}。以下信息详细说明了如何将这些规则与圣武士法术结合使用。圣武士法术即该职业描述后的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.8yD9Jgp404hfZ9ie]中罗列的法术。

法术位。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbPaladin000000.JournalEntryPage.A34CXe4HdzXHoBEl#class-features]{圣武士特性}表记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1+ 环阶的法术。当你完成一次长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术位。

准备1+ 环法术。 通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，选择两个 1 环圣武士法术。推荐选择 英雄气概 和 炽焰斩。

你的准备列表上的法术数量将随着圣武士等级而增加，正如“圣武士特性”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，选择额外的圣武士法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“圣武士特性”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 5 级圣武士，你的准备法术列表应该包括六个任意组合的 1 环或 2 环圣武士法术。

如果其他的圣武士特性给予了额外的已准备法术，这些法术不会计入你在该特性中的准备法术数量，但是这些法术对你而言仍算作圣武士法术。

改变你的准备法术。 每当你完成一次长休后，你可以将准备列表中的一个法术，替换为另一个你拥有法术位的圣武士法术。

施法属性。魅力是你施展圣武士法术的施法属性。

施法法器。你可以使用圣徽作为圣武士法术的施法法器。

original:
You have learned to cast spells. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{the rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules as an Arcane Trickster.

Cantrips. You know three cantrips: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand} and two other cantrips of your choice from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Wizard spell list}. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMindSliver]{Mind Sliver} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Rogue level, you can replace one of your cantrips, except Mage Hand, with another Wizard cantrip of your choice.

When you reach Rogue level 10, you learn another Wizard cantrip of your choice.

Spell Slots. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbRogue00000000.JournalEntryPage.yiBzQeWdFjXrWxY2]{Arcane Trickster Spellcasting table} shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose three level 1 Wizard spells. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Rogue levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Arcane Trickster Spellcasting table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Wizard spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the Arcane Trickster Spellcasting table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you’re a level 7 Rogue, your list of prepared spells can include five Wizard spells of level 1 or 2 in any combination.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you gain a Rogue level, you can replace one spell on your list with another Wizard spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your Wizard spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use an Arcane Focus as a Spellcasting Focus for your Wizard spells.
translation:
你学会了如何施展法术。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{施法规则}详见第 7 章。以下信息旨在说明你作为一位诡术师如何使用这些规则：

戏法。 你已知三个戏法：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]和另外两个从 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]中选择的戏法（查看法师职业部分来获取完整法术列表）。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMindSliver] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]。

每当你获得游荡者等级时，你可以将 法师之手 以外的一个戏法替换为另一个由你选择的法师戏法。

当你达到游荡者 10 级时，你可以学习一个新的法师戏法。

法术位。 The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbRogue00000000.JournalEntryPage.yiBzQeWdFjXrWxY2]{诡术师施法表} 记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1+ 环阶的法术。当你完成一次长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术。 通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，从法师法术列表中选择三个 1 环法术。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe], 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00] 。

你的准备列表上的法术数量将随着游荡者等级而增加，正如“游荡者施法”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，从“法师法术列表”中选择额外的法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“游荡者施法”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 7 级游荡者，你的准备法术列表应该包括五个任意组合的 1 环或 2 环法师法术。

改变你的准备法术。 每当你获得一个游荡者等级，你可以将准备列表中的一个法术，替换为另一个你拥有法术位的法师法术。

施法属性。 智力是你施展法师法术的施法属性。

施法法器。 你可以使用奥术法器作为法师法术的施法法器。

original:
You have learned to channel the magical essence of nature to cast spells. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Ranger spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.5HnIk6HsrSxkvkz5]{Ranger spell list}.

Spell Slots. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbRanger0000000.JournalEntryPage.fgzoeAJE4EEUSOYQ#class-features]{Ranger Features table} shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose two level 1 Ranger spells. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnsnaringS]{Ensnaring Strike} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Ranger levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Ranger Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Ranger spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the Ranger Features table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you’re a level 5 Ranger, your list of prepared spells can include six Ranger spells of level 1 or 2 in any combination.

If another Ranger feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don’t count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Ranger spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace one spell on your list with another Ranger spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your Ranger spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Druidic Focus as a Spellcasting Focus for your Ranger spells.
translation:
你学会运用自然世界的魔法本源进行施法。有关@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{施法的规则} 请参见第 7 章。以下信息详细说明了如何将这些规则与游侠法术结合使用。游侠法术即该职业描述后的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.5HnIk6HsrSxkvkz5]中罗列的法术。

法术位。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbRanger0000000.JournalEntryPage.fgzoeAJE4EEUSOYQ#class-features]{游侠特性表} 记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1+ 环阶的法术。当你完成一次长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术。 通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，选择两个 1 环圣武士法术。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnsnaringS]。

你的准备列表上的法术数量将随着游侠等级而增加，正如“游侠特性”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，选择额外的游侠法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“游侠特性”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 5 级游侠，你的准备法术列表应该包括六个任意组合的 1 环或 2 环游侠法术。

如果其他的游侠特性给予了额外的已准备法术，这些法术不会计入你在该特性中的准备法术数量，但是这些法术对你而言仍算作游侠法术。

改变你的准备法术。 每当你完成一次长休后，你可以将准备列表中的一个法术，替换为另一个你拥有法术位的游侠法术。

施法属性。感知是你施展游侠法术的施法属性。

施法法器。你可以使用德鲁伊法器作为游侠法术的施法法器。

original:
Drawing from your innate magic, you can cast spells. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Sorcerer spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.VfZ5mH2ZuyFq82Ga]{Sorcerer spell list} later in the class’s description.

Cantrips. You know four Sorcerer cantrips of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShockingGr]{Shocking Grasp}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSorcerousB]{Sorcerous Burst} are recommended. Whenever you gain a Sorcerer level, you can replace one of your cantrips from this feature with another Sorcerer cantrip of your choice.

When you reach Sorcerer levels 4 and 10, you learn another Sorcerer cantrip of your choice, as shown in the Cantrips column of the Sorcerer Features table.

Spell Slots. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSorcerer00000.JournalEntryPage.fsqRUA4acVXH4I3O#class-features]{Sorcerer Features table} shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose two level 1 Sorcerer spells. Burning Hands and Detect Magic are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Sorcerer levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Sorcerer Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Sorcerer spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the Sorcerer Features table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you’re a level 3 Sorcerer, your list of prepared spells can include six Sorcerer spells of level 1 or 2 in any combination.

If another Sorcerer feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don’t count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Sorcerer spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you gain a Sorcerer level, you can replace one spell on your list with another Sorcerer spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your Sorcerer spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use an Arcane Focus as a Spellcasting Focus for your Sorcerer spells.
translation:
借助你的天生魔力，你可以施放法术。有关 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{施法的规则}请参见第 7 章。以下信息详细说明了如何将这些规则与术士法术结合使用。术士法术即该职业描述后的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.VfZ5mH2ZuyFq82Ga]中罗列的法术。

戏法。 你已知四个由你选择的术士戏法。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShockingGr] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSorcerousB] 每当你获得术士等级时，你可以将一个由该特性获得的戏法替换为另一个由你选择的术士戏法。

当你达到术士 4 级和 10 级时，你学习一个新的术士戏法，正如“术士特性”表中“戏法”一栏所示。

法术位。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSorcerer00000.JournalEntryPage.fsqRUA4acVXH4I3O#class-features]{术士特性表} 记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1+ 环阶的法术。当你完成一次长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术。 通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，选择两个 1 环术士法术。推荐选择 燃烧之手 和 侦测魔法。

你的准备列表上的法术数量将随着术士等级而增加，正如“术士特性”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，选择额外的术士法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“术士特性”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 3 级术士，你的准备法术列表应该包括六个任意组合的 1 环或 2 环术士法术。

如果其他的术士特性给予了额外的已准备法术，这些法术不会计入你在该特性中的准备法术数量，但是这些法术对你而言仍算作术士法术。

改变你的准备法术。每当你获得一个术士等级时，你可以将准备列表中的一个法术，替换为另一个你拥有法术位的术士法术。

施法属性。魅力是你施展术士法术的施法属性。

施法法器。 你可以使用奥术法器作为术士法术的施法法器。

original:
As a student of arcane magic, you have learned to cast spells. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{rules on spellcasting}. The information below details how you use those rules with Wizard spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Wizard spell list}.

Cantrips. You know three Wizard cantrips of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofFrost]{Ray of Frost} are recommended. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace one of your cantrips from this feature with another Wizard cantrip of your choice.

When you reach Wizard levels 4 and 10, you learn another Wizard cantrip of your choice, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWizard0000000.JournalEntryPage.g7cMRWzsgAsEF7zC#class-features]{Wizard Features table}.

Spellbook. Your wizardly apprenticeship culminated in the creation of a unique book: your spellbook. It is a Tiny object that weighs 3 pounds, contains 100 pages, and can be read only by you or someone casting @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}. You determine the book’s appearance and materials, such as a gilt-edged tome or a collection of vellum bound with twine.

The book contains the level 1+ spells you know. It starts with six level 1 Wizard spells of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeatherFal]{Feather Fall}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000]{Sleep}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{Thunderwave} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Wizard level after 1, add two Wizard spells of your choice to your spellbook. Each of these spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots, as shown in the Wizard Features table. The spells are the culmination of arcane research you do regularly.

Spell Slots. The Wizard Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To do so, choose four spells from your spellbook. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Wizard levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Wizard Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional Wizard spells until the number of spells on your list matches the number in the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you’re a level 3 Wizard, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination, chosen from your spellbook.

If another Wizard feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don’t count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Wizard spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your list of prepared spells, replacing any of the spells there with spells from your spellbook.

Spellcasting Ability. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your Wizard spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use an Arcane Focus or your spellbook as a Spellcasting Focus for your Wizard spells.
translation:
你已经入门了奥术魔法，学会了如何施展法术。参见第 7 章有关 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{施法的规则}。下述信息将详述如何将这些规则应用于法师法术，法师法术详见本章后文职业描述中的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]。

戏法。 你已知三个由你选择的法师戏法。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofFrost] 。每当你完成一次长休后，你可以将一个由该特性获得的戏法替换为另一个由你选择的法师戏法。

当你达到法师 4 级和 10 级时，你学习一个新的法师戏法，正如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWizard0000000.JournalEntryPage.g7cMRWzsgAsEF7zC#class-features]{法师特性表}中“戏法”一栏所示。

法术书。你的法师学徒生涯因完成一本独特的书而划上句号——你的法术书。它是一个微型物件，重 3 磅，有 100 页，只能由你或施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00] 的人阅读。你可以自行决定书的外观和材料，例如镀金边的小册子或用麻绳捆绑的牛皮纸集。

这本书囊括了所有你已知的 1+ 环法术。起初，书中记录着六个由你选择的 1 环法师法术。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeatherFal]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThunderwav] 。

此后，每当你获得法师等级时，便可以将两个自选的法师法术加入你的法术书中。你只能加入已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术，如“法师特性”表所示。这些法术是你定期进行奥术研究的结晶。

法术位。 “法师特性”表记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1+ 环阶的法术。当你完成一次长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术。 通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。从你的法术书中选择四个法术加入准备列表，且必须是你已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。

你的准备列表上的法术数量将随着法师等级而增加，正如“法师特性”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，选择额外的法师法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“法师特性”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 3 级法师，你的准备法术列表应该包括六个从你法术书中选择的 1 环或 2 环法术。

如果其他的法师特性给予了额外的已准备法术，这些法术不会计入你在该特性中的准备法术数量，但是这些法术对你而言仍算作法师法术。

改变你的准备法术。 每当你完成一次长休后，你可以更改准备法术列表，将其中的任意个法术替换为你法术书中的法术。

施法属性。 智力是你施展法师法术的施法属性。

施法法器 Spellcasting Focus. 你可以使用奥术法器或你的法术书作为法师法术的施法法器。

original:
The Psychic damage of your Dreadful Strike becomes 2d8. In addition, when you use the Dreadful Strike effect of your Dread Ambusher feature, you can cause one of the following additional effects.

Sudden Strike. You can make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is within 5 feet of the original target and that is within the weapon’s range.

Mass Fear. The target and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, a creature has the &Reference[Frightened] condition until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

The damage of your Dreadful Strike activity will automatically scale as you level up.

To use the Sudden Strike effect simply make another attack.

The Mass Fear activity on this feature includes the save.
translation:
生物

你的恐惧打击造成的心灵伤害变为 2d8。另外，当你使用恐惧伏击的恐惧打击特性时，你可以创造出以下的额外效应之一。

瞬杀 你可以用同一把武器，对位于原目标5尺范围内的另一生物再发动一次攻击，新目标必须处于你武器的触及或射程内。

群体恐惧 目标与位于目标 10 尺范围内的每个生物都必须通过一次对抗你法术豁免DC的感知豁免。若豁免失败，生物将会陷入恐慌状态，持续至你的下一回合开始。

Foundry Note

恐惧打击行动的伤害值将随角色等级自动提升。

使用瞬杀效应时，只需再次发动一次攻击即可。

该特性中的群体恐惧行动包含一次豁免检定。

original: When you use the Dreadful Strike effect
translation: 当你使用恐惧伏击的恐惧打击特性时

original:
You've created a star chart as part of your heavenly studies. It is a Tiny object, and you can use it as a Spellcasting Focus for your Druid spells. You determine its form by rolling on the Star Map table or by choosing one.

While holding the map, you have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{Guidance} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt} spells prepared, and you can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt} without expending a spell slot. You can cast it in that way a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

If you lose the map, you can perform a 1-hour ceremony to magically create a replacement. This ceremony can be performed during a Short or Long Rest, and it destroys the previous map.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbStarMapForms0 rollable]

Foundry Note

The spells are granted to you automatically and Guiding Bolt includes the limited uses. They are not automatically removed if you do not have a Star Map however.
translation:
作为你天文学研究的一部分，你创造了一张星图。它是一个微型物体，可以用作你施展德鲁伊法术时的法器。你通过在星图列表上掷骰或选择一个来确定它的形态。

当你持有这张星图时，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]总会在你的准备法术列表中。此外你可以在不消耗法术位的情况下施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]，你能够以这种方式施放光导箭的次数等同于你的感知调整值（至少 1 次）。完成一次长休后，你可以恢复所有已消耗的使用次数。

如果你丢失了星图，你可以举行一场为时 1 小时的仪式来使用魔法创造一个替代品。这一仪式可以在一场短休或长休时举行，并会摧毁先前的星图。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbStarMapForms0 rollable]

Foundry Note

这些法术会自动授予你，其中包含有限使用次数的“光导箭”。不过，即便你没有星图，它们也不会自动消失。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to take on a starry form rather than shape-shifting.

While in your starry form, you retain your game statistics, but your body becomes luminous, your joints glimmer like stars, and glowing lines connect them as on a star chart. This form sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet. The form lasts for 10 minutes. It ends early if you dismiss it (no action required), have the Incapacitated condition, or use this feature again.

Whenever you assume your starry form, choose which of the following constellations glimmers on your body; your choice gives you certain benefits while in the form.

Archer. A constellation of an archer appears on you. When you activate this form and as a Bonus Action on your subsequent turns while it lasts, you can make a ranged spell attack, hurling a luminous arrow that targets one creature within 60 feet of yourself. On a hit, the attack deals Radiant damage equal to 1d8 plus your Wisdom modifier.

Chalice. A constellation of a life-giving goblet appears on you. Whenever you cast a spell using a spell slot that restores Hit Points to a creature, you or another creature within 30 feet of you can regain Hit Points equal to 1d8 plus your Wisdom modifier.

Dragon. A constellation of a wise dragon appears on you. When you make an Intelligence or a Wisdom check or a Constitution saving throw to maintain Concentration, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.

Foundry Note

The Consume Wild Shape activity will consume your use of Wild Shape and provide an Active Effect for tracking your Starry Form. It also includes activities for the Archer, Chalice, and Dragon form. The Dragon form also includes an Active Effect though it does not automate the minimum rolls.

This feature does not automate the light changes.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗一次荒野形态特性使用次数以呈现一个星耀形态，而非变化为野兽形态。

当处于星耀形态时，你保留你的游戏数据，但你的身体变得明亮；你的关节星光熠熠并有如星图一般由亮线连接。这一形态散发出 10 尺半径的明亮光照以及其外 20 尺的昏暗光照。这一形态持续 10 分钟。如果你解除它（无需动作）、失能、死亡、或再次使用此特性，它就会提前结束。

每当你化身星耀形态时，你选择以下在你身上闪耀的星座旨意；你的选择将为你在形态中提供特定的增益：

射手座。一个弓箭射手的星座于你身上浮现。当你激活这个形态时，你可以进行一次远程法术攻击，对你 60 尺内的一个生物射出一发光箭。命中时，此攻击将造成等同于 1d8 + 你的感知调整值点的光耀伤害。你也可以在它结束前的后续回合中以一个附赠动作再次进行这一攻击。

圣杯座。一个予命圣杯的星座于你身上浮现。当你消耗法术位施展法术时，你或你周围 30 尺内的另一生物可以恢复等同于 1d8 + 你的感知调整值 点的生命值。那个法术必须是能为生物恢复生命值的法术。

巨龙座。 一个智慧巨龙的星座于你身上浮现。当你进行一次智力或感知检定，或是进行一次体质豁免来维持法术专注时，你可以将 D20 中 9 或以下的骰值视为 10。

Foundry Note

消耗荒野形态行动会消耗荒野形态的使用次数，并提供一个跟进你星耀形态的主动效果。它还包含 射手座、圣杯座和 巨龙座的行动。巨龙座也包含一个主动效果，不过它不会自动修正最低掷骰。

该特性不会自动改变光照。

original: Whenever you cast a spell using a spell slot that restores Hit Points
translation: 当你消耗法术位施展恢复生命值的法术时

original: A constellation of a wise dragon appears on you. When you make an Intelligence or a Wisdom check or a Constitution saving throw to maintain Concentration, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.
translation: 一个智慧巨龙的星座于你身上浮现。当你进行一次智力或感知检定，或是进行一次体质豁免来维持法术专注时，你可以将 D20 中 9 或以下的骰值视为 10。

original: As a Bonus Action, you give yourself Advantage on your next attack roll on the current turn. You can use this feature only if you haven’t moved during this turn, and after you use it, your Speed is 0 until the end of the current turn.
translation: 作为一个附赠动作，你在当前回合为你的下一次攻击提供优势。你只能在你本回合还没有移动的时候使用这个附赠动作，而且在你使用这个附赠动作后，你的速度在当前回合里归 0。

original:
Your patron grants you the ability to move between the boundaries of the planes. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step} without expending a spell slot a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

In addition, whenever you cast that spell, you can choose one of the following additional effects.

Refreshing Step. Immediately after you teleport, you or one creature you can see within 10 feet of yourself gains 1d10 Temporary Hit Points.

Taunting Step. Creatures within 5 feet of the space you left must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or have Disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than you until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

The Refreshing Step activity includes the Temporary Hit Points.

The Taunting Step activity includes the save and an Active Effect for tracking but it does not automate the effect.

You are granted the spell with free uses as you level up.
translation:
你的宗主授予你在位面的边界之间穿行的能力。你可以无需消耗法术位地施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]，次数等于你的魅力调整值（至少一次），并在完成一次长休后恢复所有消耗的次数。

此外，每当你施展该法术时，你都可以选择造成下列额外效应之一：

复苏步伐。 在你传送之后，一个你可见的位于你 10 尺内的生物获得 1d10 临时生命值。

嘲弄步伐。 位于你传送前的空间 5 尺内的生物必须进行一次对抗你法术豁免DC的感知豁免，豁免失败则其在对除你之外的生物发动攻击检定时具有劣势，直至你的下一回合开始。

Foundry Note

复苏步伐行动包含临时生命值。

嘲弄步伐行动包含一次豁免检定及一个用于跟进的主动效应，但其效应不会自动生效。

随着等级提升，你将获得该法术的免费使用次数。

original: This creature has Disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than you until the start of your next turn.
translation: 你对除施法者之外的生物发动攻击检定时具有劣势，直至施法者的下一回合开始。

original:
Your Wrath of the Sea confers two more benefits while active, as detailed below.

Flight. You gain a Fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Resistance. You have Resistance to Cold, Lightning, and Thunder damage.

Foundry Note

You can use this feature in place of Wrath of the Sea. It includes an Active Effect which will automate the addition of the Resistances. It does not add the Fly Speed though.
translation:
当“海洋之怒”效果激活时，你会获得以下两个额外增益：

飞行。 你获得等同于你速度的飞行速度。

抗性。你可以对冷冻、闪电和雷鸣伤害具有抗性。

Foundry Note

您可以用此特性来替代 瀚海之怒。它包含一个主动效应，能自动添加抗性。不过，它并不会增加飞行速度。

original:
While your Elemental Attunement is active, you also have a Fly Speed and a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the Fly and Swim Speed.
translation:
在你四象神通生效期间，你获得等同于你速度的飞行速度和游泳速度

Foundry Note

此特性不会自动赋予飞行速度和游泳速度。

original:
You have a marvelous knack for succeeding when you need to. If you fail a D20 Test, you can turn the roll into a 20.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.
translation:
你掌握了一手非凡技巧，让你可以随时把握自己的成功之时。当你的 D20 检定失败时，可以直接将 d20 骰的结果视为 20。

你必须完成一次短休或长休后才能再次使用该特性。

original: When you fail a D20 Test
translation: 当你的 D20 检定失败时

original:
You gain proficiency with one type of Artisan's Tools of your choice, and you gain proficiency in one skill of your choice from the skills available to Fighters at level 1.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for these choices while leveling up.
translation:
你选择一种工匠工具并获得其熟练项。且你从战士1级时可选的技能熟练项中再自选一个并获得对应熟练。

Foundry Note

在升级过程中，系统将提示你进行选择。

original:
You study your opponents and learn from each attack you make. If you make an attack roll against a creature and miss, you have Advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automate the Advantage on your next attack roll.
translation:
你已深晓对手的一举一动，并且从每次攻击中吸取经验教训。如果你对一个生物进行攻击检定但失手，那么直到你的下个合结束前，你对其的下次攻击检定具有优势。

Foundry Note

该特性不会在您下一次攻击检定中自动赋予优势。

original:
Once per turn when you hit a creature with a Monk weapon or an Unarmed Strike, you can expend 1 Focus Point to attempt a stunning strike. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the Stunned condition until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the target's Speed is halved until the start of your next turn, and the next attack roll made against the target before then has Advantage.

Foundry Note

This feature includes the Saving Throw and a Stunned Active Effect which applies the Stunned status if they fail and a Slowed Active Effect for tracking that their Speed is halved and that the next attack roll made against them has Advantage if they succeed.
translation:
每回合一次，当你使用徒手打击或武僧武器命中一个生物后，你可以消耗 1 点功力尝试发动震慑拳。目标必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则陷入震慑状态，持续至你的下个回合开始。若豁免成功，则目标的速度减半，持续至你的下个回合开始。并且下一次对该目标进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一次豁免检定，以及以下两个主动效应：若目标豁免失败，将施加“震慑”状态；若豁免成功，则会施加一个用于追踪其移动速度减半、且下一次对其进行的攻击检定具有优势的“缓速”主动效应。

original: Once per turn when you hit a creature with a Monk weapon or an Unarmed Strike
translation: 每回合一次，当你使用徒手打击或武僧武器命中一个生物后

original:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast it without any Verbal, Somatic, or Material components, except Material components that are consumed by the spell or that have a cost specified in the spell.
translation:
消耗：1 术法点

当你施展一道法术时，你可以消耗 1 术法点来忽视法术所需的语言，姿势和材料成分，但不能忽视那些会被消耗或在法术描述中写明了具体价值的材料成分。

original:
Your attack rolls with weapons and Unarmed Strikes can now score a Critical Hit on a roll of 18–20 on the d20.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically increases the Critical Hit threshold to 18.
translation:
你使用武器或徒手打击进行的攻击检定若在 d20 中掷出掷出 18 ~ 20 时即可造成重击。

Foundry Note

此特性将自动将重击命中阈值提升至18。

original:
At the start of your turn, you can expend 3 Focus Points to bolster yourself against harm for 1 minute or until you have the Incapacitated condition. During that time, you have Resistance to all damage except Force damage.

Foundry Note

This feature will expend 3 Focus Points and includes an Active Effect which will apply the relevant Resistances.
translation:
在你的回合开始时，你可以消耗 3 点功力提高自己抵挡伤害的能力，持续 1 分钟或直至你陷入失能状态。

Foundry Note

此特性将消耗 3 点功力 ，并包含一个主动效应，该效果将赋予相应的抗性。

original: At the start of your turn

When you take damage, you can take a Reaction to give yourself Resistance to that damage and any other damage of the same type until the end of the current turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for resisting each type of damage which can be applied to get the relevant resistance. Be sure you disable/delete the previous Active Effect in the "Effects" tab of your sheet when you change Resistances.
translation:
当你受到伤害时，你可以用你的反应使你获得对该伤害以及相同伤害类型的抗性, 直至当前回合结束。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一种针对每种伤害类型的抗性主动效应，可应用以获得相应的抗性。当您更改抗性时，请务必在您的角色卡的“效应”选项卡中禁用/删除之前的主动效应。

original:
Once per turn when you deal damage to a creature marked by your Hunter’s Mark, you can also deal that spell’s extra damage to a different creature that you can see within 30 feet of the first creature.

Foundry Note

You can apply the damage from Hunter's Mark or use the Damage activity on this feature.
translation:
每个回合内一次，当你对某个被你用猎人印记标记的生物造成伤害时，你可以额外对该生物 30 尺范围内的另一个可见生物造成先前猎人印记提供的伤害。

Foundry Note

你可将猎人印记的伤害值施加上去，或者在该特性上运用伤害行动。

original: When you roll Initiative, you regain expended uses of Bardic Inspiration until you have two if you have fewer than that.
translation: 当你投掷先攻时，若你的诗人激励使用次数不足两次，你重获被消耗的诗人激励使用次数到两次为止。

original:
When you would normally roll one or more dice to restore Hit Points to a creature with a spell or Channel Divinity, don't roll those dice for the healing; instead use the highest number possible for each die. For example, instead of restoring 2d6 Hit Points to a creature with a spell, you restore 12.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automate the maximizing of all of your rolls.
translation:
当你需要用一道法术或引导神力掷一枚或多枚骰子，以决定为一个生物恢复的生命数值时，你无需掷骰，直接为每个骰子取最高值。例如，一道法术为某一生物恢复 2d6 生命值，则其结果直接取 12。

Foundry Note

此特性不会自动最大化所有的掷骰结果。

original:
You gain the following Cunning Strike option.

Stealth Attack (Cost: 1d6). If you have the &Reference[Hide] action’s Invisible condition, this attack doesn’t end that condition on you if you end the turn behind &Reference[Three-Quarters Cover] or &Reference[Total Cover].
translation:
你获得以下诡诈打击选项。

无声袭击 (花费：1d6)。 如果你通过执行 &Reference[Hide] 动作获得了隐形状态，并且你在结束回合时仍然处于 &Reference[Three-Quarters Cover] 或 &Reference[Total Cover]。

original:
You attain the pinnacle of resilience in battle, giving you these benefits.

Defy Death. You have Advantage on Death Saving Throws. Moreover, when you roll 18–20 on a Death Saving Throw, you gain the benefit of rolling a 20 on it.

Heroic Rally. At the start of each of your turns, you regain Hit Points equal to 5 plus your Constitution modifier if you are Bloodied and have at least 1 Hit Point.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automate the Death Saving Throw changes. It includes an activity for healing but does not automatically add it when you are Bloodied.
translation:
你持续战斗的能力达到巅峰，赋予了你以下好处：

蔑视死亡。/strong> 你进行死亡豁免时具有优势。此外，若你在死亡豁免上投出了18~20时，都会获得相当于投出20的好处。

英气风发 。 你每回合开始时，若 你已浴血且拥有至少1点生命值，你恢复相当于5＋你的体质调整值的生命值。

Foundry Note

该特性不会自动更改死亡豁免检定。它包含一个治疗行动，但不会在你浴血时自动恢复。

original: At the start of each of your turns

When you hit a creature with a melee attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, you can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to damage another creature. Choose another creature within 5 feet of the original target and within your reach. If the original attack roll would hit the second creature, it takes damage equal to the number you roll on your Superiority Die. The damage is of the same type dealt by the original attack.

Foundry Note

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog and consumes a use of your Superiority Die.
translation:
你以武器或徒手打击发动的近战攻击检定命中一个生物时，可以消耗一枚卓越骰以尝试伤害另一个生物。指定一个处于你触及范围内并且距离初始目标不超过 5 尺的生物，如果你原本的攻击检定足以命中第二个目标，则它将受到等同于你卓越骰结果的伤害。此伤害与你原本攻击 的伤害类型相同。

Foundry Note

伤害 行动能让您在掷骰对话框中选定其应造成伤害的类型，并且会消耗 1 次卓越骰的使用次数。

original: When you make an Intelligence (History or Investigation) check or a Wisdom (Insight) check, you can expend one Superiority Die and add that die to the ability check.
translation: 当你进行一次智力（调查或历史）或感知（洞悉）检定时，你能够消耗一枚卓越骰，将消耗的卓越骰加入此次属性检定中。

original: When you make an Intelligence (History or Investigation) check or a Wisdom (Insight) check
translation: 当你进行一次智力（调查或历史）或感知（洞悉）检定时

original: When you attack with a weapon whose mastery property you can use, you can replace that property with the Push, Sap, or Slow property for that attack.
translation: 每当你用武器发动攻击，且你可以使用此武器的精通词条时，你可以将此次攻击的精通属性改为推离，削弱或缓速中的一种。

original: You have a mind for tactics on and off the battlefield. When you fail an ability check, you can expend a use of your Second Wind to push yourself toward success.
