Rather than regaining Hit Points, you roll 1d10 and add the number rolled to the ability check, potentially turning it into a success. If the check still fails, this use of Second Wind isn't expended.
translation: 在战场内外，你都能够运用你的战术思维。当你在一次属性检定上失败时，你可以消耗一次回气次数让你更接近成功。你掷 1d10 并将骰值加入到结果之中，而非恢复生命值。这可能会让结果变为成功。如果检定依旧失败，则不会消耗回气次数。

original: When you fail an ability check
translation: 当你在一次属性检定上失败时

original: Whenever you activate your Second Wind with a Bonus Action, you can move up to half your Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
translation: 当你使用附赠动作回气时，你可以移动至多你速度一半的距离，且不会触发借机攻击。

original:
Immediately after you cast a Sorcerer spell with a spell slot, you can create an effect of your choice from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg]{Wild Magic Surge} table instead of rolling on that table. You can choose any effect in the table except for the final row, and if the chosen effect involves a roll, you must make it.

Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
你使用法术位施放一道术士法术之后，可以立即创造一种从 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg]中选择一个效果并应用它而无需投D100，除去最后一行外皆可选择。如果你选中的效果涉及额外掷骰，则仍需掷骰补足效果。

一旦你使用了此能力，直到你完成一次长休前你都不能再次使用它。

original:
When you roll Initiative, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration if you don't have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition. When you do so, roll your Bardic Inspiration die; you and each ally within 30 feet of you who can see or hear you gains a bonus to Initiative equal to the number rolled.

Foundry Note

Using this feature will consume a usage of your Bardic Inspiration.
translation:
当你进行先攻掷骰时，若你不处于 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态，你可以消耗一次吟游诗人激励，并掷出你的诗人激励骰；你和你 30 尺内所有能看见你或听见你声音的盟友获得先攻加值，数值等同于激励骰结果。

Foundry Note

使用此特性会消耗一次吟游诗人激励的使用次数。

original: When rolling initiative and not Incapacitated.
translation: 当你投掷先攻时，若你未陷入失能状态

original:
You have mastered new ways to use your telekinetic abilities, detailed below.

Psi-Powered Leap. As a Bonus Action, you gain a Fly Speed equal to twice your Speed until the end of the current turn. Once you take this Bonus Action, you can't do so again until you finish a Short or Long Rest unless you expend a Psionic Energy Die (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Telekinetic Thrust. When you deal damage to a target with your Psionic Strike, you can force the target to make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 plus your Intelligence modifier and Proficiency Bonus). On a failed save, you can give the target the Prone condition or transport it up to 10 feet horizontally.

Foundry Note

The Psi-Powered Leap activity includes a free use and you can use the Psi-Powered Leap Using Psionic Energy activity to use it again with a Psionic Energy Die. It does not automate the addition of the Fly Speed.

The Telekinetic Thrust activity includes an Active Effect which will can apply the Prone condition.
translation:
你已经掌握了使用念力异能的新方式，具体如下：

灵力跃动。以一个附赠动作，你获得等同于两倍速度的飞行速度，直到本回合结束为止。一旦你执行了此附赠动作，直到你完成一次短休或长休为止你都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗一枚灵能骰（无需动作）来再次使用该异能。

念力突刺。当你使用灵能打击对一个目标造成伤害时，你可以迫使目标进行一次力量豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的智力调整值 + 你的熟练加值）。如果豁免失败，你可以使目标陷入倒地状态或者将其在任意方向水平移动至多 10 尺。

Foundry Note

灵力跃动 行动包含一次免费使用次数，你还能用 以灵能使用灵力跃动 行动，消耗一个灵能骰来使用一次。它不会自动添加飞行速度。

念力突刺 行动包含一种主动效应，该效应可使目标陷入倒地状态。

original: When you deal damage to a target with your Psionic Strike
translation: 当你使用灵能打击对一个目标造成伤害时

key: entries->Telekinetic Adept->activities->Psi-Powered Leap Using Psionic Energy->name

original:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis} spell prepared. With this feature, you can cast it without a spell slot or components, and your spellcasting ability for it is Intelligence. On each of your turns while you maintain Concentration on it, including the turn when you cast it, you can make one attack with a weapon as a Bonus Action.

Once you cast the spell with this feature, you can't do so in this way again until you finish a Long Rest unless you expend a Psionic Energy Die (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

You are automatically granted the Telekinesis spell as you level up. It includes a free use and configures it to use Intelligence as your spellcasting modifier. You can manually consume a use of your Psionic Energy Die and give yourself another use of the spell.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]总会在你的准备法术列表中，你可以在无需法术位和材料成分的情况下使用该法术，你施展这一法术的施法属性为智力。在每一个你对该法术维持专注的回合，包括你使用它的回合，你都可以使用附赠动作来进行一次武器攻击。

每当你使用以特性施展此法术，直到你完成一次长休为止你都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗一枚灵能骰（无需动作）来再次施展它。

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，你会自动获得“心灵遥感”法术。其包含一次免费使用次数，并将其设定为以智力作为施法能力。你还可以手动消耗一次您的灵能骰的使用次数，来额外获得一次该法术的使用次数。

original:
You can form a telepathic connection between your mind and the mind of another. As a Bonus Action, choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself. You and the chosen creature can communicate telepathically with each other while the two of you are within a number of miles of each other equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1 mile, currently: [[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]). To understand each other, you each must mentally use a language the other knows.

The telepathic connection lasts for a number of minutes equal to your Sorcerer level. It ends early if you use this ability to form a connection with a different creature.
translation:
你能够在自己与他人的意识中构建一道心灵感应的链接。以一个附赠动作，你可以选择 30 尺内一个你可见的生物创造这一链接。链接能使你与其能够通过心灵感应方式进行交流，但交流时，你们之间距离的里数不超过你的[[lookup @abilities.cha.mod]]（至少 1 里）。你们必须使用互相知晓的语言进行心灵交流，才能使其理解你通过心灵感应传达的话语。

心灵感应的链接持续等同于你术士等级的分钟数。如果你陷入失能、死亡、或你使用此能力与其他生物构建链接时，这一链接会提前结束。

original:
You can increase your powers of perception. As a Bonus Action, choose one of the following benefits, which lasts until you start a Short or Long Rest. You can’t use this feature again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.

Darkvision. You gain Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.

Greater Comprehension. You can read any language.

See Invisibility. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSeeInvisib]{See Invisibility} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

The Darkvision activity includes an Active Effect which grants you Darkvision.

The Greater Comprehension activity includes an Active Effect for tracking.

The See Invisibility activity includes a limited use and an Active Effect for tracking.
translation:
你可以增强你的察觉能力。以一个附赠动作，从以下增益中选择其一，其会持续至你开始一次短休或长休。你不能在完成一次短休或长休前再次使用这个特性。

黑暗视觉。你获得 120 尺的黑暗视觉。

高等理解力。 你可以读懂任何语言。

识破隐形。 你可以施放 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSeeInvisib]而无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

黑暗视觉 行动包括一个主动效应，使你获得黑暗视觉。

高等理解力 行动包括一个用于跟踪的主动效应。

识破隐形 行动包括有限的使用次数和跟踪的主动效应。

original: The Third Eye feature grants you Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.

key: entries->The Third Eye->effects->Third Eye: Greater Comprehension->name
entries->The Third Eye->effects->Third Eye: Greater Comprehension->description
original: The Third Eye feature grants you the ability to read any language.

Hunt for Treasure as a Classic Adventurer

A mix of burglar, treasure hunter, and explorer, you are the epitome of an adventurer. In addition to improving your agility and stealth, you gain abilities useful for delving into ruins and getting maximum benefit from the magic items you find there.
translation:
追秘猎宝的经典冒险家 Hunt for Treasure as a Classic Adventurer

强盗、宝藏猎人、探险家，你是一切经典冒险者形象的缩影。这个子职不仅提高了你的灵活与隐匿技术，还为你提供了探索古老遗迹的游荡技巧，使你永远能够最大化利用藏匿其中的魔法物品。

original: You are adept at laying ambushes and quickly escaping danger. You can take two turns during the first round of any combat. You take your first turn at your normal Initiative and your second turn at your Initiative minus 10.
translation: 你变的更加擅长伏击和快速脱离险境。每次战斗的第一轮里，你可以行动两个回合。你先以自己正常的先攻执行你的第一个回合的行动，再以先攻数值减 10 的先攻执行你的第二个回合的行动。

original:
You picked up various languages in the communities where you plied your roguish talents. You know Thieves’ Cant and one other language of your choice, which you choose from the language tables in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.t1WP9VEevo4TOTXw#choose-languages]{chapter 2}.

Foundry Note

Thieves' Cant will be added to your sheet automatically and you will be prompted to choose the additional language.
translation:
你在施展自己游荡者才华的社区里学习了多样的语言。你习得盗贼黑话和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.t1WP9VEevo4TOTXw#choose-languages]的语言表中的一项语言。

Foundry Note

盗贼黑话会自动添加到你的角色卡中，并且系统会提示你选择额外的语言。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]{Pact of the Blade} Invocation.

You gain the Extra Attack feature for your pact weapon only. With that feature, you can attack twice with the weapon instead of once when you take the Attack action on your turn.
translation:
先决条件： 5 级及以上的魔契师， @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]祈唤

你获得而额外攻击特性（仅可使用你的契约武器）。此特性令你在自己的回合内执行攻击动作时可以用该武器攻击两次而非一次。

original: Your thoughts can’t be read by telepathy or other means unless you allow it. You also have Resistance to Psychic damage, and whenever a creature deals Psychic damage to you, that creature takes the same amount of damage that you take.
translation: 除非获得你的允许，否则你的思维无法被心灵感应或者其他手段阅读。此外你还具有对心灵伤害的抗性，且每当一个生物对你造成心灵伤害时，该生物将受到与你承受的同等的伤害。

original: Your thoughts can’t be read by telepathy or other means unless you allow it. You also have Resistance to Psychic damage, and whenever a creature deals Psychic damage to you, that creature takes the same amount of damage that you take.
translation: 除非获得你的允许，否则你的思维无法被心灵感应或者其他手段阅读。此外你还具有对心灵伤害的抗性，且每当一个生物对你造成心灵伤害时，该生物将受到与你承受的同等的伤害。

original: You can attack four times instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
translation: 每当你在回合内进行攻击动作时，你可以进行四次攻击，而不是一次。

original:
You can manipulate chaos itself to give yourself Advantage on one D20 Test before you roll the d20. Once you do so, you must cast a Sorcerer spell with a spell slot or finish a Long Rest before you can use this feature again.

If you do cast a Sorcerer spell with a spell slot before you finish a Long Rest, you automatically roll on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg]{Wild Magic Surge} table.
translation:
你可以驾驭机运与混乱的力量，在你骰点之前，你可以使一次D20检定具有优势。此后，你必须完成一次长休后才能再次使用该特性。

在你重获使用混乱之潮的能力前，你每次使用法术位施展术士法术后，你立刻骰一次 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg]效果。此后，你重获使用该特性的能力。

original:
Primal forces now help fuel you on your journeys, granting you the following benefits.

Temporary Hit Points. As a Magic action, you can give yourself a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to 1d8 plus your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1). You can use this action a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Decrease Exhaustion. Whenever you finish a Short Rest, your Exhaustion level, if any, decreases by 1.

Foundry Note

The Temporary Hit Points activity can apply the Temporary Hit Points to you.

The Decrease Exhaustion activity will decrease your Exhaustion.
translation:
自然远古力量助力你的旅程，你获得以下增益。

临时生命值。以一个魔法动作，你能够给予自己1d8+你的感知调整值的临时生命值（至少1点临时生命值）。你能够使用此特性的次数等于你的感知调整值，当你完成一次长休后，你恢复已消费的全部次数。

消除力竭。 每当你完成一次短休时，你的力竭等级（若有）减少1。

Foundry Note

临时生命值 行动将赋予临时生命值。

减少力竭 行动会降低你的力竭等级。

original: Whenever you finish a Short Rest
translation: 每当你完成一次短休时

original:
You gain the ability to align your consciousness with the endless calculations of Mechanus. As a Bonus Action, you can enter this state for 1 minute. For the duration, attack rolls against you can’t benefit from Advantage, and whenever you make a D20 Test, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you spend 5 Sorcery Points (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

The Enter Trance (Free) activity includes a free use.

The Enter Trance (Sorcery Points) activity will expend five Sorcery Points.

The minimum roll is not automated.
translation:
你获得了将你的意识和机械境无尽的计算达成同步的能力。以一个附赠动作，你可以在 1 分钟内进入此种状态。在此期间，对你进行的攻击免受优势的影响，且每当你进行D20检定时，你可以将d20掷出的 9 或以下的骰值视为 10。

一旦你使用了此能力，直到你完成一次长休前你都不能再次使用它。你也可以消耗5点术法点（无需动作）以再次使用此能力。

Foundry Note

进入恍惚（免费） 行动包含免费使用。

进入恍惚（术法点） 行动会消耗 5 点术法点。

最小掷骰结果未实现自动化。

original: For the duration, attack rolls against you can’t benefit from Advantage, and whenever you make a D20 Test, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.
translation: 在此期间，对你进行的攻击免受优势的影响，且每当你进行D20检定时，你可以将d20掷出的 9 或以下的骰值视为 10。

original:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell that deals a type of damage from the following list, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to change that damage type to one of the other listed types: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Thunder.
translation:
消耗：1 术法点 Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

当你施展一道法术时，你可以消耗 1 术法点来忽视法术所需的语言，姿势和材料成分，但不能忽视那些会被消耗或在法术描述中写明了具体价值的材料成分。

original: When you cast a spell that deals Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, or Thunder damage
translation: 当你施展造成强酸、寒冷、火焰、闪电、毒素或雷鸣伤害的法术时

original:
When you activate your Rage and as a Bonus Action while your Rage is active, you can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

In addition, once per Rage, you can increase the range of that teleport to 150 feet. When you do so, you can also bring up to six willing creatures who are within 10 feet of you. Each creature teleports to an unoccupied space of your choice within 10 feet of your destination space.
translation:
作为激活狂暴的附赠动作的一部分，或是在狂暴激活期间以一个附赠动作，你可以传送到 60 尺内的未被占据的可见空间。

此外，每次狂暴期间仅一次，当你使用此特性传送时，你可以带上自身 10 尺内的至多 6 个自愿生物，并且以此方式传送的范围增加到 150 尺。每个生物都会传送到你的目标空间 10 尺内且未被占据的空间。

original:
Make Mischief and Challenge Authority

The Trickery Domain offers magic of deception, illusion, and stealth. Clerics who wield this magic are a disruptive force in the world, puncturing pride, mocking tyrants, freeing captives, and flouting hollow traditions. They prefer subterfuge and pranks to direct confrontation.

Gods of trickery are mischief-makers and instigators who stand as a constant challenge to the accepted order among both gods and mortals. They embody the forces of change and social upheaval, and they're patrons of thieves, scoundrels, gamblers, rebels, and liberators. Religious orders that operate in secret, especially those that seek to undermine oppressive governments or hierarchies, also draw on the power of the Trickery Domain.
translation:
挑起闹剧，直面权威

诡计领域提供了欺骗、幻术和隐匿的魔法。操弄这些魔法的牧师是世界中的扰乱力量，他们刺破自满，嘲弄暴君，解救囚犯，并蔑视空洞的传统。他们倾向于使用诡计和恶作剧，而非直接对抗。

诡计之神是捣乱者和煽动者，他们不断挑战神祇和凡人之间的既定秩序。他们体现了变革和社会动荡的力量，也是盗贼、无赖、赌徒、叛乱者和解放者的支持者。那些秘密行动的宗教组织，特别是那些旨在破坏压迫性政府或等级制度的组织，也会借助诡术领域的力量。

original:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Trickery Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Trickery Domain Spells
Cleric LevelPrepared Spells
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPasswithou]{Pass without Trace}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa]{Hypnotic Pattern}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplNondetecti]{Nondetection}
7@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConfusion0]{Confusion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplModifyMemo]{Modify Memory}

Foundry Note

These spells are granted automatically as you advance.
translation:
你与此神圣领域的链接使你总是准备了特定的法术。当你达到诡术领域法术表中特定的牧师等级时，你总会将表中对应的法术加入准备。

诡术领域法术
牧师等级 准备法术
3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPasswithou]
5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa]@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplNondetecti]
7 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConfusion0]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]
9 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominatePe]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplModifyMemo]

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，这些法术会自动授予。

original:
Whenever you take the Bonus Action to create or move the illusion of your Invoke Duplicity, you can teleport, swapping places with the illusion.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Transpose activity for tracking the use of your Bonus Action but you will have to manually swap your Token and the Duplicate's position.
translation:
每当你使用附赠动作创造或移动你来自召现分身特性的幻象时，你都可以通过传送与幻象交换位置。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个换位行动，用于跟进附赠动作的使用情况，但你得手动交换标记和幻象的位置。

original:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike, you can expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack's damage roll. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Foundry Note

This feature will automatically use the higher of your Strength/Dexterity for the save.

The Damage included in the save allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog. It will remember your choice going forwards.
translation:
你以武器或徒手打击发动的攻击检定命中一个生物时，可以消耗一枚卓越骰并将所消耗的卓越骰加在此次攻击的伤害掷骰中。如果该目标体型为大型或更小，则必须通过一次力量豁免。豁免失败将陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一项 力量豁免 行动和 敏捷豁免 行动，这两项行动会消耗一次你的卓越骰的使用次数。它们还包含一种主动效应，可施加倒地状态。

伤害行动能让你在掷骰对话框中选择其应造成伤害的类型。

original:
The constellations of your Starry Form improve. The 1d8 of the Archer and the Chalice becomes 2d8, and while the Dragon is active, you have a Fly Speed of 20 feet and can hover.

Moreover, at the start of each of your turns while in your Starry Form, you can change which constellation glimmers on your body.

Foundry Note

The dice increase is handled automatically. This feature does not automatically add the Fly Speed.
translation:
你的星耀形态星座增强了。射手座和圣杯座中的 1d8 都变成了 2d8，而在巨龙座激活期间，你将获得 20 尺的飞行速度，并且可以悬浮。

此外，每个你的回合开始时，若此时你处于在星耀形态下，你可以更改当前身上闪耀的星座。

Foundry Note

骰数增加会自动处理。但此特性不会自动添加飞行速度。

original:
Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

When you cast a spell, such as Charm Person, that can be cast with a higher-level spell slot to target an additional creature, you can spend 1 Sorcery Point to increase the spell’s effective level by 1.
translation:
消耗：1 术法点 Cost: 1 Sorcery Point

当你施展一个可以通过升环施法来提升法术目标数的法术，如魅惑人类 Charm Person时，你可以消耗 1 术法点来将该法术的有效环级提升 1 环。

original: When you cast a spell that can be upcast to target an additional creature
translation: 当你施展一个可以通过升环施法来提升法术目标数的法术时

original: You can attack three times instead of once whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
translation: 每当你在回合内进行攻击动作时，你可以进行三次攻击，而不是一次。

original:
You gain Darkvision with a range of 60 feet. If you already have Darkvision when you gain this feature, its range increases by 60 feet.

You are also adept at evading creatures that rely on Darkvision. While entirely in Darkness, you have the &Reference[Invisible] condition to any creature that relies on Darkvision to see you in that Darkness.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will automatically increase your Darkvision range.
translation:
你获得 60 尺黑暗视觉。如果你已经获得了黑暗视觉，则黑暗视觉范围额外增加 60 尺。你还擅长回避依赖黑暗视觉的生物。

你还擅长避开依赖黑暗视觉的角色。完全身处黑暗期间，对于任何依靠黑暗视觉观察黑暗中的你的生物而言，你具有 &Reference[Invisible] 状态。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效应，可自动提升你的黑暗视觉范围。

original: You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack rolls of your Unarmed Strikes. When you deal damage with an Unarmed Strike, you can deal Bludgeoning damage equal to a roll of your Bardic Inspiration die plus your Dexterity modifier, instead of the strike's normal damage. This roll doesn't expend the die.
translation: 你可以用敏捷代替力量进行徒手打击的攻击检定。当你用一次徒手打击造成伤害时，你可以造成等于诗人激励骰 + 敏捷调整值的钝击伤害，而非徒手打击原本的伤害。此效果并不会消耗你的诗人激励使用次数。

original: While you aren’t wearing any armor, your base Armor Class equals 10 plus your Dexterity and Constitution modifiers. You can use a Shield and still gain this benefit.
translation: 你未着装任何护甲期间，你的基础AC等于 10 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的体质调整值。你可以使用盾牌而仍然从此特性获益。

original:
While you aren't wearing armor or wielding a Shield, your base Armor Class equals 10 plus your Dexterity and Wisdom modifiers.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which updates your Armor Class.
translation:
未着装任何护甲也没持用盾牌时，你的护甲等级等于 10 ＋ 你的敏捷调整值 ＋ 你的感知调整值。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个主动效应，可动态更新你的护甲等级。

original:
Your speed increases by 10 feet while you aren't wearing armor or wielding a Shield. This bonus increases when you reach certain Monk levels, as shown on the Monk Features table.

Current Increase: [[lookup @scale.monk.unarmored-movement]]

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Unarmored Movement Active Effect which adds 10 feet to your Movement. It can not automatically update as you level up though. You can edit the value to match your current increase.
translation:
当未穿着任何护甲也没持用盾牌时，你的移动速度增加 10 尺。该加值将随着武僧职业等级的提升而增加，具体数值见武僧特性表中无甲移动一栏。

当前数值 Current Increase: [[lookup @scale.monk.unarmored-movement]]

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个无甲移动的主动效应，可使你的移动速度增加 10 尺。但该数值不会随等级提升自动更新，你需要手动编辑数值以匹配当前增益。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can assume a magically majestic presence for 1 minute or until you have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition. For the duration, whenever any creature hits you with an attack roll for the first time on a turn, the attacker must succeed on a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC, or the attack misses instead, as the creature recoils from your majesty.

Once you assume this majestic presence, you can't do so again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Majestic Presence activity includes an Active Effect for tracking your presence and a Saving Throw.

The Save activity includes a saving throw for simply sending the save to chat if you need to post it again without expending a use of this feature.
translation:
以一个附赠动作，你可以展现出魔法加持的威严姿态，持续 1 分钟或直到你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态。在此期间，任何生物在一个回合中首次以攻击检定命中你时，攻击者必须成功通过一次对抗你法术豁免 DC 的魅力豁免检定，否则该生物将因你的威严而退却，这次攻击将被改为失手。

一旦展现出这般威严姿态，直到你完成一次短休或长休前都无法再次使用。

Foundry Note

威仪 行动包含一个用于跟进自身姿态的主动效果以及一次豁免检定。

豁免行动包含一次豁免检定，若您需要再次发布该豁免检定结果而无需耗费此特性的使用次数，只需将该豁免检定发送至聊天框即可。

original:
When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to halve the attack’s damage against you (round down).

Foundry Note

With your token selected you can either right click on the damage roll's chat card and select  Apply Half Damage or click the "1/2" button and then the  Apply button.
translation:
当一个你能看见的敌人攻击命中你时，你可以用反应让此次攻击的伤害减半（向下取整）。

Foundry Note

右键点击伤害掷骰的聊天卡片，选择  应用半伤 或先点击 "1/2" 按钮，再点击  应用 按钮。

original: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack roll
translation: 当一个你能看见的敌人攻击命中你时

original:
When you roll Initiative, you can regain all expended Focus Points. When you do so, roll your Martial Arts die, and regain a number of Hit Points equal to your Monk level plus the number rolled.

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

Using this feature will restore all expended Focus Points and offers a Healing roll for restoring your Hit Points. It includes a single free use per Long Rest.
translation:
当你投掷先攻时，你可以获得所有已消耗的专注点。当你这么做时，掷出一个武艺骰，恢复投出点数+你武僧等级的生命值。

一旦你使用了此能力，直到你完成一次长休前你都不能再次使用它。

Foundry Note

使用该特性可恢复所有已消耗的功力，并提供一次治疗掷骰来恢复你的生命值。它包含在长休期间的一次免费使用。

original:
When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points and not killed outright, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead, and you regain a number of Hit Points equal to three times your Paladin level. Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

Additionally, you can’t be aged magically, and you cease visibly aging.
translation:
你生命值降至 0 点，但尚未被直接杀死时，可以选择让你的生命值降到 1 点而不是 0 点，随后你恢复你圣武士等级 × 3 的生命值。你必须完成一次长休后才能再次使用该能力。 此外，

你不受任何衰老减益。也不会因为魔法效应而衰老。

original: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points
translation: 当你生命值降至 0 点

original:
You’ve learned how to maximize use of magic items, granting you the following benefits.

Attunement. You can attune to up to four magic items at once.

Charges. Whenever you use a magic item property that expends charges, roll [[/r 1d6]]. On a roll of 6, you use the property without expending the charges.

Scrolls. You can use any Spell Scroll, using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability for the spell. If the spell is a cantrip or a level 1 spell, you can cast it reliably. If the scroll contains a higher-level spell, you must first succeed on an [[/skill arc]] check (DC 10 plus the spell’s level). On a successful check, you cast the spell from the scroll. On a failed check, the scroll disintegrates.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that automatically increases your attunement maximum.

When using an item property that expends charges roll the d6 and uncheck the consumption box to use it for free.
translation:
你学会了如何最大限度地使用魔法物品，这为你提供了以下好处。

同调。 你可以同调至多四件魔法物品。

充能。 每当你使用需消耗充能的魔法物品时， 掷 [[/r 1d6]]。若掷出 6，则本次使用不消耗充能。

卷轴。 你可以使用任何法术卷轴，以智力作为你的关键施法属性，如果该法术为戏法或一环法术，你可以正常施放。若为更高环位的法术，你必须通过 [[/skill arc]] 检定，DC = 10 + 该法术环位，通过则正常使用卷轴，失败则卷轴瓦解消散。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一种主动效应，能自动提升同调上限。

当使用会消耗充能的道具特性时，掷出 1 个六面骰，然后取消勾选消耗框，这样就能免费使用。

original: The Use Magic Device feature allows you to attune to up to four magic items at once.
translation: 你学会了如何最大限度地使用魔法物品，你可以同调至多四件魔法物品。

original: You gain the ability to distract targets with your Mage Hand. When you use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity="Trip"]]{Trip} option of your Cunning Strike on a creature, you can also use that option on another creature within 5 feet of the spectral hand.
translation: 你获得用你的 法师之手 使目标分心的能力。当对生物使用 [[/item Cunning Strike activity="Trip"]]{诡诈打击（绊摔）} 选项时，可对灵体之手5尺范围内的另一生物同步触发该效果。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 9+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplArcaneEye0]{Arcane Eye} without expending a spell slot.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used in place of Arcane Eye and includes a Summon activity.
translation:
先决条件 Prerequisite: 9 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplArcaneEye0]，且无需消耗法术位。

Foundry Note

该特性可代替秘法眼使用，并且包含一个召唤行动。

original:
Your Rage taps into the life force of the World Tree. You gain the following benefits.

Vitality Surge. When you activate your Rage, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your Barbarian level.

Life-Giving Force. At the start of each of your turns while your Rage is active, you can choose another creature within 10 feet of yourself to gain Temporary Hit Points. To determine the number of Temporary Hit Points, roll a number of d6s equal to your Rage Damage bonus, and add them together. If any of these Temporary Hit Points remain when your Rage ends, they vanish.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for Vitality Surge and Life-Giving Force which can be used to roll the Temporary HP. It does not automatically remove Life-Giving Force's Temporary Hit Points when your Rage ends.
translation:
你的狂暴浸润着世界树的生命力。你获得以下增益：

活力之潮。 当你激活狂暴时，你获得等同于你野蛮人等级的临时生命值。

生命赋予。 狂暴激活期间，你可以在每个你的回合开始时赋予 10 尺内另一个生物临时生命值。掷出等同于狂暴伤害加值数量的 D6 并相加，即是该生物获得的临时生命值。当你的狂暴终止时，这些赋予的临时生命值将会消失。

Foundry Note

该特性包含活力之潮和生命赋予的行动，可进行临时生命值掷骰。在狂暴结束时，它不会自动移除生命赋予的临时生命值。

original: Start of each of your turns while your Rage is active
translation: 狂暴激活期间的每回合

original:
When you take the Attack action, you can expend one use of your Channel Divinity to utter a vow of enmity against a creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself. You have Advantage on attack rolls against the creature for 1 minute or until you use this feature again.

If the creature drops to 0 Hit Points before the vow ends, you can transfer the vow to a different creature within 30 feet of yourself (no action required).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking the creature you have vowed against but it does not automate the Advantage.
translation:
当你执行攻击动作时，你可以消耗一次你的引导神力次数，对一个你能看见的位于你 30 尺内的生物立下仇敌誓言。你在接下来 1 分钟内，对该生物的攻击检定具有优势。

如果在誓言结束前，该生物的生命值就降为了 0，你可以将誓言的目标换为另一个你能看见的位于你 30 尺的生物（无需动作）。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个用于跟进你已立誓对抗生物的主动效应，但不会自动应用优势。

original: When you take the Attack action

You learn a ritual that creates a magical bond between yourself and one weapon. You perform the ritual over the course of 1 hour, which can be done during a Short Rest. The weapon must be within your reach throughout the ritual, at the conclusion of which you touch the weapon and forge the bond. The bond fails if another Fighter is bonded to the weapon or if the weapon is a magic item to which someone else is attuned.

Once you have bonded a weapon to yourself, you can't be disarmed of that weapon unless you have the Incapacitated condition. If it is on the same plane of existence, you can summon that weapon as a Bonus Action, causing it to teleport instantly to your hand.

You can have up to two bonded weapons, but you can summon only one at a time with a Bonus Action. If you attempt to bond with a third weapon, you must break the bond with one of the other two.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for summoning your weapon that can be used if you're tracking usage of your Bonus Action.

It also includes a Bond with Weapon activity which can be used to enchant your bonded weapons. It will append ", War Bonded" to its name for easy identification.
translation:
你习得一种让你和你的武器建立魔法联结的仪式。仪式耗时 1 小时，且可在短休时进行。仪式过程中武器必须在你的触及范围内，直至仪式结束前，你都要碰触该武器以完成联结。如果其他战士已经和这把武器建立了联结，或者这把武器作为魔法物品已经和他人同调，那么这个联结无法成立。

联结建立后，只要你不处于失能状态，使用联结武器时就不会被缴械。如果联结武器与你处于同一位面，则你可以用一个附赠动作召唤其回到你手中。

你至多可以拥有两把建立联结的武器，但一个附赠动作只能召唤一把武器。如果你试图和第三把武器建立联结，则必须与已经联结的一把武器取消联结。

Foundry Note

召唤武器行动，可用来召唤你的武器，并跟进附赠动作的使用情况。

武器联结行动，可用来为你的联结武器附魔。它会在其名称后附加“，战争联结”以方便识别。

original:
Inspire Valor and Smite Foes

War has many manifestations. It can make heroes of ordinary people. It can be desperate and horrific, with acts of cruelty and cowardice eclipsing instances of excellence and courage. Clerics who tap into the magic of the War Domain excel in battle, inspiring others to fight the good fight or offering acts of violence as prayers.

Gods of the War Domain watch over warriors and reward them for their great deeds. They include champions of honor and chivalry as well as gods of destruction and pillage. Other war gods take a more neutral stance, promoting war in all its manifestations and supporting warriors in any circumstance.
translation:
激昂气概，击溃仇敌

战争有许多种表现形式。它可以造就普通人成为英雄。它充满绝望与恐惧，伴随着残忍与懦弱的行为却也交织着卓越与勇气。掌握战争领域魔法的牧师在战斗中表现出色，激励他人奋勇作战，或献上暴力行为作为祈祷。

战争之神都会守望着武者们并为他们伟大的行为作出奖赏。这些神明包括荣誉和骑士精神的化身，也有破坏和掠夺的神祇。还有一些战争神明采取更中立的态度，推动战争的一切表现并支持处于任何境遇之下战士。

original:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the War Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

War Domain Spells
Cleric LevelPrepared Spells
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicWeapo]{Magic Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]{Shield of Faith}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCrusadersM]{Crusader's Mantle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritGuar]{Spirit Guardians}
7@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireShield]{Fire Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFreedomofM]{Freedom of Movement}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSteelWindS]{Steel Wind Strike}

Foundry Note

These spells are granted automatically as you advance.
translation:
你与这个神圣领域的联系可以确保你随时准备好某些法术。当你达到战争领域法术表中所示的牧师等级时，你将同时获得其对应的领域法术。领域法术一旦获得，将会一直在你的准备法术列表中。

战争领域法术
牧师等级 准备法术
3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicWeapo]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]
5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCrusadersM]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritGuar]
7 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireShield]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFreedomofM]
9 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSteelWindS]

Foundry Note

随着等级提升，这些法术会自动授予。

original:
You can expend a use of your Channel Divinity to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]{Shield of Faith} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon} rather than expending a spell slot. When you cast either spell in this way, the spell doesn't require Concentration. Instead the spell lasts for 1 minute, but it ends early if you cast that spell again, have the Incapacitated condition, or die.

Foundry Note

When casting the spell uncheck the "Consumption" checkbox and the "Concentration" checkbox.
translation:
你可以使用你的引导神力来施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]而无需消耗法术位。当你以这种方式施展其中任何一道法术时，该法术都不需要专注，且其持续时间变为1分钟，但会在你再次施展该法术、陷入失能状态或是死亡时提前结束。

Foundry Note

在施放法术时，取消勾选“消耗”复选框和“专注”复选框。

original: When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one of the attacks with a casting of one of your Wizard cantrips that has a casting time of an action.
translation: 当你在自己回合内执行攻击动作时，你可以施展一道施法时间为动作的法师戏法，以此替代一次攻击。

original: As a Bonus Action, you can make one attack with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike. You can use this Bonus Action a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once, currently [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]). You regain all expended uses when you finish a Short or Long Rest.
translation: 以一个附赠动作，你可以发动一次武器攻击或者徒手打击。你可以使用该附赠动作的次数等于你的感知调整值（最低为 1，当前 [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]），你在完成一次长休或短休后重新获得所有的使用次数。

original:
When a creature that you can see within 30 feet of yourself makes an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to impose Disadvantage on the attack roll, causing light to flare before it hits or misses.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once, currently [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]). You regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Flare activity includes a 30 foot emanation for identifying impacted creatures. It does not automate the Disadvantage.
translation:
当你身边 30 尺内一个你能看见的生物进行攻击掷骰时，你可以用你的反应在攻击完成前对攻击者闪出一道光亮，以此迫使该攻击检定具有劣势。

你可以使用该特性的次数等于你的感知调整值（至少为一次，当前 [[lookup @abilties.wis.mod]]）。而你将在完成一次长休后重新恢复所有的使用次数。

Foundry Note

闪耀 行动包含一个 30 尺的光环，用于识别受影响的生物。它不会自动造成劣势。

original: When a creature you can see within 30 feet makes an attack roll
translation: 当你身边 30 尺内一个你能看见的生物进行攻击掷骰时

original:
An Occultist Empowered by Otherworldly Pacts

Core Warlock Traits

Primary Ability

Charisma

Hit Point Die

D8 per Warlock level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Wisdom and Charisma

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, or Religion

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons

Armor Training

Light armor

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSickle0000]{Sickle}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbafcOrb0000000]{orb}), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phiPN9UzkXk3i5xh]{Book} (occult lore), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagScholarsPac]{Scholar’s Pack}, and [[/award 15GP]]; or (B) [[/award 100GP]]

Warlocks quest for knowledge that lies hidden in the fabric of the multiverse. They often begin their search for magical power by delving into tomes of forbidden lore, dabbling in invocations meant to attract the power of extraplanar beings, or seeking places of power where the influence of these beings can be felt. In no time, each Warlock is drawn into a binding pact with a powerful patron. Drawing on the ancient knowledge of beings such as angels, archfey, demons, devils, hags, and alien entities of the Far Realm, Warlocks piece together arcane secrets to bolster their own power.

Warlocks view their patrons as resources, as means to the end of achieving magical power. Some Warlocks respect, revere, or even love their patrons; some serve their patrons grudgingly; and some seek to undermine their patrons even as they wield the power their patrons have given them.

Once a pact is made, a Warlock’s thirst for knowledge and power can’t be slaked with mere study. Most Warlocks spend their days pursuing greater power and deeper knowledge, which typically means some kind of adventure.

Becoming a Warlock …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Warlock Traits table.
  • Gain the Warlock’s level 1 features, which are listed in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWarlock000000.JournalEntryPage.znue6EaGDDXgeQb0#class-features]{Warlock Features table}.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Warlock Traits table: Hit Point Die and training with Light armor.
  • Gain the Warlock’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Warlock Features table. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.vcs4jfEKRxPCsgXm]{multiclassing rules} to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
自异界魔契中汲取力量的玄秘学者 An Occultist Empowered by Otherworldly Pacts

魔契师核心特质

关键属性

魅力

生命骰

每魔契师等级 D8

豁免熟练项

感知与魅力

技能熟练项

从奥秘、欺瞒、历史、威吓、调查、自然或宗教中选择两项

武器熟练项

简易武器

护甲训练

轻甲

初始装备

选择 A 或 B ：（A）皮甲、镰刀、2 把匕首、奥术法器（宝珠）、书（玄秘学识）、学者套组、15 GP 或（B）100GP

魔契师追寻隐于多元宇宙之下的知识。为了追寻魔法力量，起初他们会钻研大量的禁忌学识，进而知晓了吸引异界存在注目的法术，或者是便是寻觅到了能感受到异界存在的力量之地。在此之后，契术士便会与一位强大的宗主签下被束缚的契约。汲取来自天使，至高妖精，恶魔，魔鬼，鬼婆甚至遥远国度外星存在的远古学识，魔契师将这些奥法之秘拼凑起来，进而转为自己的力量。
魔契师认为他们的宗主只是一种资源，是他们获得魔法力量的手段。有些魔契师尊重、敬畏甚至热爱他们的宗主；有些人则并不那么情愿为他们的宗主服务；有些人则尝试削弱他们的宗主，即使他们所操弄的力量正是来自于他们的宗主。
一旦签下契约，魔契师对知识和力量的渴求便难以仅通过学习来满足。大部分魔契师毕生都在追求更卓越的力量和更深邃的知识，而这往往通向一条冒险之路。

成为魔契师...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“魔契师核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWarlock000000.JournalEntryPage.znue6EaGDDXgeQb0#class-features]{魔契师特性表}中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章的兼职规则来确定可用的法术位。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“魔契师核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰和轻甲训练。
  • 获得“魔契师特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.vcs4jfEKRxPCsgXm]{兼职规则} 来确定可用的法术位。

original:
You can unleash a space-warping anomaly. As a Magic action, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of yourself. Immediately after you disappear, each creature within 30 feet of the space you left must make a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d10 Force damage and is pulled straight toward the space you left, ending in an unoccupied space as close to your former space as possible. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a Long Rest unless you spend 5 Sorcery Points (no action required) to restore your use of it.
translation:
你能够释放出扭曲空间的异常现象。以一个魔法动作，你传送到 120 尺内你可见的一个未被占据的位置，然后你消失位置 30 尺内的每个生物必须进行一次对抗你施法DC的力量豁免，豁免失败将受 3d10 力场伤害并被立即拉向你原本的位置，并停在最靠近的一处未被占据的空间内，豁免成功只受半伤。

此特性一经使用，直至完成长休你都无法再次使用。你也可以消耗 5 点术法点（无需动作）重置该特性的使用权。

original:
Manipulate Forces of Life and Death

Warriors of Mercy manipulate the life force of others. These Monks are wandering physicians, but they bring a swift end to their enemies. They often wear masks, presenting themselves as faceless bringers of life and death.
translation:
掌执命流

命流武者操弄着他人的命流之力。这些武僧既是云游的医者，但也能给敌人带去迅疾的死亡。他们总戴着面具，以无脸的生死使者之形象示人。

original:
Harness Shadow Power for Stealth and Subterfuge

Warriors of Shadow practice stealth and subterfuge, harnessing the power of the Shadowfell. They are at home in darkness, able to draw gloom around themselves to hide, leap from shadow to shadow, and take on a wraithlike form.
translation:
暗影藏形

暗影武者习练隐匿与遁术，引导，积蓄和驾驭来自堕影冥界的力量。他们居于黑暗，藏于薄暮，遁于幽影，出手亦犹如幽影一般凶险。

original:
Wield Strikes and Bursts of Elemental Power

Warriors of the Elements tap into the power of the Elemental Planes. Harnessing their supernatural focus, these Monks momentarily tame the energy of the Elemental Chaos to empower themselves in and out of battle.
translation:
身起四象

武僧们修习武术以参出元素位面的力量，此谓之曰四象派。四象武者会将各种元素混杂融合，博采众长，以便在需要的时候使出需要的力量。

original:
A divine entity helps ensure you can continue the fight. You have a pool of four d12s that you can spend to heal yourself. As a Bonus Action, you can expend dice from the pool, roll them, and regain a number of Hit Points equal to the roll's total.

Your pool regains all expended dice when you finish a Long Rest.

The pool's maximum number of dice increases by one when you reach Barbarian levels 6 (5 dice), 12 (6 dice), and 17 (7 dice).

Foundry Note

The pool's increase is automatically handled in this feature. This feature also allows scaling up the number of dice you would like to expend for healing.
translation:
某个神圣的存在总能使你持续不断地战斗。你拥有 4 枚 d12 所构成的治疗池，可用于治疗自己。以一个附赠动作，你从治疗池中消耗并掷出任意数量的骰子，恢复结果总数的生命值。

当你完成一次长休后，你的治疗池恢复所有已消耗的骰子。

治疗池中骰子的数量将会在你到达特定野蛮人等级时增加，分别为 6 级时 5 枚，12 级时 6 枚，17 级时 7 枚。

Foundry Note

此功能会自动处理治疗池的增加。该特性还允许你增加用于治疗的骰子数量。

original:
Master Unarmed Combat Techniques

Warriors of the Open Hand are masters of unarmed combat. They learn techniques to push and trip their opponents and manipulate their own energy to protect themselves from harm.
translation:
散打随心

散打武者是徒手战斗的大师，他们学习了推离和绊摔的技艺妨敌，并用内力保护自己免受伤害。

original:
Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of Simple or Martial Melee weapons of your choice, such as Greataxes and Handaxes. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can practice weapon drills and change one of those weapon choices.

When you reach certain Barbarian levels, you gain the ability to use the mastery properties of more kinds of weapons, as shown in the Weapon Mastery column of the Barbarian Features table.
translation:
你对武器的训练使你能够运用两种自选的简易或军用近战武器的精通属性，例如巨斧和手斧。

当你完成一次长休后，你可以重新演练武器技巧，来改变你所选择的其中一个武器类型。

当你获得特定的野蛮人等级时，你还可以使用更多种类武器的精通属性，具体数据见野蛮人特性表中“武器精通”一栏。

original:
Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of three kinds of Simple or Martial weapons of your choice. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can practice weapon drills and change one of those weapon choices.

When you reach certain Fighter levels, you gain the ability to use the mastery properties of more kinds of weapons, as shown in the Weapon Mastery column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFighter000000.JournalEntryPage.wDELe3k25FQvYdrq#class-features]{Fighter Features} table.

Foundry Note

To change your masteries toggle on the "Edit" mode of your sheet. On the "Details" tab click on the cog icon next to "Weapons" in the bottom right. You can place a check in the mastery column of your chosen weapons.
translation:
你对武器的训练使你能够自选并使用3种已熟练武器的精通词条。每当你完成一次长休后，你都可以练习武器技艺并改变你所选择的其中一种武器类型。

当你到达特定战士等级时，你可以使用更多种类武器的精通词条，已列在战士特性表的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFighter000000.JournalEntryPage.wDELe3k25FQvYdrq#class-features]{武器精通 Weapon Mastery} 一列。

Foundry Note

要更改您的精通项时，请在角色卡上切换到“编辑”模式。在“详情”选项卡中，点击右下角“武器”旁边的齿轮图标。可以在所选武器的精通栏中打勾。

original:
Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of weapons of your choice with which you have proficiency, such as Longswords and Javelins.

Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change the kinds of weapons you chose. For example, you could switch to using the mastery properties of Halberds and Flails.
translation:
对于你拥有熟练项的武器，你可以任选其中两项并获得其精通属性，比如说长剑和标枪。

每当你完成长休后，你可以改变你所选的两把武器，比如说你可以改为获得长戟和连枷的武器精通属性。

original:
Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of weapons of your choice with which you have proficiency, such as Daggers and Shortbows.

Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change the kinds of weapons you chose. For example, you could switch to using the mastery properties of Scimitars and Shortswords.
translation:
你对手中武器足够理解。对于你拥有熟练项的武器，你可以任选其中两项并获得其精通属性，比如说匕首和短弓。

每当你完成长休后，你可以改变你所选的两把武器，比如说你可以改为获得弯刀和短剑的武器精通属性。

original:
Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of weapons of your choice with which you have proficiency, such as Longbows and Shortswords.

Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change the kinds of weapons you chose. For example, you could switch to using the mastery properties of Scimitars and Longswords.
translation:
对于你拥有熟练项的武器，你可以任选其中两项并获得其精通属性，比如说长弓和短剑。

每当你完成长休后，你可以改变你所选的两把武器，比如说你可以改为获得弯刀和长剑的武器精通属性。

original:
Prerequisite: Level 7+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithD]{Speak with Dead} without expending a spell slot.
translation:
先决条件 Prerequisite: 7 级及以上的魔契师

你可以随意施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpeakwithD]，且无需消耗法术位。

original:
You gain the ability to heal yourself. As a Bonus Action, you can roll your Martial Arts die. You regain a number of Hit Points equal to the number rolled plus your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1 Hit Point regained).

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
你获得自疗的能力。以一个附赠动作，掷你的武艺骰，你恢复等同于掷骰结果+你感知调整值的生命值（最少为1）。

你可以使用此能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值（最少为1）。且在完成一次长休后恢复所有使用次数。

original:
You can summon a nature spirit that assumes an animal form to aid you. As a Magic action, you can expend a spell slot or a use of Wild Shape to cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar} spell without Material components.

When you cast the spell in this way, the familiar is Fey and disappears when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a Summon activity which can be used to summon your wild companion. You can choose whether to expend a use of wild shape or a spell slot when activating it.

The summon does not automatically disappear when you finish a Long Rest.
translation:
你可以召唤出一个动物外形的自然精魂来帮助自己。以一个魔法动作，你可以消耗一个法术位或一次荒野变形次数来施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]，无需任何材料成分。

当你以这种方式施展这一法术时，获得的魔宠为妖精，并且它会在你结束一次长休后消失。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个召唤行动，可用于召唤你的荒野伙伴。激活时，你可以选择消耗一次荒野形态或一个法术位。

召唤物在您完成长休时不会自动消失。

original:
Unleash Chaotic Magic

Your innate magic stems from the forces of chaos that underlie the order of creation. You or an ancestor might have endured exposure to raw magic, perhaps through a planar portal leading to Limbo or the Elemental Planes. Perhaps you were blessed by a fey being or marked by a demon. Or your magic could be a fluke with no apparent cause. Whatever its source, this magic churns within you, waiting for any outlet.
translation:
释放混沌魔力

你天生的魔力来自于与创生之秩序相生相对的混沌之狂野力量。你也许曾经暴露于某种形式的原生魔力中；也许你穿越了一扇传送门到达了混沌海，元素位面，或者神秘的遥远国度。也许你受一名强大的精类生物祝福，或被一个恶魔选中；又或许你的魔力仅仅是天生如此，没有任何明确的原因。无论事情如何发生，这种混乱的魔力已经在你体内翻涌，随时等待着释放之时。

original:
Your spellcasting can unleash surges of untamed magic. Once per turn, you can roll 1d20 immediately after you cast a Sorcerer spell with a spell slot. If you roll a 20, roll on the Wild Magic Surge table to create a magical effect.

If the magical effect is a spell, it is too wild to be affected by your Metamagic.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg rollable caption=false classes="wild-magic-surge"]
translation:
你施法时会释放出未经塑造的魔法浪涌。每回合一次，当你使用法术位施展术士法术后，立刻骰一次d20。如果你骰出20，则请根据表格“狂野魔法浪涌”骰出随机的魔法效应。
如果魔法效应是施展法术，因其过于疯狂，你无法对该法术施展超魔法。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg rollable caption=false classes="wild-magic-surge"]

original:
Once on each of your turns, if you have no uses of Wild Shape left, you can give yourself one use by expending a spell slot (no action required).

In addition, you can expend one use of Wild Shape (no action required) to give yourself a level 1 spell slot, but you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Regain Wild Shape activity consumes a spell slot and grants you another use of Wild Shape.

The Regain Spell Slot activity will consume a use of Wild Shape and grant you a level 1 spell slot.
translation:
每个你的回合一次，若你已耗尽荒野形态的次数，你可以消耗一个法术环位来获得一次荒野形态次数（无需动作）。

此外，你也可以消耗一次荒野形态使用次数来获得一个一环法术位（无需动作）。一旦你使用了此能力，直到你完成一次长休前你都不能再次使用它。

Foundry Note

恢复荒野形态行动会消耗一个法术位，并让你能再次使用荒野形态。

恢复法术位行动会消耗一次荒野形态的使用次数，并赋予你一个一环法术位。

original: Once on each of your turns
Once on each of your turns

The power of nature allows you to assume the form of an animal. As a Bonus Action, you shape-shift into a Beast form that you have learned for this feature (see “Known Forms” below). You stay in that form for a number of hours equal to half your Druid level (currently [[lookup @classes.druid.levels]]) or until you use Wild Shape again, have the Incapacitated condition, or die. You can also leave the form early as a Bonus Action.

Number of Uses. You can use Wild Shape twice. You regain one expended use when you finish a Short Rest, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

You gain additional uses when you reach certain Druid levels, as shown in the Wild Shape column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbDruid00000000.JournalEntryPage.UCOh3zlvGxyk5jLr#class-features]{Druid Features} table.

Current Number of Uses: [[lookup @scale.druid.wild-shape-uses]]

Known Forms. You know four Beast forms for this feature, chosen from among Beast stat blocks that have a maximum Challenge Rating of 1/4 and that lack a Fly Speed. The @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRat0000000]{Rat}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRidingHors]{Riding Horse}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSpider0000]{Spider}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobWolf000000]{Wolf} are recommended. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace one of your known forms with another eligible form.

Wild Shape Automation

When you've selected the creature you would like to wild shape into you can drag it onto your character sheet, select the Wild Shape option, and Foundry will automatically update your sheet. You can revert the transformation at the top of your sheet or by right clicking on your Actor in the sidebar.

When you reach certain Druid levels, your number of known forms and the maximum Challenge Rating for those forms increases, as shown in the Beast Shapes table. In addition, starting at level 8, you can adopt a form that has a Fly Speed.

Current Known Forms Limit: [[lookup @scale.druid.known-forms]]

Current CR Limit: [[lookup @scale.druid.wild-shape]]

When choosing known forms, you may look in the Monster Manual or elsewhere for eligible Beasts if the Dungeon Master permits you to do so.

Beast Shapes
Druid LevelKnown FormsMax CRFly Speed
241/4No
461/2No
881Yes

Rules While Shape-Shifted. While in a form, you retain your personality, memories, and ability to speak, and the following rules apply:

Temporary Hit Points. When you assume a Wild Shape form, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your Druid level.

Game Statistics. Your game statistics are replaced by the Beast's stat block, but you retain your creature type; Hit Points; Hit Point Dice; Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; class features; languages; and feats. You also retain your skill and saving throw proficiencies and use your Proficiency Bonus for them, in addition to gaining the proficiencies of the creature. If a skill or saving throw modifier in the Beast's stat block is higher than yours, use the one in the stat block.

No Spellcasting. You can't cast spells, but shape-shifting doesn't break your Concentration or otherwise interfere with a spell you've already cast.

Objects. Your ability to handle objects is determined by the form's limbs rather than your own. In addition, you choose whether your equipment falls in your space, merges into your new form, or is worn by it. Worn equipment functions as normal, but the DM decides whether it's practical for the new form to wear a piece of equipment based on the creature's size and shape. Your equipment doesn't change size or shape to match the new form, and any equipment that the new form can't wear must either fall to the ground or merge with the form. Equipment that merges with the form has no effect while you're in that form.

Foundry Note

You can activate this feature to track uses of your Wild Shape.

It will automatically restore a use on a Short Rest and all uses on a Long Rest.
translation:
自然之力使你能够变身为野兽形态。以一个附赠动作，你可以变形为你已经学习过的动物形态（见下文“已知形态”）。你可以保持变形的小时数等同于你一半的德鲁伊等级（向下取整），直到你死亡或陷入失能，抑或是再次使用荒野形态。你也可以用一个附赠动作提前恢复成原本的形态。

使用次数。 你可以使用荒野形态 2 次。短休后， 你可以恢复一次已消耗的使用次数，而完成长休后， 你可以恢复所有已消耗的使用次数。

你达到特定的德鲁伊等级时会获得额外的使用次数，如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbDruid00000000.JournalEntryPage.UCOh3zlvGxyk5jLr#class-features]表格中荒野形态一栏所示。

使用次数： [[lookup @scale.druid.wild-shape-uses]]

已知形态。你一开始掌握了该特性的四种形态，从最大挑战等级1/4且没有飞行速度的野兽（见附录B的资料卡选项）之中选取。推荐 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRat0000000]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobRidingHors]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobSpider0000] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobWolf000000] 四种形态。当你结束一次长休后，你可以将一种你掌握的形态换为另一种能够选用的形态。

荒野形态自动化 Wild Shape Automation

当您选择了想要狂野形状的生物后，您可以将其拖到您的 角色 上，选择 荒野形态 选项，FVTT 将自动更新您的角色卡。您可以在 角色卡 的顶部或通过右键单击侧边栏中的 角色 来还原转换。

当您达到一定的德鲁伊等级时，您的已知形态数量和这些形态的最高CR会增加，如 荒野形态Beast Shapes 表格所示。此外，从 8 级开始，您可以采用具有 飞行速度 的形态。

已知形态限制： [[lookup @scale.druid.known-forms]]

已知CR限制： [[lookup @scale.druid.wild-shape]]

当选择已知形态时，如果地下城主允许，你可以查阅《怪物图鉴》或其他来源并从中选择

荒野形态
德鲁伊等级 已知形态 最大CR 飞行速度
2 4 1/4 否

变形时的规则。 在变形状态下，你保留你的个性，记忆和说话的能力，并适用以下规则：

临时生命值。当你进入荒野形态时，你会获得等同于你德鲁伊等级的临时生命值。

游戏数据。你的游戏数据会被该野兽的数据给替代，但你保留你的生物类型，生命值，生命骰，智力，感知和魅力属性，职业特性，语言和专长。你同时还会保留你所有的技能和豁免熟练，并额外获得该野兽所具有的熟练。若该生物数据列出的技能或豁免调整值比拟的更高，则使用该生物的调整值而非你的。

无法施法。在变形状态下你不能施放法术，然而变形并不会中断你已施展法术的专注，也不会影响你已经施展的法术。

物件。你持握物件的能力取决于变形后形态的四肢，而非你原本的，此外你需要选择你的装备是否会掉在地上、还是融入新形态、或是被新形态所穿戴。穿戴的装备效果正常，但DM将根据该生物的体系和形态以决定新形态是否可以正常穿戴你的每个装备。你的装备并不会改变形状或尺寸以符合你的新形态，任何新形态无法穿戴的装备将会掉在地上或者融入新形态。直到你解除该形态前，融入新形态的装备不会产生任何效果。

Foundry Note

您可以激活此特性来跟进您荒野形态的使用情况。

它会在短休时自动恢复一次使用次数，在长休时恢复所有使用次数。

A Scholarly Magic-User of Arcane Power

Core Wizard Traits

Primary Ability

Intelligence

Hit Point Die

D6 per Wizard level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Intelligence and Wisdom

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2:Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, or Religion

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons

Armor Training

None

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff}), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRobe0000000]{Robe}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.LBajgahniRJbAgDr]{Spellbook}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagScholarsPac]{Scholar’s Pack}, and [[/award 5GP]]; or (B) [[/award 55GP]]

Wizards are defined by their exhaustive study of magic’s inner workings. They cast spells of explosive fire, arcing lightning, subtle deception, and spectacular transformations. Their magic conjures monsters from other planes of existence, glimpses the future, or forms protective barriers. Their mightiest spells change one substance into another, call meteors from the sky, or open portals to other worlds.

Most Wizards share a scholarly approach to magic. They examine the theoretical underpinnings of magic, particularly the categorization of spells into schools of magic. Renowned Wizards such as Bigby, Tasha, Mordenkainen, and Yolande have built on their studies to invent iconic spells now used across the multiverse.

The closest a Wizard is likely to come to an ordinary life is working as a sage or lecturer. Other Wizards sell their services as advisers, serve in military forces, or pursue lives of crime or domination.

But the lure of knowledge calls even the most unadventurous Wizards from the safety of their libraries and laboratories and into crumbling ruins and lost cities. Most Wizards believe that their counterparts in ancient civilizations knew secrets of magic that have been lost to the ages, and discovering those secrets could unlock the path to a power greater than any magic available in the present age.

Becoming a Wizard …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Wizard Traits table.
  • Gain the Wizard’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Wizard Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the Hit Point Die from the Core Wizard Traits table.
  • Gain the Wizard’s level 1 features, which are listed in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWizard0000000.JournalEntryPage.g7cMRWzsgAsEF7zC#class-features]{Wizard Features table}. See the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.vcs4jfEKRxPCsgXm]{multiclassing rules} to determine your available spell slots.

Expanding and Replacing a Spellbook

The spells you add to your spellbook as you gain levels reflect your ongoing magical research, but you might find other spells during your adventures that you can add to the book. You could discover a Wizard spell on a Spell Scroll, for example, and then copy it into your spellbook.

Copying a Spell into the Book. When you find a level 1+ Wizard spell, you can copy it into your spellbook if it’s of a level you can prepare and if you have time to copy it. For each level of the spell, the transcription takes 2 hours and costs 50 GP. Afterward you can prepare the spell like the other spells in your spellbook.

Copying the Book. You can copy a spell from your spellbook into another book. This is like copying a new spell into your spellbook but faster, since you already know how to cast the spell. You need spend only 1 hour and 10 GP for each level of the copied spell.

If you lose your spellbook, you can use the same procedure to transcribe the Wizard spells that you have prepared into a new spellbook. Filling out the remainder of the new book requires you to find new spells to do so. For this reason, many wizards keep a backup spellbook.
translation:
学术派奥术施法者

法师核心特质

关键属性

智力

生命骰

每法师等级 D6

豁免熟练项

智力与感知

技能熟练项

从奥秘、历史、洞悉、调查、医学、自然或宗教中选择两项

武器熟练项

简易武器

护甲训练

无

初始装备

选择 A 或 B ：（A） 2 把匕首、奥术法器（长棍）、长袍、魔法书、学者套组和 5 GP；或 （B）55 GP

所谓法师，便是对魔法运作原理钻研探索之人。喷射火焰，奥法闪电，欺诈幻象以及变换身形，这一切都可以由法师施法得来。不止如此，他们手中的魔法还可以唤来异界存在，一瞥未来明细，又或是降下护佑屏障。而最为强大的法术甚至可以点石成金，坠下陨石，打开通往异界的传送门。大多数法师都对魔法抱有学术研究的态度。他们研究魔法的理论基础，尤其是魔法学派的法术分类。毕格比、塔莎、魔邓肯和悠兰德等知名魔法师在研究的基础上发明了他们的招牌法术，如今这些法术已在多元宇宙中广泛使用。

法师最接近普通人的生活就是担任智者或讲师。还有一些法师则会出售其服务而成为预言家，服役于军队,或者甚至用其力量实施犯罪或支配他人。

不过知识与力量的诱惑足以令最不想冒险的法 师走出其安全的图书馆和实验室，前往那些废墟和失落城市中。绝大多数法师坚信远古时代的同行们掌握了一些现今已失传许久的魔法奥秘。而只要找到这些秘密，就能获得远超现有魔法的强大力量。

成为法师...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“法师核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“法师特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职职业

  • 获得“法师核心特质”表中的生命骰。
  • 获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWizard0000000.JournalEntryPage.g7cMRWzsgAsEF7zC#class-features]{法师特性表}中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章的兼职规则 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.vcs4jfEKRxPCsgXm]{兼职规则} 来确定可用的法术位。

扩展与替换法术书

例如，你发现了一张记载法师法术的卷轴，然后将其抄录到你的法术书中。

将法术抄入法术书。当你发现一道 1 环或更高环阶的法师法术时，你可以将其抄入你的法术书中，前提是，你必须能够准备该法术，且也有时间去解读和复制它。这个过程将消耗每法术环阶 2 小时的时间和每法术环阶 50 GP的资金。之后你就可以像准备法术书中的其他法术一样准备该法术了。

复制法术书。 你可以将法术书中的法术复制到其他法术书中。这就像把一个新法术复制到你的法术书中，但速度更快，因为你已经知道如何施法了。每个法术环阶只会消耗你10 GP和 1 小时。

如果你的法术书丢了，你可以用同样的方法将你准备好的法师法术复制到新的法术书中。填写新法术书的剩余部分需要你寻找新的法术来完 成。因此，许多法师都会保留一本备用法术书。

As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape to manifest a 5-foot Emanation that takes the form of ocean spray that surrounds you for 10 minutes. It ends early if you dismiss it (no action required), manifest it again, or have the Incapacitated condition.

When you manifest the Emanation and as a Bonus Action on your subsequent turns, you can choose another creature you can see in the Emanation. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or take Cold damage and, if the creature is Large or smaller, be pushed up to 15 feet away from you. To determine this damage, roll a number of d6s equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of one die).

Foundry Note

The size of the emanation increases automatically when you gain the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdAquaticAff]{Aquatic Affinity} feature.

The Save activity consumes a use and the Bonus Action Save activity does not.

以召出海浪同一个附赠动作的一部分或在后续回合以附赠动作控制海浪，你可以选择浪花内的一名生物，迫使他进行一次对抗你法术DC的体质豁免，失败时将受到冷冻伤害，且目标若为大型或以下的体型，将被推离你 15 尺。该伤害等同于你感知调整值数量的 D6 骰（最少为 1）。

Foundry Note

当你获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdAquaticAff] 特性时，该光环范围会自动扩大。
